de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang bkur sti dang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje rig pa bsgrub pa 'byung

ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang po g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas gso sbyong can dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du

bkrus pa'i gos gyon la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ nang par du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to/ /mchog ci 'dod pa stsol te

sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to/ /de nas yang cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te tsog tsog por 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+mo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te/ khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin

bzlas la/ zla ba tshangs nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to/ /yang cho ga gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas pa'i mjug la

nyin mtshan gsum du smyung ba bya ste/ phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha' la bltas te stong phrag

brgya bzlas na nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo / /des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog thob bo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag

na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang pos lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo / /'jig

rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten

gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba'ang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/ gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar

'gyur ro/ /gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog stsol ba dang / don thams cad sgrub pa

dang / dgos pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par smros shig /ngas kyang bzung ngo / /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /Tak+ki hU~M dza/ de nas

'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yos/ /rab tu g.yos/ 'phar rab tu 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur to/ /nyan thos dang rang

sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur to/ /bdud dang mi bgrungs

pa'i phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par byas so/ /gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom ste 'dar pad pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng shig dang / 'di nyid khyed la skyob par byed do/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing

khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hU~M zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs nas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nod do/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so/ /lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad

brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smros shig /o~M Tu~M/ rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis bdag nyid go bgos na/ rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/

nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che/ /gru bzhi pa ste sgo bzhi pa'o/ /rta

babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste/ bcu drug cha dang ldan par ro/ /rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste/ /grwa dang sgo yi zur dag dang / /de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya/ /ba dan phreng ba dril bus brgyan/ /dang por phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /

snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang / /rdo rje srad bu mnyam ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad ldan zhing / /rdo rje'i ka ba bdun gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa'

che/ /phyag na rdo rje gzhug par bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag /dbu rgyan du ni brgyan thogs pa/ /cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste/ /me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba po/ /de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i thugs nyid de/ /khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can/ /gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing / /gnyis kyis rdo rje hU~M mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyi g.yas phyogs su/ /rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya/ /snying gar rdo rje brtan 'dzin cing / /'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas

so/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste/ /sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te/ /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /rdo rje can gyis g.yon bris pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa dmar po ste/ /gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin/ /sgeg pas mchod

cing 'dud pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnams su/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya/ /dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin/ /ston ka'i rdo rje kha ba mo/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu/ /'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri/ /sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje

'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du smros shig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing / /sems can kun la bde ba stsol/ /sems can kun gyi phar

gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag deng 'grub/ /Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin

la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug nas 'di skad ces smros shig /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong

pa'i mi mkhas pa su la yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig /'byung po'i gdon dang phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas gdong khol cig /de nas 'di skad ces smros shig /gang

dbus na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /gang mdun na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te/ 'dod pa'i khro bo'o/ /gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems

can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /gang rgyab na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o/ /gang g.yon phyogs na ba 'di ni bdag

nyid che ba'i bdud de/ sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o/ /gang grwa'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang dri'i lha'o/ /gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no/ /gang

sgo srung de dag ni mig dang / 'dod chags pa dang mdza' ba ste/ kyo ba tang ba dang / zhags pa dang / sgrog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smod par ma byed cig /gang sangs rgyas kyi

bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad

la chags pas na thar pa ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod chags ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so/ /de nas snying po byin cig /Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i

mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/ Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o/ /hU~M zhes pa ni khro bo'o/ /de gnyis dgug pa'i phyir dzaHzhes bya ba ni 'di khyod kyis

bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /o~M badzra d+ha ra badzra pra taM d+hA ra ya sing d+h+ya Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la

phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no/ /de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so/ /o~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba kA me shwa red twe i dam badzra nA ma nA mA d+hi Sh+Thi te dri D+ho s+ya b+ha ba o~M Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas der 'dug ste phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na de nas sa g.yo

ste/ grub pa thams cad lan cig bzlas pas 'grub bo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de phyin cad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do/ /thams cad kyi snying du sdug

par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi brtan par chags so/ /snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro/ /gyur pa dang 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la yang ston to/ /

de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des na sems can thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs

bstod pa'i glus bstod do/ /de phyin cad grub pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad dang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang ro dang spyad pa thams cad kyis

tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo / /rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bris te zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rje

sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum bzlas so/ /de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slar yang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de ltar mtshan gcig thal byung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin tam/ rdo rje

khro bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang rgyan dang spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /

de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bus thig btab ste/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas 'di skad smros shig /ho badzra sa twa su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/

de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra ash+t+ro hU~M/ g.yas su rdo rje dga' mgu 'khyud par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra ki li hU~M/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams ma'i rdo rje bri de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra a gri ho/ g.yon du rdo rje snyems ma bris te/

rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra garbe ha ni/ de nas grwa dang sgor yang rang gi lha mo bri/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud

de zhugs la 'di skad brjod do/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M a haM/ su ra ta ho Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to/ /de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje

de nyid kyis btsud nas 'di zhes smros shig /khyod kyis dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig /mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du shi zhing ngu 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur ta re/ de nas dam tshig brjod de/ bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ /'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung / /

de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'i/ /'dod dang bsam pa ma btang shig /'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /o~M Tak+ki hU~M phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blud do/ /gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag la yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas

blud do/ /gang gis 'di las 'das na/ zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab bo/ /de nas de bzhin du 'byung ngo / /shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil

'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am mtshan ma gzhag go/ /der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o/ /de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi

pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya

bcings la bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thang cig bzlas te/ hU~M zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ /de phyin cad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i las 'byung ste/

sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying gar bcings la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/ tshul khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug /shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci

nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni/ phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o/ /de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //

de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang / /slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la/ /mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/ de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang /

gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o/ /steng du nam mkha'i snying po bri/ grwar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro/ /de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus bzhir stong

bzlas shing bsgrubs na de nas zla ba tshang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la sems dpa' chen po dang / lha mo yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa

thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin 'thob bo/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa ni

mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang mtshan mo yang thal byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ras la

bcom ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin las thams cad byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo / /sangs

rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no/ /des kyang longs spyod par nus na/ lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos brgya byin yang stsol to/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas

kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro/ /de nas

sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis grub par 'tshal gyi/ 'di ci 'tshal zhes smros shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub bo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang

po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas

las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar

'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung btsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gugs nus par

'gyur ro/ /zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa bsdams te 'bum bzlas na/ sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum

bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad dbab nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ hU~M zhes bya ba gcig gis gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan

la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs

pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas tshar gcad pa dang / dbab pa dang thang cig gis ni gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs so/ /sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum

bzlas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na/ bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong

phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste/ de phyin cad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de

nas be con thob ste/ be con des ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob bo/ /skya sleng gi gnas su song ste 'bum bzlas na skya sleng las kun byed do/ /rgun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ chang gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /

ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /mdzod

skyob rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la zad par mi nus so/ /rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ rlung gis de dang mthun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /me

la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbus su 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang 'gro na yang mi 'tshig ste/ me'i gzir gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no/ /ngal bso po mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin

par 'gyur ro/ /phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ sa la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no/ /gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de las thams cad

pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /klu ba ru Na mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /mi'i gnas su song nas stong nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ mi thams cad g.yog byed cing gdon thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sa la 'dug ste 'bum

bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad bsgyel ba dang / dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ sa'i

'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi dong tse la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /skyes pa bzung ste 'bum bzlas na/ stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bzung ste

stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na/ stong

phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gos dang rgyan gyis chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas bslangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na/ 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs

par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /sA la b+hany+tsi ka mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re zhing yang gser gyi dong tse brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi sgrog ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang gi snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad par

'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /srin po mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por

'gyur ro/ /sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang bsgrub bo/ /ri la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na ri thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug ste 'bum bzlas

na phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na/ shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zhing la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na/ bza' ba 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas

na nor thams cad ma bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas byin can du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis grong de 'thob bo/ /gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na/ gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor

thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang

du 'gyur ro/ /skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na/ skyed mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi gnas su 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgod

cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ bgad pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro/ /cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /

lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyi 'jom par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jom pa la mdzub mo btsugs te

'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa dang / gtong ba dang 'gyel ba dang slong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jom pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na/ bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum

bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ 'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum bzlas na/ des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /'jom par ba bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum

bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gugs

nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje lag gis bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'bum bzlas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes

kyang de mchod na gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum

bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu la lta zhing 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la yi ge snang ste/ thams cad smra ba dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo

bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor zhing 'bum bzlas na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la

sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to/ /byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na/ mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang / yid

kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i

bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na/ dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad dang / las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug dang / byed pa po dang / 'byin pa

dang / mi zad mi nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rnyed cing 'thob ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen dang / bshes gnyen dang / grogs

thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la yang 'grub par byed do/ /bsams pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to/ /skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang / na tshod dang / shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes

gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ khro bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na/ des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro/ /hU~M zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang

'dzin pa dang / khams gsum gyi dbang po dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes

gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to/ /gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnam dal dang /

'tshe ba dang / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smros shig /de

nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /A ro lika /de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos

rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de dbus srad bu mnyam pa ru/ /grwa bzhi par ni gdab pa

ru/ /gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste/ /dbus su thig ni bzhi yang bri/ /tshon rtsi dmar po dag gis ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/ /'jig

rten mgon po gzhug par bya/ /'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya/ /pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /der ni slob dpon bzhugs nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor gnas su 'jug nas ni/ /rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /

ji ltar pad+ma chu rnams dang / /nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis/ /chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir/ /'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin/ /'di lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo ba tang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras

gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar dgrol lo/ /de la pad mo chen po'i kyo ba tang ni 'di'o/ /o~M ma hA pad+ma hU~M dza hrIH/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do/ /de

nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma gzhug go/ /dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos la/ thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yon par pad mo

byin/ g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smros shig /sangs rgyas thams cad pad mo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rtag pa ru ni brtag par bya/ /khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa

bslab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bad mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas bad mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /pad mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma kha

'byed pa'i tshul gyis blta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo/ /pad mo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas

pad mo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad mo stong 'bul lo/ /de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do/ /slob min bu min ma yin te/ /dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni/ /dag pa nyid de pad+ma bzhin/ /dam

tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gis so/ /lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so/ /las kyi

dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs

par bri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad mo'i dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las gzhan

pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/ skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing ldog go/ /sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe

dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams

thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug

tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying gar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thob bo/ /yang na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po 'thob bo/ /de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas

bdag srung ngo / /gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang grong dang grong khyer srung ngo / /gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do/ /dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug pas so/ /gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hrI zhes bya bas so/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me

tog bzlas te byin no/ /sems can thams cad gnon pas ni sa ser pos so/ /bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma na'i me tog la bsngags pas so/ /chom rkun gnon pa ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /dang bya gnon pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so/ /sgyu ma

gnon pa ni rma bya'i chang bus so/ /rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so/ /rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgro'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni

bu mo'i skra'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la

mchod pa byas nas/ nub gsum rangs par bzlas na/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i

mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog

pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po

'bul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ 'dis sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'

la skyes bu chen po smros shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /tra~M bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan

thams cad dang / gos dang / gser dang / nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di

gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te/ /rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing / /grwa brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya/ /rin chen kun dang ldan par bya/ /der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes

brjod do/ /re ba thams cad grub pa yi/ /nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te/ /grub shig grub shig sems chen po/ /bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /

de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la de'i thad 'khor kun du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go/ /bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sems can kun la

phan phyir dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /don zhes bstan pa gang yin de/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin/ /de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab bo/ /de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang zas sbyin pa dang chos sbyin pa'o/ /de la dbang

bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o/ /nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/ /zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o/ /chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la'o/ /de nas snying po byin la rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum

pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do/ /o~M badzra rat+nA b+hi She kA b+hi Shiny+tsa sarbA d+hi pa ti hU~M bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslab ste/ sngags ni 'di'o/ /hU~M bA Ta ha/ de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o/ /o~M bA bA Ta mu ba~M/

de nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo / /dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la/ lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do/ /dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang / gser

dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la/ de nas de btsud de thams cad bstan nas/ dam tshig 'di sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag /gal te nyin re mchod stongs na/ /khyod kyis nor dang don bsags

pa/ /tshe rabs kun du 'jig par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni mna'i snying po'o/ /o~M bA bA Ta Ta ya swA hA/ de nas chus dbang bskur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/

de'i dbus su bzhag nas der btsud de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis sbyin no/ /de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams

la sbyin no/ /de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no/ /de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o/ /g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad

kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po ras la bris pa de las byung nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang

bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na/ gter chen po

rnyed do/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid 'thob bo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum

bzlas na/ nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tse 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob bo/ /des nor yang skye bar byed do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor

lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang / zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems

dpa' dga' ldan gnam gyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo / /de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje khu

tshur gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/

bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M ru Tu ru Tu hU~M ma Ta/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba der lhags te/ lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so/ /de yi dbus su sems chen po/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur

gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas/ /lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhag par bya/ /de dag gi ni grwa kun du/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir

rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ /zhugs la 'di brjod do/ /hU~M dak+Shi Ni sma ra na phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur te/ de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar

mi nus so/ /de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying gar dgrol lo/ /o~M badzra muSh+Ti mu/ de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /

deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo/ /khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod/ des smras pa gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo/ /de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o/ /g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

nyid sbyin no/ /de ste rdo rje'i zhes zer na de'i lag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo shig /'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig /de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di zhes smros shig /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams/ /bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste/ /bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad/ /de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcings pa slobs shig /dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /

dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /sangs rgyas sku lus gzhag par bya/ /thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /phyag rgya bzhi

ni bri bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin/ /de bzhin rdo rje pad mo'i dbus/ /rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya/ /grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya/ /de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun/ /bcing ba yang ni

bslab par bya/ /sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang ni/ /bskul ba gsang ba bslab par bya/ /'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas/ /sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de

bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na/ /phyag rgya shes par bstan na ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang / /sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/

dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo/ /de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la/ /sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing / /

de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'o ma 'thung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan

thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang

phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o/ /de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i

mjug tu zhag bdun smyungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la/ mtshan thal byung du bzlas so/ /de nas nam phyed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di brjod cig /o~M badzra muSh+Ti ha na ha na sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas

nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun tu 'jug go/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa bris te/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /sku mdog sdo bsangs ut+pal sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i

dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar por bya'o/ /de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsal phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo

dang rdo rje pho nya ma'o/ /rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go/ /dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog sngon mo la rdo rje 'khar ba 'chang ba'o/ /de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas

stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ gzugs kyi ras de las phaT ces bya ba thos na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin cad nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod na mi snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'gro'o/ /ci 'dod pa'i

gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /kun tu 'khyil pas 'khyil pa'i skra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan

gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas phyogs

su phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sku mdog ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam

'dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to/ /de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum smyangs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ska'i 'bru mar la

bsnyugs pa brgyad stong du ba med pa'i mdag ma la bsreg go/ /de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni rgyal po'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang

ba'am/ sa brjod pa'am/ sa'i 'og brjod pa'am/ khams brjod pa'am/ 'dod pa'i khams mi snang ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang bsgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa

bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ut+pal sngon po'i mdog tu byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas na/ nam phyed nas bcom ldan

'das nyid byon te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ras sam shing leb bam/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las

thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur

bcings na/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas pas so/ /lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyur te/ phral na snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bcings pa'i

khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na/ khu tshur bcangs bas bcing ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na/ rdo rje khu tshur bya bas pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor

dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / me dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam

dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do/ g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na/ rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang /

'dren pa dang 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur sgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro/ /g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgyu bzlas na/ rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las nor dang / gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang /

mtshon cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gugs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang 'gugs so/ /bud med kyi nu ma dang / mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang /

mchu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / brla dang / ska rags dang / gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang 'gugs so/ /bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin zhag gcig smyungs la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de phyin cad khu tshur

bcangs pas las thams cad byed do/ /de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel

ba dang / brdabs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang / dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug

pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang / 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma rungs par bya ba dang /

thams cad spo ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang / thams cad 'gegs pa dang / gas pa sbyar ba dang / sprul bskrad pa dang / gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang / ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / glog dbyung ba dang / thams cad slar gcad pa dang / sngan

chad med pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa

bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smros shig ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ a ra pa tsa na/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad

kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi'am bco lnga la bris te/ de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o/ /rdo rje ral gri dang glegs

bam thogs par byas la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ /niSh+p+ra pany+tsA gra zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di lnga brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang stsol te/ de phyin cad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo / /de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/ 'di zhes smros shig /deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/ /snying po

'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig /de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so/ /a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba

ni spyod pa'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o/ /de ltar 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni

'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo/ /spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o/ /de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor

bris la de'i dbus su ral gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /

a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+har+m+mA tA~M/ Ad+ya nu t+pan+na twA ta/ /a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na/ mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil

'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pas so/ las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bsgrub par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul

du ras la bris nas/ yi ge phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi bsgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na/ spobs pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs

kyang las su 'gyur ba ni/ lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo/ /gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro/ /bzhi bzlas pas

dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la/ yi ge phreng ba g.yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o/ /de nas

bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas/ chos bshad de slar gshegs so/ /tshe 'di nyid

las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsol to/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po 'di stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'khor lo

byang chub sems dpa' la bskul lo/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/ /o~M badzra tsakra hU~M/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad

kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba/ /rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par

bya/ /de yi thad 'khor thams cad du/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri/ /de yang sems can chen po rnams/ /de dag nyid ni legs par bri/ /de nas blo ldan thog ma ru/ /rdo rje 'khor los 'jug par bya/ /

zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ zhes brjod na/ des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te/ grub pa thams cad du stsol to/ /de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag

rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bri ste/ de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris

nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis/ /mthong dang de bzhin bsgrubs na ni/ /rtog pa thams cad 'grub par ro/ /de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du/ /phyag rgya

shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi/ /bla med pas ni bslab par bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed de/ ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga'am rtog pa las bshad pa

sgrubs shig /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten

gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis smros shig ces gsungs so/ /de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/

o~M ga ga na sa~M b+ha ba badzra bA tsa ho/ de nas de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri/ /de yi dbus su nor chen te/ /nam mkha' dang por bzhugs

par bya/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba'o/ /dang por slob dpon 'jug pa ni/ /mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste/ de bzhin du slob ma yang

bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya yang slobs shig /mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te/ yid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shig /zhugs nas 'di skad

rjod cig /'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de bden pa gang gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas

nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de nas nam mkha' las mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas

btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes rjod cig /'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni/ /'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni 'dod pa 'byung / /'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig /ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

mchod cig ces bsgo shig /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang slobs shig /yid kyis 'di skad rjod cig /nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub bo/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M mai tri dr-i D+ha tsi te tiSh+Tha ho/ /de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ go cha brtan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod

do/ /badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do/ /btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon no/ /brtan

pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do/ /rangs sam yang na khros kyang rung / /

mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te/ /'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na/ /byams pa chen po bsgom par gyis/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad dge

bar gyur cig /'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang / byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas bsgrub bo/ /las rnams kyang yid kyis ci dad pa'i cho ga dang byams

pas sgrubs shig /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las byams pa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam pa la sogs pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i

rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ /o~M dri/ o~M b+hin+da badzra shU la/ o~M ts+tshin d+ha hU~M tsakra phaT/ o~M b+hur b+hu ba swaHswA hA/ o~M ha na b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M la la la la a b+hi Sha g+haN+Ta Tan/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum po'i

dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri/ der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad du bri ba'am/ bzhag pa'am mthar ni tshon gyi thig le yang gzhag go/ /de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings

la 'dug go/ /g.yon logs nas rdo rje'i slob ma yang bcug ste/ de nas phyag rgya yang bslab bo/ /de phyin cad thams cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rig pa'i blon

po chen po'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha kha kha krod+ha dz+wA lA mA la hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA prA ba s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/ o~M kA

la daN+Da ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ /o~M kA la pra shA gra A kaD+D+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris la de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go/ /phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin du bar bcad du byas la 'god do/ /de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi

'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo/ /de nas thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba dang srung ba 'grub bo/ /rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul

lo/ /o~M ma hA bA lA ka ma hA ga Na de bi ba pi ba ru hrIHran sarba du Sh+DA na nA phaT/ o~M mA lA d+ha ra tsa la tsa la ya hU~M/ o~M d+ha nur d+ha ra ba shI ku ru sarba sang twA na swA hA/ /o~M dza ya bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris

la der rdo rje gzhag go/ /g.yas su'ang gnyis g.yon du'ang gnyis so/ /de nas rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgyas btsud de/ de nas phyag rgya bslabs nas cho ga bslab pa ni/ gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang / /lha yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs par/ /gzhan rnams de dag thams

cad kun/ mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las tshogs kya gtso bo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ o~M lA~M ga lI hU~M/ o~M ma hA pa ta

hU~M/ o~M badzra dz+wA lA ya swA hA/ o~M bi ka Ta b+hai ra ba de hi me sar+b+ban hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ dbus su rdo rje gzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug la las 'di bslab bo/ /mi dge ba'i sems

can thams cad 'thung shig /phrogs shig /sregs shig /zo shig /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las pho nya'i tshogs kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje kyo ba

tang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/ o~M bA rA ha da~M Sh+Tot+kaT bi ga to d+ha ra sarba na kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba mA ra

da Da hU~M phaT/ o~M b+hi ka tai ka da~M sh+Ti b+hin d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o/ /gru gsum par bris la mngon sum pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/ gar gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi rdo rje la

mchod do/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las bran gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas ma thams cad kyis ku co'i sgra bton te/ gar gyi mchod pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo/ /de nas rdo rje'i

blon mo chen mo dag gis smras pa/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha ra li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra tsakra tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M shA na ti hU~M/ o~M badzra muSh+Ti ha na shin d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M ku mA ra ha bi Sha g+ha Na ti ke ra Na ra Na tsa lA ya sarba duSh+TA na hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor

'khor lo la sogs pa bri'o/ /de'i dbus su rdo rje khro mo'i me lag na rdo rje'i gsal phur can bzhag go/ /dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o/ /

de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/ /o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ o~M sau mya kro d+he hU~M phaTaH o~M daN+Da d+ha ri Na ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M piM ga li hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go/ /cha bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim

gyis gzhag go/ /'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do/ /'di ni khro mo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ o~M kharga mA

ri Ni hU~M/ o~M a sha si ba d+he hi ra ma ho/ o~M pA sha sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M sarba ra ma Ni ra ti bri ye ho/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po ste/ sgo bzhi pa dbus su se ral srad bu byas te thig bzhi btab la rim pa bzhir bri'o/ /gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum

por thig bzhi rim du btab la de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'o/ /ngos bzhir ni rim gyis te/ shar phyogs nas bri ba'am gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir rdo rje'i mngag gzhug ma bri ba'am gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /b+hi tsi ri Ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /de ltar rig

pa'i blon mo chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig /'di thang cig bzlas pas thams cad khugs so/ /de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bong bzung ste/ phyag 'tshal nas skyil mo krung gi gar byed cing zhugs la

dbab bo/ /bcangs nas dam tshig byin cig /sarba mA ra khA da pi ba de hi ba ra sa ma ya ho/ /de nas de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no/ /glu gar dang / sil snyan dang / zas dang skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab pa ste/ de nas dngos grub thams cad dang bde ba

thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas/ rnal 'byor dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa yang thob bo zhes smros shig /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje'i tshogs ma mo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje

pho nya mo rnams kyis smras pa/ o~M b+h+yo/ o~M ka li ma rA ni/ badzra rAk+Sha si ha na sarba na TI ma/ /o~M bU tha Ne tha/ o~M ma hA ka ra bA k+t+re hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rje ni grwa'i dbus su gzhag go/ /bzhir ni rdo rje pho nya mo bzhag ste de cho ga de bzhin du bya'o/ /

'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje pho nya mo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ /o~M bA rA hi badzra mu khi dri toM ta rA pa ta la sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A bi sha hU~M phaT/ /o~M kA li kA pA li mA la d+hA ri NI ka Ta ka Ta ma Ta ma Ta

b+hi mA ra ya sarba mA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M pu tani u tsu sma ru drA khA da sarba na sho Sha ya swA hA/ o~M ma ka ra mu khi ha ra ha ra hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la sgo bzhir bris nas/ de'i dbus su rdo rje bris te de bzhin gar gyis mchod do/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa

chen po'i rgyal po las bran mo'i rtog pa ste rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no/ /de bas na rtog pa'i

rgyal po 'dir don yod cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems can thams cad dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud shod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul te/ dad pa dang mi ldan pa sdig pa byed pa/

smra ba le lo can dka' ba spyad pa mi bzod pa/ 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba/ rtag tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis sems can de dag bya ba thams cad byed bzhin pa dang / brtson 'grus med pa dang dka' ba spyad pa yang med par bde blag tu tshe 'di nyid

la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul la mngon par dga' zhing bdag gi grogs po dang / pha dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams mthong 'dod cing de yang sred pas 'khol ba ste/

phyogs nas phyogs su yang 'gro mi nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rig 'dzin gyi gnas su lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga las byung /

phyag na rdo rje ga las skyes/ /rdo rje yang ni ga las byung / /phyag rgya snying po rig pa dang / /sngags rnams khyad par ci zhig yod/ /gsang pa sgrub pa ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya be cing ba ji lta bu/ /de rnams kyi ni de nyis gang / /byin gyis brlabs sogs ji lta bu/ /sgrub

pa rnams kyang ji ltar mthong / /dngos grub 'dod pa ji lta bu/ /ras la ri mo ji ltar bri/ /sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig /ji ltar bzlas pa bya bar gsungs/ /ci 'dra ba ni mchod par bgyi/ /bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar grub pa myur

bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur/ /las rnams bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/ /de dag gi ni de nyid gang / /thams cad bdag la bshad pa'i rigs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /nam

mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /kun du bzang po thams cad bdag /'dod pa 'gro ba bdag po yin/ sems can kun sems gang yin pa/ /brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pas ting nges 'dzin/ /nges par rdo rje nyid du

'gyur/ /de la smras pa sems gzugs med pa la ji ltar na sra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba na sha dang / rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin te/ sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par shes pa gzugs med

pa rnams 'dus pa las sems can skye ba dang / ji ltar klu rnams khros pas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin nges pas nam mkha' la gnam lcags 'byung ba'am/ glog dang bcas te 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te/ sems dpar byin rlabs sbyor ba yin/ /

rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan rdo rje de nyid ni/ /bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /de la sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/ sems dpa' kun gyi bdag che na/ /bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes/ /byin gyis brlabs nas

sems dpa' bdag /yin zhes nga rgyal bsgom par bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rgyal ba yin/ /rang sems so sor brtags pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin/ /de nyid phyag na rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis

so/ /'jig rten dbang po nam mkha' snying / /de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do/ /sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid de/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigs/ /de nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te/ /khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs/ /

'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do/ /de nyid byed dang 'byin pa po/ /sems can kun gyi mes po ste/ /de nyid sems can gnas yin te/ /'byung ba che rnams de nyid do/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste/ /gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das

thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa'i khyad par gyi bar du bya ba ste/ snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /

de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang / smra ba ni snying po brjod pa ste/ snying po brjod pas ni snying gis bsam pa'i grub pa thob ces bya ba ni snying po'i khyad par ro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni/ /rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rnams kyi/ /gzugs

brnyan sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /phyag rgya kun gyi khyad par te/ /'byung ba yang ni de yis bstan/ /ji ltar jo bo'i rgya mthong na/ /bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa/ /de bzhin rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang / /phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang

thugs/ /ji ltar gnas dang mthun byas la/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid bsgyur/ /de ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /sor bsnol brtan pa dam tshig ste/ /sems kyi shes rab ldan pa
