kyang rung / /sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na/ /gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas/ /bzlas ba byas te song nas kyang / /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung du dor/ /de ltar na ni sdig can yang / /ngan song las

ni thar 'gyur na/ /dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang / /byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgyu ldan pa/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan/ /tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang / /shes rab rnams kyis

rgyu bsgoms pa'i/ /'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos/ /myur du de yi ngan song ni/ /bcom par gyur te the tshom med/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la/ /med par lta ba gang yin dang / /byang chub lam las rnam log pas/ /bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed cing / /sdig pa'i rang

bzhin mthong la/ /ma dang pha la snying ring zhing / /byang chub sems la brten pa dang / /'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams/ /ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam/ /sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs/ /shes rab thabs rnams

med na ni/ /sdig can de dag mi thar zhes/ /bder gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs/ //de nas brgya byin la sogs lha/ /pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas/ /legs zhes bya bas mnyes byas te/ /rab tu mgu bas mchod byas nas/ /brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas/ /

ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ /bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas/ /de nas de ni dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang / /dga' ldan gnas su sems can kun/ /phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes/ /de nas

dbang por bcas pa yi/ /grags chen lha rnams gar byed cing / /mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod bya'i phyir/ /lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te/ /tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas/ /lha rdzas

rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /me tog bdug pa byug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs/ /rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang / /na bza' rin chen char la sogs/ /dga' ba'i tshal ni gang bar byas/ /de nas ya mtshan cher gyur te/ /lha rnams kyis kyang

phyag 'tshal nas/ /dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba/ /kun nas gang bar gyur pa yi/ /sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni

lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no/ /mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas

brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med/ /dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de/ /sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/ de'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ni ji lta bu lags/ lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar

'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las phyung ngo / /byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying gar zhugs te bskul nas

yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun tshad kyi nam mkha'i ngos thams cad gsal bar byas te/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas/ lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen

pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to/ /de nas lha'i bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa

'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma shAkya mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya mtshan che/ /gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi/ /sems can myur du glog bzhin grol/ /de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi bad mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad

brgya phrag stong du dri'i ngad ldang ba/ lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa/ ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / ker ko rnams kyi sgra snyan pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ de mthong

nas kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi khyab/ /tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bsam yas/ /de nas lha'i bu de

dag gis de blta bar 'dod nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha'i bu de dang / de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis yang mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa des lha'i bu de dang lha'i 'khor de dag kun du snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom

ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yos par byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas shing bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /sngags kyi byin rlabs ya

mtshan che/ /gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi/ /sems can lha gnas myur du skyes/ /de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu

dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda ldi dang / rnga ma la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang seng ge'i gdan dang gzims cha dang pho

brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang / spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang / rta dang / seng

ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / dgo ba dang / thug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang / glang dang / ba dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma yang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang bsti stang du byas te phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo / /de nas

brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du legs so zhes bya bas bstod cing mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams

'chang ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la zung shig /lha'i bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems

can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma rabs rnams kyis ni ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyis ni ma yin no/ /sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams

dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs

pa'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i zhal nyid nas thos pas bdag cag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba

dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems

can rnams kyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid

du blta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol du song nas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub la gdon mi za bar brtan par byed pa

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dper na khyod kyis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no/ /lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs

pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag /ci so so'i skye bo yin snyam sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/ /lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen

po/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa/ rjed pa/ bsti stang du bya ba/ 'phrag la bkur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lha smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la

sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal

po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pany+tsi ka dang / pany+tsi ka chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma

yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / skar ma la sogs pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag

cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo dad pas 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs

sam/ gzhan yang rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i bu mo'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor pho'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo'am/ gang su yang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du

bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lags so/ /rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongs

su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dus dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi phru ma mang po gzhom par bgyi'o/ /sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan

pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la yang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la brtag pa'i rgyal

po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po legs kyis/

'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la sgrubs shig /ngan song thams

cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa las brtag pa dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma

'di bshad do/ /dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/ /dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa/ /thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / o~M sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a bA ya bi sho d+ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba karma A ba ra NA ni b+haSh+miM ku ru hU~M phaT/ o~M bruM b+h+rUM bi nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M bruM bi shong+ha ya A ba ra NA ni

hU~M phaT/ o~M dz+wa la dz+wa lang+ha ka ng+ha ka ha na ha na sarba A ba raNA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M sruM sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sarba A ba ra NI ni hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M ha ra ha ra sarba A pa ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M phaT sarba A ba ra NA ni bi s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/ o~M br-i ta br-i ta sarba A ba ra NA ni phaT/ o~M tra Ta traT sarba A ba ra NA ni

hU~M phaT/ o~M ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sarba A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga ta hi tu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma tha ma tha sarba tir+ya ka ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag rnams kyi yo byad bshad do/ /o~M sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya hU~M

phaT/ o~M sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a pA ya ga ti gan d+ha nA sha ni gan d+ha ba ti hU~M phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyis sngags la/ o~M sarba na ra ka ga ti A kar Sha Ni hU~M dzaHphaT/ o~M sarba na ra ka ga ti a b+h+yu d+d+har

Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba a bA ya ban d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hU~M ba~M phaT/ o~M sarba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hU~M hoHphaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan/ /nang gi rim pa

bris nas ni/ /lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi/ /bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni/ /dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri/ /rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri/ /g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la/ /g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /gzi brjid phung po me

yi phyogs/ /dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po/ /rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs/ /rnam par 'joms pa nai ri t+yar/ /bris nas phyi rol bri byi ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya/ /dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /

lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /de nas dri zhim dri la sogs/ /rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH b+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya

hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong du sa rnams su

yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba pa byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang /

gdon dang dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i hU~M zhes bya bas las thams cad phyed par 'gyur ro/ /brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du

gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro'am/ gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o/ /thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni/

phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar/ /sangs rgyas bder gshegs skyes rnams kyis/ /phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su/ /thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni/ /rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par

bshad/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /snying gar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la/ /de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis

sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do/ /de nyid las bzlog ste ltag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag

pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar

bsnyams la/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong

ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bo so sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing

bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni

dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni ar+g+ha'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te/ tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor

ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis

las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdud la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i

gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams

pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i'o/ /de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i'o/ /de nyid las slar bkug ste/ mthe bo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o/ /

de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o/ /de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa dpal gyi'o/ /de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o/ /de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i'o/ /de

bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'i'o/ /de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o/ /de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i'o/ /de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni rgya gram mo/ /de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i'o/ /de nyid

las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o/ /bsdams pa nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bdug pa'i'o/ /de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni phreng ba'i'o/ /mdun du mthe bo gnyis bsdams te/ bskor ba ni mar

me'i'o/ /de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i'o/ /de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i'o/ /de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o/ /de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i'o/ /

sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o/ /yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar

bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs

pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po nyon cig /'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na/ mtha' 'khob

pa'i rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan gyis gzir bas ma yang dus las 'das

so/ /lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig tu rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo / /de na drang srong dgos pa med par byams pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag

dang / dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang

rnam par bral ba/ rlung dang grang bas yongs su gdung zhing 'tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnas so snyam par sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug

bsngal gyis bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong gis smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las/ sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cig tsam mam/ yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong bas bskal ba brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med par dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bde ba

'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa yang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong gis smras pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu

'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig /de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smros shig dang / de la kho bo yang skyabs su mchi'o/ /pha ma

la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad na sdig pa ji lta bu zhig thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'thob/ pha ma ma bsad pa dang / srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod

nams ci 'dra ba cig 'thob/ 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob/ de nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci ste sems can chen po khyod/ /nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na/ /

thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshol la/ /gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o/ /de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni/ ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi/ /zab mo'i chos ni nyan par gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag pa/ /thos nas kyang

ni skyabs su song / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos/ /rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur/ /byol song dmyal ba rnams/ /sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams/ /gsod cing shin tu mi bzad pa/ /pha ma gtses

pa'i rgyu las byung / /bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /mgon med skyabs kyang med pa ste/ /thos nas mya ngan zug rngu yis/ /rang gi yid la gdungs pa na/ ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin/ /de nyid du ni dus las 'das/ /las

kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes nas/ /brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi/ /blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /lha rnams kun dang yid mthun zhing / /rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes/ /bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas/ /ngan song du yang ltung bar gyur/ /

de nas da ltar lha dbang po/ /khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni/ /dga' ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog /bde mang kun gyi gnas su skyes/ /lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang / /gang gi tshe sngon byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyed kyis shes par mi bya'o/

bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di nyid do/ /de'i phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis blta bar mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to/ /ma gang yin pa de

ni gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid yin no/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi blta'i/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs

te/ ba spu'i bu ga nas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par bstod de gsol ba btab bo/ /ko Ta ko Ta k+Sha/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta ko Ta/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ko Ti ka /ko la k+Sha/ ko la ba/ ko

la ko la bash+tsa/ ko la sta thA i ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang / /skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don

dang / /phan pa dang bde ba dang / tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ gsang ba'i bdag po bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas

te/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legs so legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu

med pas khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye/

a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te ka ri Ne swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol

bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du

zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do/ /o~M a mi te/ a mi ta ud

b+ha be/ a mi ta sa b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta/ gA mi ni/ sarba karma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka re swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam

par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ /trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha

na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me sarba sa twa nany+tsa swa hA/ 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M rat+ne rat+ne/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na sa~M b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na mA le/ bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M trA Ta/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu

bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam par bcom par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs

'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sarba A ba ra Na/ bi nA sha ni/ ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ /bskyod/ rab

tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do/ /bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste/ /rta

babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya/ de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po/ /phyag

na rdo rje dril bsnams shing / zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni/ /mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya/ lho yi phyogs su rin chen bri/ /nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la/ /byang phyogs su ni gdon mi za/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bzhugs bri/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug

sogs thams cad bri/ /sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ o~M b+ha ga bAn e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas gtso bo byon pa dang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang / /

'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams/ /'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya/ /o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la/ /lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /yang na me tog phreng ba ste/ /de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /o~M pra tIts+tsha badzra hU~M/ de nas

mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ o~M badzra sa ma sa hU~M/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya ste/ o~M badzra hA s+ya ud g+h+ya Ta ya hU~M/ de nas 'di bstan par bya ste/ o~M badzra pa sh+ya ho/ /de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~MhU~M/ o~M

bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M bud d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shin+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ o~M pad+ma ka la sha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa

hrIH/ o~M karma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M/ o~M badzra paT+Ta a ba laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M bud d+ha mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M badzra mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M rat+na mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma mu drA a b+hi

Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ o~M badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M o~M trA~M hrIHaH/ o~M badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH/ o~M badzra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M b+hu~M/ o~M badzra tsakra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M o~M o~M o~M/ trA~M trA~M trA~M/ hrIHhrIHhrIH/ aHaHaH/ o~M badzra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/

o~M ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ o~M pad+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrI/ o~M karma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ o~M ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M badzra gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa

aH/ o~M pradz+nyo pA ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M AH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /o~M b+h+ru~M badzra A yu She hU~M AH/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams

cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum

bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la

rlangs pa'am/ du ba'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ me sgron nam/ 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar sar ram/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa'am/

sha'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu bsgrubs te/ /nang bar sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub

pas 'di la the tshom ni med do/ /mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldob skyen/ lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro/ /lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i

las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i

slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyis shod cig dang / ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi

rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rangs te/ byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M D+h+r-i/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags

skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /

de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /rnam thos bu dge'i lag pa na/ /be con ne'u le thogs pa dang / /rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi can

ldan par bri/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen chu bo 'bab par bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni/ /pi bang len pa brtson pa dang / /mdzes shing kha dog ljang khu ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /

ral gri lag na thogs pa bri/ /nub phyogs su ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor ba la/ /mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya

zhes bya bas/ /sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang / /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /cho ga bzhin du ar+g+ha dbul/ /de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya

'dis/ /slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /bram ze la sogs de bzhin te/ /me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs/ /o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis dor bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra pra tI ts+tsha twaM ma hot+ta ma/ gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni/ /de ni 'dis

'grub gzhan du med/ /de nas grwa na bzhag pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te/ /dang po phyag na rdo rje yis/ /phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de la sogs pa / /dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po

yin ni che bar 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi ba la dbang ba'i mchog /lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / /lan bzhir gzhug par byas na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal po

chen po bzhis/ /bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / /pho brang 'khor du bcas pa yi/ /rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi/ /de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang / /de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi/ /'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa rnams ni gzhom par bgyi/ /

rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi bar bgyi/ /phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ /mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing / /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de

yi ni/ /re dang bsam pa kun bgyi ste/ /ji ste nges pa ma lags na/ /phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur/ /de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad

la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs so/ /legs kyis phul cig /de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams

phul ba/ o~M I/ o~M iM/ o~M a/ o~M ya/ o~M ri/ o~M ba/ o~M ya/ o~M ku/ o~M a/ o~M bra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas su/ /

gzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang / /phag gi gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste/ /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas spyan drangs de kun la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang / /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyogs skyong rang gi

sngags btab pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te/ dbang bskur ba thob pa'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par

dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi phru ma kun gzhom par bgyi/ dus dus su char pa dbab par bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes bcom

ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis kyang 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / mi'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / dang / 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi/ srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus

ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ /dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru Nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyal

po de dang / yul thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi/ kun du bsrung bar bgyi/ 'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/ thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de

nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gis 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad

bskyed par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig

tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang / 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor bar bgyi/ rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi

gnyen dang / rus kyi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ glang dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa la yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de

nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang / rgyal po de dag gi bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu bskyab pa dang /

phan gdags pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs kyi mtshams

gcad pa dang / rdo rdo ra bas bskor pa dang / rdo rje phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams bre bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba

thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub na yang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas par mchis la

bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstab par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyis su byung ba'am/ lan gnyis su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi

bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad du don thams cad grub par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad las dus thams cad du yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad dang / 'khor rgyu skar du

bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ /legs so legs so/ /ngas byin

gyis brlabs kyis/ gza' chen po rnams shod cig de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /o~M A/ o~M so/ o~M aM/ o~M bu/ o~M br-i/ o~M shu/ o~M sa/ o~M rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil

'khor bshad de/ dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o/ /ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o/ /pa ba sangs ni mdun du la/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / g.yon

par gza' lhag bri bar bya/ /me yi phyogs su mig dmar dang / /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan phyogs su spen pa'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba

rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te/ /o~M badzra ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gra ha sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gra ha pra tIts+tsha sa ma

ye hU~M/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags btab pa'i/ /bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la rtag par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus dang / zla tshigs dang / sbyor ba

dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi gcog ste/ dpon

po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gnas thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal

bar 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbul lo/ /klu

chen po rnams legs kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig /de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /o~M phu/ o~M pha/ o~M phU/ o~M phA/ o~M phI/ o~M phe/ o~M phai/ o~M phau/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor

bshad de/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la/ /kha dog dkar po bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs pa yi/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /kar ko Ta dang

ku li ka /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /pad+ma chu lha de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar bar bri/ /sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas par bri/ /bum pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang / /bshos mdzes pa

dang 'byung po yi/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /byas pa rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje bdag nyid zhugs/ /sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug /phud ces bya dang lhan cig tu/ hU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod de/ /de nas bu ni rgyal po dang / /rgyal

rigs thams cad rab bcug nas/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ /spyan

sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams gal te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa rnams la bslus bar gyur na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la

bslus par gyur cig /de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye mas bsregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun du 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkas par gyur cig /rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ byin chen po

dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi/ de'i yul du dug ma mchis par bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par gzhom

par bgyi/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yis/ /dbu la sbrul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas su/ /phud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas

la/ /de nas dug blangs phud ces ni/ /bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang / /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng bas dgang / /de la phud ces bya ba bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud ces bya ba'i rlung gis gtor/ /pags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i/ /

dug rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drangs/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis kyang kun phyin na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs

par byed pa chen po bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis skrag pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skrag pas lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag /rnam par skrag /rab tu skrag

ste/ kha sbub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems kyang stor nas kun du 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'jigs par byed pa chen po legs so

legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed pa bdag nyid dang / lha'i bud med thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig /de nas 'jigs par byed pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /o~M b+hai ra ba b+hI swA hA/ o~M b+hA swA hA/

o~M b+hi swA hA/ o~M b+hU swA hA/ o~M b+he swA hA/ o~M b+hai swA hA/ o~M b+hau swA hA/ o~M b+haM swA hA/ o~M b+haHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni brgyad po de dag bdag gi ngag nyan/ de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa/ /bris nas dbus

su rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro chen 'jig rten gsum las ni/ /rnam rgyal zhes bya gzhag par bya/ /de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'i/ /drag po chen po khros pa ni/ /'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /

bud med rnams dang ldan pa la/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par/ /ci bde bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /bkug ste mgo yi thod pa ni/ /khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang / /

sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor der ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i/ /mchog gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /

bum pa'am mgo yi thod pa ni/ /de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste/ /bud med khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang / /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs

par byed pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas/ /mi 'jigs par ni mgo thod par/ /khrag mchog bkang ste ar+g+ha dbul/ /de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can bud med kyi/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa/ /brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar

'gyur/ /de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba dran byed cing / /sha'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu nas rab tu grub 'gyur nas/ /ci 'dod ces ni smras nas kyang / /mgu

ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /bde chen hU~M gi tshul gyis gsol/ /khu ba bro ba'i btung ba dang / /rdzas dang ral gri 'khor lo dang / /rtse gsum pa dang mtho ris dang / /mi dang sa 'og rgyal po dang / /gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin

dang / /gnod sbyin dbang phyug srin po nyid/ /rig 'dzin nyid dang rig 'dzin gyi/ /'khor los sgyur dang 'jig rten ni/ /gsum gyi bdag dang bka' nyan dang / /rang gi 'khor dang bud med kyi/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ci dga' bar yang sbyin par byed/ /byin

nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na rang gi

brtag pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rang gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /o~M A/ o~M b+hi/ o~M ru/ o~M i/ o~M ka~M/ o~M ga /o~M bri/ o~M

ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thogs bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa bri bya ste/ /g.yon par lag na 'khor lo thogs/ /

g.yas par dbang po rang gi ni/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams/ /'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin te/ /bya dang bum pa gang bar gzhag /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen gzhag /de nas zhugs

nas lha rnams ni/ /mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHlha thams cad/ /dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas 'ongs par mthong ba dang / /dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgyas slob

ma rnams gzhug ste/ /o~M pra tIts+tsha twA~M ma hA sa twa badzra d+hA ra A dz+nyA pa ya o~MhU~M ha ha ha ho/ /me tog cho ga bzhin du dor/ /mig dbye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub rab tu

sbyin par bya/ /'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gnyis sam/ /dang po bsnyen pa byas nas kyang / /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams/ /de dag sgrub bas bsgrub phya ste/ /mtshan gcig la sogs gnas sam ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang ngam/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs

pa'am/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na/ /nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs nas/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /de ni ci bder sbyin bya yis/ /bzang pos myur du soms te smros/ /gang phyir mchog

ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir/ /lha la mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /lha rdzas khu ba bro btung dang / /mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ril bu rdzas dang rgyal la sogs/ /yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas

bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo / /mtho

ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan

las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyi bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar

bgyi'o/ /de'i pha rol gyi dgra kun gzhom par bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / rgyal srid rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/

rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal srid thob pa rnams ni rgyal srid rgyas par bgyi'o/ /gling gcig pa dang / gling gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / mi'i gnas dang / sa'i 'og dang / 'khor los sgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /

mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dod nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/

rab tu g.yos/ /yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dgod rab tu dgod/ yang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing rmad kyi ya

mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu dam par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems

dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams

kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid

chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /rdo rje

'dzin pa legs so legs so/ /gang gi slad du tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe bsring bar bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis nyen pa rnams gang gis dus ma lags par 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song gi

rgyud thams cad las ci nas kyang rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde blag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyis nas myur du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi

ba'i slad du gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang / mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA bu N+ye a pa ri mi tA yuHpu N+ye dz+nyAn saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o/ /o~M hrIHswA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ o~M b+h+rU~M swA hA/ te ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ o~M kru~M swA hA/ /snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i

rig pa'o/ /o~M trA~M swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o/ /o~M hrIM swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/ de yi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang /

gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag ste/ b+h+ru~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ kru~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ trA~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /

rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ hrIM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa rnams bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang / brgyad 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go/ /

bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag ste/ sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis

bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/ mngon sum du mthong nas

de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mnyam par gzhag na de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ o~M badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ mA ti kra ma ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha

ra A t+ma ko \u0f85 haM zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shany+tsi badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hU~M

b+h+ru~M / o~M badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M/ o~M rat+na rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M trA~M/ o~M pad+ma pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIH/ o~M karma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M kruM/ de nas dam tshig dang / bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ /

bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang / /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang zhing / /du smra bar bya ma yin/ /pha rol bud med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya ste/ /de yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing / /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la/ /rdo rje

slob dpon mtshan mi brjod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams la lta smos ci dgos/ /ji ste glen pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma rnams/ /

gom pas 'gom par mi bya'o/ /glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos min ldan dang sdig spyod dang / /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson

dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse ba'i/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni sngags kyis bsad/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor blangs la/ /sems can phongs la sbyin par bya/ /bla ma la ni mchod pa dang / /de ltar dam tshig bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor phyir dang dam tshig

can/ /phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /mchod phyir mi yi dbang po'am/ /phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go/ /sems can rnams la phan spyod pas/ /rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor/ /srog chags srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /du yang ni smra bar bya/ /

sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas/ /thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /

snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na te d+hA s+yA mi gr-ih+na badzra su sid d+ha ye/ o~M badzra tiSh+ya hU~M/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M sarba karma ni ku ru bud d+hA nA ma hU~M/ de

nas bla ma bla ma'i phyir/ /khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /nor dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang / /stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin te/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /

gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni/ /phan par bsams phyir bla mar dbul/ /de nas byang chub bar du ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang / /'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams/ /gang 'dod pa dag bsgrub 'dod pas/ /dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya/ /de

nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan la/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /

rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du/ /sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /ltag 'og ji bzhin du/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang / /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub byas na/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag

'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang dman zhing kho re chung ba phyag dar ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i

rigs ngan gyi skye bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs na de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyi rang la zhus pa de ni legs so legs so/ /

lha'i bu rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams mdor nang la yang de'i yon

tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur kyang grangs su yang mi chog /bgrang bar yang mi chog /dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pos kyang mi bzod do/ /

dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa la sogs par spro'o/ /bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dang /

byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ kye lha'i bu rnams sems can de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig dang / des sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/

bsod nams dang bral ba rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i bu rnams ngan song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming la yang dbang skur cig /gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /mchod rten la yang

dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /chung ngu na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa'am/ bran la yang dbang skur cig dang zhag bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na

gdon mi za bar zhag bdun gyi sa ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ 'bum phrag gsum mam/ 'bum phrag bzhi nas 'bum phrag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas

pa yang rnam par thar bar 'gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi/ /hom khung tha ma bar ma mchog /khru gang khru do khru bzhi pa'i/ /zlum po nyid du byas nas ni/ /de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis/ /brgya phrag stong du bsregs

byas na/ /ngan song kun las rnam par thar/ /de yi sha dang rus pa dang / /skra dang thal ba la sogs pas/ /cho ga de dang 'dra bar ni/ /sbyin sreg byas nas ngan song yang / /kun las rnam par thar bar 'gyur/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar

'bar bri/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang / /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri/ /gza'

dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /gtso bo ri mo lugs ma'ang rung / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag /bya dang bum pa bkang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos rab dkar gzhag /mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkar

po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /ngan song rgyud na gnas pa yi/ /sems can rjes su dran byed cing / /sdig pa'i sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi can/ /'bras yos yungs kar bsres

pa dang / /de yi rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na ming nas smos te bya/ /de ni bde 'gror skyes nas kyang / /mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te/ /khru do pa'am khru bzhi pa/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par/ /byas nas hom khung gru bzhi pa/ /kun du mu ran ldan par

bya/ /de dbus pad ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po ldan par bri/ /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran rnams la chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yi/ /so so'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang / /lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya/ /gos rnams ser por bsgyur

nas kyang / /mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa'i phyir/ /rgyas pa yi ni las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel/ /de nas phan phyir nges par yang / /dbang du bya ba'i las bya na/ /hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs

'dra la/ /khru gang pa'am khru do pa/ /khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su/ /pad ma dmar po bris nas kyang / /de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu yang mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog dmar por bri/ /sngags rdzogs pas ni

rtag par yang / /phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya/ /sems can de yang dran byas te/ /dmar por gyur ba'i gos gyon la/ /me tog dmar ram pad+ma'am/ /'bras bu dmar ram tshon bskus ba'i/ /mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang / /tsan+dan dmar po'i phyi ma yis/ /sbyin sreg

byas na lha la sogs/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam bya ste/ /phyed dang gsum mam khru gsum mam/ /de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya/ /gru gsum pa dang ldan par ni/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu ba/ /rtse gsum

pa dang rgya gram pa'i/ /rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang / /mgo ni rdo rje rtse gsum dang / /dgra sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor/ /phyi rol du yang rim gsum du/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya/ /bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang / /bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag /sha dang khrag gis

bkang ba yi/ /mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag /de yi lus can sdig sogs dang / /bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ /gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsam/ /de nas de yi sdig bcom lus/ /bgegs dang

phral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris 'jig rten mi yi nang / /khams gsum pa na ci bder spyod/ /'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /tshe 'di'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste/ /de nas gang gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun/ /snga

ma ji bzhin de ltar bya/ /des ni sems can thams cad la'ang / /myur du bde skyid myong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can

rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu

dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/ yul dang phyogs dang / rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / /

bye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / zhi ba rnams su bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ grong dang grong

khyer du btsugs la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang / gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam/ bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /

gang du 'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal

po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar

bgyi'o/ /bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsgo ba

thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod

par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /phyag na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs

pa la sogs pa lha rnams chos la rim gro bya bar de ltar dam tshig bcas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni legs so legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig/ //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang /

snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M badzra b+h+ru~M hU~M badzra pA Ni dr-iD+ha tiSh+Tha hU~M o~M hU~M a/ o~M badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M dr-iD+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra hU~M sa/ o~M badzra hU~M aH/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris

la/ dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang ngam bde ba che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la/ /g.yas su phyag na rin chen bsnams/ /phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang phyogs phyag na rgya gram bsnams/ /phyi rol du ni kun bskor

cing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs/ /thub rnams de yi phyi rol

bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ /tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i lha rnams dang / /rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /de yi phyi rol dmyal kun dang / /'dod chags la sogs byol song 'dri/ /sgo

sgor gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /sgo ba stobs kyi dam pa rnams/ /dri rnams lnga yi chus bkang ba/ /gser gyi bum pa 'od can dang / /gtor ma dang ni lha bshos dang / /me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang / /bla re dang

ni rnga mchog dang / /dril bu rdo rje nor bu dang / /do shal nyi zla la sogs brgyan/ /'dod can rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dgang ngo / /de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni/ /spyan drang bdag nyid 'jug par bya/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dbang yang bskur/ /

sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang / /bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs la/ /rigs skyes skyon dang bral ba dang / /ser sna ma lus spangs gyur cing / /yon tan mang por ldan gyur pa/ /gtong dang tshul khrims mang du thos/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems/ /dga' dang btang snyoms

gnas pa dang / /stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems/ /smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i/ /slob ma dam pa sngags 'di yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni gzung bar bya/ /o~M badzra hU~M dzaH/ o~M badzra sa ma ya pra be sha hU~M/

o~M badzra pA Ni pra tIts+tsha badzra sa twa ma hA su kha hU~M/ ha ha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ me tog gi phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ o~M ci ste khyod kyis su yang rung ba la smras na ni phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje 'bar zhing

rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bkas par 'gyur ro/ /o~M badzra sa ma ya dr-i D+ha hU~M a/ de nas 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra tsak+ShuHpa sh+ya ho/ /A dz+nyA pa ya ti pan+na mo k+Sha ya ma ni hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra pA Ni swa yAn+te a nu rak+to a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba badzra a b+hi She ka ta hU~M AH/ o~M bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba bud d+hA a b+hi She ka ta o~M hU~M/ o~M rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba rat+na a b+hi She

ka ta o~M trA~M/ o~M pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta o~M hrIH/ o~M karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba karma a b+hi She ka ta o~M AH/ de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' ma nod par bya'o/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA a b+hi She ka ta o ka na te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+Na badzra pra sid d+ha ye hU~M/ de nas las

thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no/ /bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus su ni/ /kun du bzang ngam bde ba che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang / /snying gar hU~M zhes bya bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /

dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing / /kun tu bzang por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /hU~M las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur na/ /phyag na rdo rje rab dag nyid 'gyur/ /snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor rnam bsgoms

te/ /snying ga'i dbus su phaT ces pa/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /khro bo stobs chen nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje brtan par bdag bsgyur la/ /snying gar o~M zhes bya ba yis/ /bskor ba'i hU~M dang trA~M ldan pa'i/ /bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rjer bsgoms la snying gi ni/ /

dbus su pad+mo zhes bya ba/ o~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /phyag na pad+mo mnyam pa 'gyur/ /'khor lo rgya gram hU~M ldan par/ /a zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang / /o~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bshad bya ste/ /zhi

ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de ltar dbang dang mngon spyod rnams/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgyur la/ /zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing / /cho ga shes pas nang par nyid/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer

sprin gyis de lus la/ /'phro bar gyur par rnam bsgoms te/ /rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis/ /nyes pa thams cad sel bar bsam/ /'di ni sems can phan dga' bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya/ /kun du bzang po'i sku chen nam/ /bde ba chen por bsams nas

kyang / /nang par re re 'od byed na/ /snga ma bzhin du las byas te/ /nang par sngar ni sems can rnams/ /sdig can sems ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'bar ba yi/ /rin chen 'dzin du bsams nas ni/ /bza' ba legs byas nyi ma yi/ /gung la rgyas pa'i las shis
