te/ /rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin/ /'od kyis lus la rab tu dgang / /sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni/ /pad+mo 'dra bar byas nas kyang / /pad+ma 'dzin par bdag bsgyur la/ /bdag dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar/ /bzlas

dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis lus bkang nas/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /'dren pa kun du bzang po yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rab tu bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyas pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no/ /dpal gyi rnam rgyal de bzhin du/ /longs spyod dbang phyug

dpal mnyam med/ /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid dang / /mdog sdug shin tu 'bar ba bya/ /bzhad cing rmad du mdzad pas ni/ /dga' mgu rangs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /pad+mo bzhad pas chos kun ni/ /rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mnyes 'gyur

lha bran smos ci dgos/ /gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshogs mchog rnams/ /rnon pos gcod pa nyid du mdzad/ /gdon dang 'dre rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po bka' nyan dang / /gza' mchog brgyad ni ma rungs rnams/ /'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad/ /lkugs

dang lkugs pa ma yin dang / /glen rnams mi smra smra bar mdzad/ /lce la dzaM zhes bya ba yis/ /ma rungs rnams kyang lkugs par mdzad/ /rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang / /sems can don mdzad thams cad ston/ /hA~M zhes bya bas 'phro mdzad cing / /rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad/ /

hU~M zhes bya ba'i so yis ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang / /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs kun/ /za byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos/ /ma rungs snying gar dam du ni/ /baM zhes bya ba bsams nas kyang / /dug dang rims dang gdon la sogs/ /rdo rje bsdams pas bcing bar mdzad/ /

bzlas dang sbyin sreg las rnams kyis/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad/ /'od zer bsil bas dngos po la/ /rgyas par gyur pas sgom byed cing / /zhi ba'i lha yi rnal 'byor dang / /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi bar bya/ /rang gi lus ni gser bcos dang / /nyi ma gsal

shar dge 'dra bar/ /bsams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ /'od zer sprin gyis dgang bar bya/ /pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /hrIH'dra 'od zer btang ba yis/ /snying la kun du skor byed cing / /'dod pa kun gyi dbang du byed/ /rdo rje hU~M gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /khros nas

rdo rje mtshon cha'i char/ /sdig spyod lus la dbab byas na/ /de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir the tshom thams cad gcod pa

ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i brtag pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do/ /lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te/ hU~M zhes bya ba

dang / a zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis bkang zhing 'phro bar byas te/ mthe bo gnyis la o~M zhes bya ba bsam/ mdzub mo gnyis la hU~M zhes bya ba gzhag /

gung mo gnyis la trA~M zhes bya ba gzhag /srin lag gnyis la hrIHzhes bya ba gzhag /mthe'u chung gnyis la a zhes bya ba gzhag/ de ltar yi ge rnams gzhag pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos pa bskyed de/ chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang /

bdag dang yang rjes su mthun par dran par byas te/ lag pa gnyis pad+ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas o~M zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang / a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hU~M zhes bya ba dang / hrIHzhes bya ba gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya/ trA~M zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs

te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig go/ /de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang / de las rab tu 'khor lo 'dra ba ni 'khor lo'i'o/ /de nyid las khar bzhag pa ni sgra'i ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /de nyid las gnyis su byas

nas las kyir byas na las kyi'o/ /g.yon pa mgo thod thogs 'dra dang / /g.yas pa mdung thung rtse gsum dang / /g.yon pa pad+mo kha 'dzums dang / /g.yas pa o~M zhes bya bar gzhag /g.yon pa 'khor lo bde gsum dang / /a dang o~M gnyis rtse sprad la/ /lhag ma

gsum ni rdo rje can/ /o~M dang hU~M gnyis gzhur byas la/ /lhag ma mdar byas mda' can gyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khor lor bya/ /'od ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal/ /thal mo dam sbyar sor mo 'phro/ /gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs/ /de nyid tshig dbang gsungs

pa ste/ /mchu la tshig 'byung 'dra bar gzhag /pa ba sangs ni bde ldan pa/ /spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin par bya/ /ban glang sna ni chu srin 'dra/ /shes bya rgyu skar me stag 'dra/ /de nyid bskor na glog phreng gi/ /bla 'og gzhag na sprin phyag rgya/ /'di dag

ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag nyid do/ /de nyid las srin lag gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes

bya ba bcings te/ srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni pad+ma las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba dang / hrIHzhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las pad+mo 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /

de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid nang du bkug pa ni khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no/ /de nyid las shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o/ /brkyang ba ni gzi can no/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /hU~M zhes bya

ba gnyis lcags kyur byas pa ni 'gugs pa'o/ /de nyid mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o/ /hU~M dang o~M zhes bya ba gnyis sbyar ba ni dgyes pa'i'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de

nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa'i ya mtshan no/ /thal mo pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad+ma'i'o/ /AHzhes bya ba dang / o~M zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ /gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i'o/ /snga ma las o~M zhes bya ba gnyis khar bzhag

pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/ mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /de nyid bsdus mdud sbrul mgor 'gyur/ /kun tu gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra/ /srin po yi ni khrag 'phrog pa/ /lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste/ /dbyug tor ldan pa gnod sbyin no/ /bum par

gzhag pa nor gyi ste/ /mthe bo sre mo'i sna 'drar bya/ /mgo yi thod pa nag po'i ste/ /b+h+rid+gi ri ti lag brkyang ba/ /pi bang g.yon thogs dri za'i'o/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba/ /gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin rje'i'o/ /rno la khro dang dbang bsgyur ba/ /mthe'u chung ral

gri mdzub zhags pa/ /rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /lag las skye ba skyes par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du/ /pad+mo'i phyag rgya bkra shis te/ /klu rnams shes bya ut+pal/ /de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /srin po rnams kyi

mgo tshal pa/ /bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol/ /gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste/ /ar+g+ha dbul ba rgyu skar rnams/ /de dag kun gyi sems sgrub pa'o/ /mgo bo thod pa khar bzhag pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phra men ma'i/ /mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yir bshad/ /

de dag kun kyang thun mong du/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /thal mo brkyang bar bshad pa ste/ /yang na thal mo pad+mor bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /a zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas

kyang / /hU~M dang a gnyis gshibs te bsgreng / o~M zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'i/ /phyag rgya snang ba byed par dgongs/ /de las a zhes bya ba bcings/ /o~M zhes bya ba nang du gzhug /o~M zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar/ /o~M yang a dang 'dra bar bya/ /trA~M zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni/ /a

dang o~M gnyis lu gu rgyud/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya/ /trA~M zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin no/ /de ltar hU~M zhes bya ba gshibs/ /lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar bya/ /rta mgrin phyag

rgya gang yin pa/ /de yang las rnams kun la gsungs/ /spyan gyi mig dang 'dra bar bshad/ /mA ma kI yi rdo rje 'dra/ /dkar mo pad+ma nyid du bshad/ /ut+pa la ni sgrol mar dgongs/ /sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra

dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa/ hU~M/ dza/ ho/ d+hu/ trA~M/ r+yaM/ b+h+ri/ hA/ hrIH/ d+hIH/ kru~M/ b+ha~M/ ka~M/ ra~M/ k+Sha~M/ sa~M/ o~M bud d+ha lo tsa ne hU~M/ o~M badzra mA ma kI trA~M/ o~M badzra paN+Da re de hi de hi sid d+hi bo d+hi na lo kot+ta ram+bA swA hA/ o~M badzra tA re tu t+tA re tu re

hU~M hU~M hU~M swA swA swA swA hA/ zhi ba'i brdung ba/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ /rgyas pa'i brdung ba/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/

g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ dbang gi brdung ba/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ mngon spyod kyi brdung ba/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/

kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ kha twa~M/ de nas lha rnams kun dga' nas/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal te/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir/ /gsol ba 'debs pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sku bor te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i

skur zhugs nas gnyis su med par mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo me yi rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / o~M badzra satwa kro d+hA na lA rka ma hA badzra kro d+ha dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba bi dra ba/ /sarbA pA ya nA sha ya nA

sha ya/ ha ra ha ra prA NA na hU~M phaT/ o~M trai lo kyA lo ka kA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M trai lo kya da ma ka hU~M phaT/ o~M trai lo kya nA sha na hU~M phaT/ o~M trai lo kya ban+d+ha ka hU~M phaT/ o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la daN+Da hU~M phaT/ o~M kA ni d+hu ni hU~M phaT/ o~M hrIHhU~M phaT/ o~M kA la a~M ku sha hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la pA sha hU~M phaT/

o~M kA la ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la rAk+Sha sa hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la daN+Di hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la rA tri hU~M phaT/ o~M kA la yak+Shi Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa/ /che ba'i mchog ste rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /lha rdzas 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs/ /shin tu

'bar zhing cher 'bar ba/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /'jig rten gsum snang la sogs khro bo kun/ /ma rungs snying gar mnan nas sdigs byed cing / /zhal ni shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan/ /

sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan la/ /stag lpags kyi ni smad g.yogs bgos/ /rgyu ma thogs shing dbu mtha' yas/ /mgo thod shas gang phyag na thogs/ /de ltar bris nas phyi rol du/ /srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag par bya/ /sgo ba rnams ni ji bzhin du/ /rang

gi phyag rgya'i lag mtshan can/ /de nas bdud rtsis gang ba yi/ /bum pa bcu drug gzhag par bya/ /bdug pa me tog dri zhim dang / /mar me dang ni bro snod dang / /kha zas bkang ba'i gtor ma dang / /bza' dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes/ /mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams/ /

dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang / /mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas 'jug /phyag rgya de dang de yis ni/ /sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig stsol/ /de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang / /

de nyid dran byed bsnyen par bya/ /de ni nges par dngos grub ste/ /yud tsam 'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang / /rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam tshig brjod/ /de nas mchod de langs nas kyang / /tshogs spyan rdo rje

sems dpa' yi/ /tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya/ /de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni/ /lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /o~M badzra krod+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ o~M badzra rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra krod+hA na lA rka s+phu Ta ratA pra tIts+tsha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha na ni rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha pA

sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha ra ti sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M phaT/ 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag gis sgrub pa bshad de/ bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /de nas

snying gar nyi ma bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing / /de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su/ /gsod pa yin par bshad mod kyi/ /zhi dang dbang dang

rgyas pa rnams/ /de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing / /mdor ni dug rims gdon la sogs/ /de bzhin de dag thams cad ni/ /thabs la sogs pas

'joms byed pa/ /khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar/ /gsad pa'i las la bsam par bya/ /khros par gyur pa'i rgod ma'i khas/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing / /de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par/ /bsams na nges par brlag par 'gyur/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum

snang mdzad/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing / /'od zer 'byung ba mang po yis/ /khyab par gyur par rnam bsams la/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /'od zer des ni phyung nas kyang / /de yi nad rgas gnod pa rnams/ /zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor/ /de nas hU~M gi

tshig bzhag la/ /rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing / /ha~M gi 'khor los go char bya/ /'od zer chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de yi ming smos shing / /bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya/ /de nas khung bu gsum la rnam cig ni/ /zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la/ /

khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do pa/ /mi rgyal mchog rnams kyi ni gnyis su bsgyur/ /de yi sa rnams rnam par sbyang byas te/ /'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse ltar gyur pa gcig /'od zer dkar po phreng bskor gzi can gzhag /phyag rgya'i tshogs

rnams thams cad bri bya ste/ /rigs brgya la sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing / /rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan rnams/ /phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogs su/ /lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang / /'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya/ /dri zhim

chus bkang mdog 'od dkar 'gyur la/ /dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad/ /dkar gsum gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang / /bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni bla re dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la

sogs gzhag /nang re ga pur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa/ /tsan+dan la sogs pa yi byug pas byug /kha ni shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya'am/ /yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan/ /gos la sogs

dkar phreng ba dkar gyis brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang / /til mar dang ni til nyid dang / /yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang / /'bras chan nas dang gro rnams dang / /me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams/ /ga pur dang ni bsres nas kyang / /

tsan+dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang / /'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la/ /de dag khung bu'i khyad par las/ /rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog /sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste/ /tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes/ /

shin tu chung na sor brgyad de/ /bud shing zho dang ldan pa la/ /dri chus bskus par shes par bya/ /bud shing de las byung ba'i me/ /sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas ni/ /pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dge/ /pad+ma nor bu ril ba thogs/ /lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i

stan steng 'dug /de lta'i me lha bkug nas kyang / /ar+g+ha blangs te dbul bar bya/ /de nas zla rgyas dkar po la/ /bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te/ /pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /bsams nas steng du gzhag par bya/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas kyang / /bsgrub bya rtag tu

mdun bzhag ste/ /de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni/ /shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya/ /nang par sngar ni gtsang 'gyur zhing / /shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la/ /bdud rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin sreg bya/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'/ /lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di/ /dang por me

lha brtag byas la/ /khro bo de ni de lus su/ /spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsams/ /de nas dang po khro bo la/ /bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum/ /de nas me lha nyid la gsum/ /de nas rdo rje

sems dpa' la/ /de nas lha rnams re re la/ /de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul/ /de yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung / /de nas dang po khro bo yi/ /sngags kyis yam shing sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas gcig tu bsres nas kyang / /bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /de

bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu/ /brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya/ /de yi lus la dbang bskur zhing / /mnyam par bzhag pas bsrungs nas kyang / /mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni/ /lha rnams thams cad gshegs

par gsol/ /'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang / /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ci ste de ni sdig can nam/ /gal te mnyam par ma bzhag pas/ /de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /de nas de bzhin byas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar dngos

grub 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i las so/ /'bras bur ldan pa'i nags tshal lam/ /yang na nags sam rgyal po'am/ /rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste/ /khru do yang na khru bzhi pa'am/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de/ /chung mchog bar ma rnams las

gcig /rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin/ /mdor na hom khung bya ba ni/ /stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil 'khor ni/ /chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de/ /bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid/ /mchog la bcu drug yang na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya/ /mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam/ /sum cu

gnyis su bya ba yin/ /phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed/ /pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rin chen dang / /pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya/ /de yi dbus su brko ba ni/ /legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad/ /khru bzhi pa'am khru brgyad pa/ /yang na dpal

bskyed pad+ma 'dra/ /mdor na 'jim pa ser po yis/ /de bzhin khung mchog brkos nas ni/ /gur gum la sogs bskus nas kyang / /de yi dbus su bris nas ni/ /tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang / /gser 'od 'dra bar bsgom par bya/ /de nas tshon ni dmar

ser gyis/ /rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya/ /rim gnyis yang na rim bzhi 'am/ /yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par/ /der ni sgo ba de dag nyid/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya/ /bum pa kha dog

gser 'dra zhing / /dri chus rab tu bkang ba la/ /shin tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam/ /sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste/ /dkri ba'i dar ni ser po la/ /kha rgyan yal ga me tog can/ /dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang / /phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan

'phan la sogs pa dang / /bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan/ /bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang / /me tog la sogs ser pos brgyan/ /byang phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi/ /nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran zhing / /lha yi

yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan/ /btso ma gser gyi 'od dang 'dra/ /de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra/ /gnod sbyin dang ni dzam b+ha la/ /gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing / /yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad pa/ /mdor na de yi 'od zer gyis/ /nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /

de nas rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/ /lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos/ /rgyas par bya phyir de ming nas/ /smos te brgya phrag brgya rtsa brgyad/ /yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste/ /byang phyogs su ni seng ge yi/ /gdan gyi

steng na rin chen dang / /pad+ma nyi zla gdan steng na/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog /rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni/ /phyag ni mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang / /rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing / /

'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis/ /de la shin tu khyab byed bsam/ /dung dang pi bang cang te'u dang / /sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo/ /khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang / /yam

shing bud shing khyad par dbye/ /mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang / /chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin/ /bar ma khru dor shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te/ /me tog 'bras bur bcas rigs kyi/ /ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug /'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang / /

me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni/ /phal cher dpal gyi 'bras bur ldan/ /me lha gser dang 'dra ba la/ /phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin/ /pad+ma gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa/ /spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin sreg bya/ /de yi lus su khro rgyal

po/ /byin can legs par bcug nas ni/ /sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal du/ /sbyin sreg yongs su brtag bya ste/ /'bum mam nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang / /don ni nges par rab tu 'grub/ /'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /

de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis/ /de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya/ /de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /rgyas pa'i las so/ /dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang / /chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya/ /chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje chags pa de las byung / /

khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir/ /pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu chags/ /de bas 'dis ni de dag ni/ /las 'grub par ni bshad pa yin/ /chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis/ /btso blag can nam zla mtshan can/ /khyim du chags pa'i las rnams bya/ /yid dang

mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung / /phyag na pad+ma'i gnas nyid du/ /rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang / /pad+ma ut+pal rdzing bu dang / /ban+du ka yi me tog gnas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni/ /yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa/ /

der ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam/ /de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams/ /byas nas de yi dbus su yang / /hom khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /khru gang yang na khru do'am/ /de ltar khru ni bzhi bar bya/ /gzhu 'dra ba'am pad+mo 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ /mda' 'dra zla ba kham 'dra

dang / /de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /zheng du chu yi phyed kyi tshad/ /zheng gi phyed kyi tshad tsam du/ /hom khung zabs su brko bar bya/ /mu khyud sor ni bzhi par bya/ /nyis 'gyur ba ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /tha ma mchog gi khyad par las/ /yam shing so sor shes par bya/ /yang na yam shing sreg shing ni/ /

tshad ni zhi ba'i las su gsungs/ /shin tu dmar ba'i tsan+dan nam/ /yang na shing dmar gzhan yang rung / /me tog 'bras bu dmar po'am/ /btsag dang tsan+dan rgya skyegs sogs/ /le brgan rtsi dang gur gum gyis/ /mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni/ /yam shing la yang bskus nas ni/ /

yungs kar kha dog dmar po dang / /btsag dang mtshal yang de bzhin du/ /zangs kyi phye dang yungs kar dang / /skye tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru/ /la phug yungs rdog de bzhin te/ /khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams/ /bsreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang / /sngar

bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i/ /khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /ba dang ra las bzhos pa yi/ /bshigs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang / /mar dang til mar rnams kyis dgang / /ga pur la sogs bsgos nas kyang / /bdud rtsis btab ste

gzhag par bya/ /de nas hom khung dmar po la/ /byi ru'i sdong po 'dra bar yang / /bsams nas spos dmar la sogs dang / /gur gum dmar pos byug par bya/ /de nas kha dog dmar po yis/ /stug po nyid du bsku bar bya/ /gur gum ser pos bsres pa yi/ /tshon gyis ri mo bri ba ni/ /

hom khung nang du pad+ma bri/ /de yi steng du mda' bcas gzhu/ /rtag tu hom khung khor yug tu/ /pad+ma nyid ni bri bar bya/ /gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid/ /khor yug tu ni mda' nyid bri/ /gzhu yi phyi rol pad+ma nyid/ /bris nas de yi steng du mda'/ /de yi phyi rol rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu mdar

bcas gzhu bris la/ /lho phyogs rgyal mtshan rin chen dang / /gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo rnams/ /nub phyogs nyid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba go cha mchog /byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams su ni spos la sogs/ /

phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri bya zhing / /me tog dmar po la sogs pas/ /shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de/ /dpal ldan gos dang phreng ba dang / /dmar po'i dri ni bskus nas kyang / /rtag tu thub pa nub bltas la/ /dmar thag ma chad las bya ste/ /pad+ma dmar po'i gdan bsams la/ /

rab chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa la/ /g.yas su bde ba chen po ste/ /bsams na de yi dbus su ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag /rdo rje gzhu dang g.yon 'gying ma/ /me tog dmar rgyan rab dgyes ma/ /dri dmar la sogs rab mchod de/ /

mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du/ /pad+ma dmar dang dbyig bsnams pa'i/ /me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang / /de yi lus su khro rgyal po/ /legs par bcug ste gzhag par bya/ /'od zer chags pas bsgyur nas ni/ /de'i lus rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa bcings pas bkug

nas ni/ /spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag /de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas/ /las byas pa ni gang yin pa/ /des ni lha yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi dang lha min smos ci dgos/ /las rnams zin par gyur pa dang / /chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni/ /de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang / /

de ni bsrungs nas gtang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yis/ /lha rnams mchod de gshegs par gsol/ /de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas/ /dbang gi las so/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha/ /phyag 'tshal yang dang yang du ni/ /rin chen gdugs la sogs

mchog gi/ /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dga' ba'i bsam pas stod byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal

bstod/ /rdo rje'i yan lag rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje'i shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje mtshon cha rdo rje che/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ /rdo rje rnon po rno ba che/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che/ /byang chub sems rgyas rang byung ba/ /rdo

rje'i rgya chen rgya chen te/ /rdo rje'i sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje pad+ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsrung ba che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed/ /rdo rje ro langs ro langs che/ /rdo rje srin po zab bo/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod

sbyin che/ /rdo rje gdon te gdon che'i mchog /'jigs byed dga' byed drag po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' bsgrub pas legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od

gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od stug pas na stug pa che/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mchog /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /ha la ha la

nag po che/ /sgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /rnyog pa'i dus ngan rnam sbyong ba/ /skad cig g.yo ba the tshom gcod/ /glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro/ /rdo rje me ste ma rungs 'dul/ /drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa/ /nyi ma stong gis gdungs ba'i zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs

par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo du ma 'od bzhin 'phro/ /phyag rnams du ma mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal la sku yang stong / /'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil pa la/ /sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma gtogs

'dod rdo rje can/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing dul la dga' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun du bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams

dam pas rnam par brgyan/ /khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po/ /thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang / /gang gis 'di bris bklags gyur tam/ /rtag tu de don 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal

nas/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad

yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shIn+taM gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //dur khrod dag dang shan pa yi/ /khyim dang srin

po'i gnas rnams su/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba/ /thab khung tha ma bar ma mchog /phyed gsum mam khru gsum mam/ /rku dgu pa ni byas pa las/ /stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te/ /gru gsum pa'am mdung rtse 'dra/ /lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni/ /bskus pas thag khung nag por bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu ba/ /nag

po shin tu 'bar ba bri/ /mur na steng du rtse gsum dang / /rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan/ /de yi phyi rol mu khyud la/ /dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri/ /de yi phyi rol keng rus te/ /bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dud sprin mdog 'dra drang srog mchog /mi ro'i steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang / /gzar bu phreng

ba ril bar ldan/ /de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas/ /lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg /shin tu gdug cing tsher mar bcas/ /sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang / /sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang / /rus bye dug dang ske tshe dang / /dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i/ /rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni/ /bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum bsregs

nas/ /de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang / /gnyen dang 'khor rang bran rnams dang / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams/ /spangs te srog dang bral nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad myong bar 'gyur/ /mngon spyod kyi las rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shIn+taM gar+b+ha dang / /lots+tsha ba ban+de dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o// //swa par hi ta b+ha ban+tu// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /sarba durga ti pa ri shod+ha na te dzo rA dza s+ya ta thA ga ta s+yA r+ha te saM mya k+saM bud+d+ha s+ya ka lpai ka de sha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba/

bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad kyi mchog dga' ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ nor bu dang gser gyi shing lo ma dang / yal ga dang / lcug mar bcas pa'i sdong po dang / shing gel pa dang / sman

dang / me tog ka mal dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / me tog kar+Ni kA dang / me tog bak+kul dang / me tog ti la ka dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog man+dA ra ba dang / me tog man+dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas nye bar mdzes pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis yang dag par

brgyan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa/ rnga dang / rnga mu kun+da dang / gling bu dang / rnga b+hi ri la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rnam par rtse ba/ sangs rgyas

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na'o/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

dri za dang / /mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad rnams la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros spobs pa dang / blo gros mi g.yo ba dang /

blo gros yangs pa dang / kun du blo gros dang / blo gros mtha' yas pa dang / kun nas legs pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros ka ma la dang / blo gros chen po dang / /blo gros lha rdzas dang / /blo gros sna tshogs pa dang / blo gros ma lus pa dang / kun du bzang po ste/ de dag la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' yas shing mu med pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ mchod cing rjed par byas/ shin tu phul du byung bar byas te/ 'khor gyi tshogs chen po'i dbus su tshangs pa chen po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing ngan song

thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ma thag nyid du ngan song gsum gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang sdud pa du ma'i phreng ba rang gi mdzod spu nas phyung ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams kun du snang bar byas so/ /kun du snang bar byas pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las bkrol te/ yang dag pa so so so sor thob par byas shing dga' ba'i tshal yang kun du snang bar byas te/ mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par

mchod nas lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas e ma ho sangs rgyas chos/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas mdzad pa shin tu legs/ /gang phyir bdag cag ngan

song yongs su sbyangs/ /byang chub spyod pa nyid la rab tu bzhag /de nas lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun du snang bas ngan song kun

las rnam par bkrol nas rnam par grol ba'i lam la rab tu bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams

kyi tshogs rnams legs par bsags pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab dpag tu med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa tshad med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam

pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po de'i

phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod ji lta ba de ltar sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / gdul bya ji lta ba de ltar sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa yin no/ /zhes shes par bya ba 'di la 'dir

the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis mi bya'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gdul bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po rang gi stan las langs nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya che zhing che ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir dang / snying rje dang bcas par bya ba'i phyir dang / brtse ba chen po dang bcas par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs

pa bskyed du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs pa bskyed du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rigs 'di nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos shing dus las 'das nas dgung bdun lon lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes

shing / bde ba'am sdug bsngal gang myong bar 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de'i dus dang skabs su bab par shes na nyon cig /lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni skabs su bab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen

por skyes te/ der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis su sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /slar yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su lo stong phrag bcur sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /slar yang byol song dang rnams su skyes te lo stong phrag bcur sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /

slar yang mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas su skyes nas/ 'on pa dang / dig pa dang / lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams su lo stong phrag drug cu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /slar yang lo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir nad rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang / mdze dang phol mig gis gzir ba dang /

skye bo mang pos smad pa dang / yongs kyis spangs pa dang / rigs dman par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal nas sdug bsngal du brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur te/ gzhan rnams la yang gnod pa byed cing las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs pa yang rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro/ /slar yang sdug bsngal

rgyud pa gzhan dang gzhan myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams de thos nas dngangs shing skrag ste skyo nas kha bub tu 'gyel to/ /yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyud ma de las ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs

pa ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po de las grol bar 'gyur ba des yongs su skyobs mdzod/ /bde bar gshegs pa yongs su skyobs mdzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu

rtsa bzhis bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig /de nas lha'i dbang pos slar yang bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+dA ra ba dang / /man+dAr ba chen po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan rgyan dang / do shal

dang / do shal phyed pa la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par du mas mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa legs so zhes bya ba legs so'i tshig gis mnyes par byas nas/

bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad pa'i don du gsol ba 'debs lags so/ /de nas slar tshangs pa la sogs pa'i

lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa legs so/ /gang gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam yang thos pa dang ldan na ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol zhing mtho ris lha'i 'jig

rten nam/ mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis

brlab pa'i don du don yod rdo rje'i byin rlabs zhes byA ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /o~M badzrA d+haSh+DI na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zil gyis mi non pa rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ ngan song thams cad yongs su

sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /o~M sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karmA ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ rig pa 'di gsungs ma thag nyid du sems can thams cad ngan song du mi ltung bar byas shing dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi

dgas kyi 'gro ba thams cad sbyangs te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnam par rab tu zhi zhing skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas gzhan yang srung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M sho d+ha ne shod+ha ya sarba a pA yan sarba satwe b+h+yo hU~M/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o/ /o~M sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hU~M phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M trA Ta/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i

snying po'o/ /hU~M/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar byed pa 'di yin te/ na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri shod+ha ni rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+sa~M bung+hA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M shod+ha nA+e shob+ha ne/ bi sho d+ha ne bi sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA baM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A bar Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o/ /o~M sarba bit+sa rbA bar Na bi sho d+ha ya ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba bid+ya swa hU~M/ o~M sarba bid hrI phaT/ o~M sarba bid A/ o~M sarba bid traT/ o~M sarba bdi

o~M/ o~M sarba bdi hU~M/ o~M sarba bid kriM traT/ o~M sarba pad+mi hA badzro d+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dze hU~M/ sgeg mo'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba pid+ma hA badzrod+b+ha ba shI la pA ra mi tA pU dze trA~M/ phreng ba ma'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bid+ma hA badzrod+h+ba ba k+ShA na ti pA ra mi tA pU dze hrI/ glu ma'i sngags so/ /

o~M sarba bad+mi hA badzro d+b+ha ba bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dze aH/ gar ma'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bad+si rbA pA ya bi sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya d+h+yan pA ra mi tA bU dze hU~M hU~M phaT/ bdug pa ma'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bid+sa rba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni kle sho ba kle shats+tshe ni buSh+pa bi lo ki nI pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dze trA~M hU~M phaT/ me tog ma'i sngags so/ /

o~M sarba bad+si rbA pA ya bi shod+ha ne dz+nyA nA lo ka kA ri pra Ni d+hA Na pA ra mi tA pU dze hrIHhU~M phaT/ mar me ma'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bid+sa rbA pA ya gan+d+ha bi nA sha ni/ badzra gan+d+ho pA ya pA ra mi tA bU dze aHhU~M phaT/ dri chab ma'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bid+sa rba na ra ka ga ti m+ba kar+Sha Ni hU~M dzaHla phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags so/ /o~M

sarba bid+sa na ra kod+d+ha ra NI hU~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags so/ /o~M sarba bid+yA sarbA pA ya b+han+d+ha mo tsa ni hU~M baM phaT/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags so/ /o~M sarba b+hid+sa rbA pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi sho d+ha ne hU~M hoHphaT/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags so/ /o~M mai trI ha ra NA ya swA hA/ byams pa'i'o/ /o~M a mo

g+hA mo g+ha dar+sha nihU~M/ mthong ba don yod kyi'o/ /o~M sarbA pA yaM dzaha sarbA pA ya bi sho d+ha ni hU~M/ ngan song kun 'dren gyi'o/ /o~M sarba sho ka ta mo ni r+g+hA ta na ma ti hU~M/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o/ /o~M gan+d+ha ha sti ni hU~M/ sbos kyi glang po'i'o/ /o~M shU raM ga me hU~M/ dpa' bar

'gro ba'i'o/ /o~M ga ga ne ga ga na lo tsa ne hU~M/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o/ /o~M dz+nyA na ke tu dz+nyA na ba ti hU~M/ ye shes tog gi'o/ /o~M a mi ta pra b+he a mi ta ba ti hU~M/ 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /o~M tsan+d+ra s+the tsan+d+ra byA ba lo ki ni hU~M swA hA/ zla 'od kyi'o/ /o~M b+ha dra ba ti b+ha dra pA le swA hA/ bzang skyong

gi'o/ /o~M dzA li ma hA dzA li ni hU~M/ dra ba can gyi 'od kyi'o/ /o~M badzra gar+b+he hU~M/ rdo rje snying po'i'o/ /o~M ak+Sha ye hU~M hU~M/ ak+Sha ya karmA bar Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ /blo gros mi zad pa'i'o/ /o~M pra ti b+hA ne pra ti b+hA na kU Te swA hA/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'i'o/ /o~M sa man+ta b+ha dre hU~M/ kun du

bzang po'i'o/ /bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'di dag rim pa bzhin du brjod do/ /'di dag gis rgyud du ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas nyin re zhing snga ba'i dus su skyed pa'i rim pa bsgom bzhin pas lha'i rnal 'byor ting nge

'dzin gsum mchog 'bad pas bsgoms te/ ngan song yongs su sbyong bar grub par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ gang 'ga'

zhig ming tsam nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa'am/ bris nas kyang mgo'am/ gtsug phud dam/ dpung pa'am/ mgul bar btags te 'chang bar byed na de'i tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang / 'chi ba dang 'brel pa'i rmi lam 'byung ba'am/ ngan song dang

'brel pa'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du yang mi 'byung ngo / /gang 'ga' zhig dkyil 'khor du yang ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs nas dbang bskur te snying po yang zlos shing sngags kyi don sgom par byed na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la sdig pa gang cung zad kyang nye bar mi 'gyur zhing

ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / byol song dang / dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na de dmyal bar

skyes na yang de ma thag nyid du rnam par thar nas lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rigs der skyes par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rigs su rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan du yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad myong

bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la snga ma bzhin du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can rnams ngan song thams cad la rgyab

kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te/ de mgon po shAkya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs pa ni/ dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas skye bos dben pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su/

'jam zhing shin tu 'bol ba'i gdan la 'dug ste/ dri bzang pos maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la/ bdag nyid yi ge hU~M gis rdo rje 'bar ba me nyi mar bsgoms te/ de'i mgrin par yi ge hrI las pad+ma dang de'i steng du

'dab ma'i rtse mor yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje de lce la thim par bya zhing badzra dzi hwa zhes bya'o/ /des rdo rje'i lcer 'gyur zhing sngags zlos pa nus par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su yi ge a dkar po las zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor dang de'i steng du yi ge hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang de gnyis lag pa'i mthil du thim par bya ste rdo rje'i lag par 'gyur zhing phyag rgya 'ching bar nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste/ o~M gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M zhes brjod cing khro bo ti rin ti ri bcing

bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas nas/ /mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis/ /khro bo'i yid kyis dgab bya ba/ /khro bo ti rin ti ri bcing / /de nas rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan gyis 'dug pas rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba gzung bar bya ste/ o~M badzra dzra lA na lA rka hU~M a b+hi

Shin+tsa tu mA~M zhes pas so/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las/ mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba rdo rje bsdams pa'i steng du dgab pa'i tshul du gzung ba ni rdo rje ti rin ti ri'o/ /o~M TuM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis po 'di'i go chas go cha bgos nas/ o~M badzra dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M zhes bya ba sgrogs shing

g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bya ste/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing bgegs thams cad la bsnun no/ /de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste/ o~M badzra dz+wA lA na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hU~M phaT/ zhes brjod cing rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo

rnams nang du 'bar ba la mthe bo rdo rje bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i rjes la badzra ne trI ban+d+ha sarba bi g+h+na di na zhes pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam la bzung ba ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams

pa brkyang ba sa la bzhag ste 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbA~M swA hA zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas steng bcing bar bya ste/ o~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT ces pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor nas mgo bo'i steng du

bzung ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas slar steng bcing bar bya ste/ /o~M badzra yak+Sha hU~M zhes pa 'di dang rdo rje thal mo mthe bo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi

phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ /o~M dru~M b+han+d+ha ha~M zhes pa'o/ /dru~M zhes pa yang ngo / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar la bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /

yang rdo rje zhags pas shar de nyid bcing bar bya ste/ o~M badzra pA sha hrIHzhes pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mkhrig ma mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ /o~M badzra pA tAM ke pa tAM gi ni ra Ta zhes pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pa las

mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis mnyam por gshibs te phye la mthe'u chung ba dan ltar byas pa ni rdo rje ba dan gyi'o/ /phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi bgegs rnams tshar gcad par bya'o/ /rdo rje dus kyis byang phyogs bcings te hrIHbadzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta

zhes pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje dus kyi'o/ /rdo rje rtse mos lho bcings te/ o~M badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta zhes pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul ni rdo rje rtse mo'i'o/ /rdo rje las kyis dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra ba bya'o/ /

hU~M badzra karma zhes pa'o/ /yang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis nang du rab bya ste hU~M zhes pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la rdo rje mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu sgreng ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rdo rje hU~M mdzad

kyi'o/ /'di nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i gur sbyin par bya ste/ badzra ban+d+ha pa~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du rdzogs par bya ste/ o~M badzra

birba dzra tsakra hU~M zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung rdo rje bcing / /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags pa/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /'dis phyogs thams cad du g.yas skor nyid kyis bskor ba las dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul par 'gyur ro/ /

'di nyid khar bzhag nas nges par blta bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgyad bzlas so/ /de yis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mngon sum lta bur blos dmigs la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyogs thams cad du yan lag lnga

pa dang / 'dis phyag bya'o/ /o~M sarba bid+ya kA ya bA k+tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban+da naM ka ro mi zhes pa'o/ /de nas phyag bzhi bya ba ste 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis dang / rdo rje thal mo brkyang bas shar phyogs su phyag byas te/ o~M sarba bit+bU dzo pa s+thA nA yA t+mA naM niR+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra

sa twa a d+hi tiSh+Tha mA~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo rje thal mo snying gar byas te/ lho phyogs su dpral ba sa la reg cing phyag bya ste/ o~M sarba bid+ba dzrA b+hI She kA ya/ A t+mA naM ni R+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+nA b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas de bzhin du langs

la/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste/ nub phyogs su khas la reg cing phyag bya ste/ o~M sarba bit+pU dzA pra brta nA naM ni r+yA tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra brta ya mA~M zhes bya ba 'dis so/ /de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying gar byas la byang phyogs su

spyi bo sa la reg cing phyag bya ste/ o~M sarba bit+pU dzA karma Ne At+mA naM/ /nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mA~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo snying gar byas la sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bya ste/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa dang / lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag

che ge mo zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags

dang / rig pa dang / sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi yang spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa

nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can gyi rigs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ba thams cad la chos kyi

'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /o~M sarba

bit+bu Sh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dras+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ o~M sarba bid+d+hU pa pU me g+ha sa mu dra s+phar Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ /o~M sarba bi dA lo ke pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra sbar Na

sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ /o~M sarba bing+ga n+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /thal mo snyim pa khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ /o~M sarba bidA+o d+h+ya~M ga ra t+nA lang kA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spar Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes

pa'o/ /o~M bid+d+hA s+ya lA s+ya ra ti krI DA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa dang / o~M sarba bi da nu t+ta ra bo d+h+ya lang kA ra was+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rjes su dran par byas nas/ bcom ldan

'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir dang / ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams

dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /o~M sarba bid+yA badzra bo d+hi

tsit+ta pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+phar Nas ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /de nas sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad dang yang dag par ldan zhing phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'dod pa tsam la so sor 'byor par gyur cig /o~M sarba bid+ma hA

badzrod+d+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dras+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las

kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /o~M sarba bi da nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+h+ya hA ra shI la pA ra mi tA pu dza me g+ha sa mu dras+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ glu ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i lus dang

ldan pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing snying dang mig mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /o~M sarba bi da nut+ta ra ma hA d+ha rmA ba bo d+hi k+ShA n+ti pA rA mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spar Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /gar

ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi spyod pa dang mngon par ldan zhing sangs rgyas nyid la mchog tu gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig /o~M sarba bit+saM sA ra pa ri d+yA gA nu t+ta ra bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa

mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /me tog ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par

'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / dbang thams cad phun sam tshogs par 'gyur cig /o~M sarba bi da nut+ta ra sau khya bi hA ra d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /bdug pa ma'i rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ /sems can thams

cad 'jigs rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par thob ste bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang / sbyor ba dang / cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong ba

dang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig /o~M sarba bi da nu t+ta ra kle shats+tshe da sarba d+ha rma sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pra dz+nya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spar Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /mar me ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/

sems can thams cad log par ltung ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /o~M sarba bi t+sa rbA pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka pra Ni d+hA na pA ra ma tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /dri chab ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can thams cad mi shes pa dang bral bar

gyur cig /o~M sarba bit+sa rbA ya gan+d+ha bi nA sa ni badzra gan+d+ho pA ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes pa'o/ /lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin par lhag par

mos pa byas la/ /o~M sarba bid+kA ya ni r+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra sa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes bya'o/ /thams cad du lce brgya pa'i kha yis mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa nye bar spyod pa lhag par mos pa byas la/ /o~M sarba bid+bA g+nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra sma ra Na sa ma ye hU~M

zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs pa gcig pa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid du lhag par mos pa bya ste/ /o~M sarba bid+tsi t+ta ni r+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa'o zhes lhag par mos pa byas la/ /o~M sarba bing+gu h+ya pU dzA me g+ha samu dras+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M zhes bya'o/ /de ltar mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la/ bdag nyid dbul

bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi'o/ /bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la

stsal du gsol zhes bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las

'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /bde ba dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi yi mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos

rnams ston bgyid cing / /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol/ /zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/ sdom pa gzung bar bya ste/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa/ /byang chub

sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum/ /dge ba dang ni chos sdud dang / sems can don byed tshul khrims ni/ /bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum mchog

bla med pa/ /sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor byung / /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsdus la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung / /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen chen po'i rigs

mchog gis/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa/ /byang chub chen po 'byung ba la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las chen rigs ni bsdus

pa la/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bzhin/ /kun nas so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa yang dag bskyed bgyis shing / /sdom pa ma lus gzung bgyis nas/ /ma bsgral

ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bgyi/ sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la lha la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par lhag par mos te/ nye bar spyod pa lnga la

sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /yang dag par mchod nas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan bsngags par byed de/ e ma'o sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog legs so/ /ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas/ /sems can byang chub thob mdzad phyir/ /zhes pa'o/ /

de nas badzra any+dza li zhes pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya ste/ /o~M sarba bid badzra ban+d+ha trAT zhes brjod cing / rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ /o~M tiSh+Sha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba shA shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da ya~M me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hU~M ha ha ha ha hoHzhes bya'o/ /o~M

badzra muSh+Ti ba~M/ sems ma rdo rje bcings nas/ /o~M sarba bita sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA ba ma ba na ya hU~M/ rdo rje bsdams pa brtan bcings nas/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis par nas/ /myur du gyen du legs 'phen la/ /ltung ba slong bar byed pa'i mchog /ces pa'o/ /o~M sarba

bita sarbA pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hU~M phaT/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas nas/ /gung mo dag ni kha sbyar te/ /mtha' ma bzhi po kha sprad pa/ /myur du sdig pa dral bar 'gyur/ /o~M sarba bi ta tAT hU~M/ sems ma rdo rje bcings la/

o~M sarba bita sarbA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni mu ne hU~M phaT/ 'don pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pas snying ga'i dbus su yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i steng du o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ o~M namaHsarba durga ti sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he

sarba karmA bar Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ de dag gis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug ste dkyil 'khor gnyis

kyis dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur pa las dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs shAkya seng ger bsgom mo/ /de nas shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar

yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ /de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul te/ /o~M sarba bid badzra tsakra hU~M zhes pas so/ /sems ma rdo rje bcings nas de nyid kyi sor mo dbus ma gnyis

kyis phreng ba thogs la sa ma ya hU~M zhes pa 'dis yid kyis 'jug go/ /phreng ba de yang rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste/ pra tIts+tsha badzra hoHzhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rang gi mgo bor bcings te/ /o~M pra ti gr-ih+Na s+t+wa mi ma~M sa twa ma hA ba la zhes pa 'dis so/ /gdong pa bcings la yang 'dis

dgrol lo/ /o~M rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de/ /khyed kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa dang / he badzra pA sh+ya zhes pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen por ji srid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de srid du blta'o/ /yang

sems ma rdo rje bcings la thugs kar dgrol zhing rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa nas dbang bskur ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis sbyin pa'o/ /o~M sarba bid+yA badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa'o/ /yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab ste/ /o~M sarba bid+yA

badzra d+ha ra tiSh+Tha badzri Ni hU~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ o~M sarba bid+yA badzra badzri Ni hU~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ o~M sarba bid+yA rat+na badzri Ni hU~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ /o~M sarba bid+yA d+harma badzri Ni hU~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ o~M sarba bid+yA karma badzri Ni hU~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ o~M Tu~M badzra tu Sh+ya hoHyi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la/ de nas rang nyid

rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba gzung bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje yi/ /dbang gis de ring khyod dbang bskur/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje rab tu grub phyir gzung / /o~M badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+wam b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badzra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ /o~M badzra sa twa sta ma b+hi

Shiny+tsa mA~M/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+wa~M d+hA ra yA mi badzra sa twa hi hi hi hi hU~M zhes pa'o/ /o~M sarba bid+yA badzrA d+hiSh+ThA na

sa ma ye hU~M/ bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mthe bong dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung gyen du bsgreng ste kha sbyar nas mdzub mo dang ming med sems dpa'i skyil krung byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / dpral ba dang /

mdzod spu dang / smin mtshams dang / sna dang / rna ba dang / dku dang / pus mo dang / rkang pa dag dang / byin pa dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang bar byin gyis brlab pa yang bya'o/ /de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya aHyi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sa bon las

byung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad kyi snying po'i nga rgyal bskyed cing o~M sarba bid+yA dr-i sh+ya dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M sa ma ya ho/ /o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /thun mong ba yang ngo / /de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH

brjod cing gnas ji lta ba rnams su bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dbang du bya'o/ /rang gi thugs kar hU~M yig ni/ /sbyor bas rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /shAkya seng ge'i dam tshig gi/ /phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya/ /dbus su ting 'dzin mchog gis ni/ /bzhugs pa dam tshig

phyag rgyar bshad/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas la/ /gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dam bcas pa/ /rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid gung mo rin chen dang / /gung mo pad+ma'i rnam pa dang / /de nyid gung mo rdo rje las/ /sor mo lhag ma 'bar byas nyid/ /sor mo

de nyid 'bar byas pa/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las ni srin lag dang / /mthe'u gnyis ni mnyam ste bsgreng / /mdzub mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma las/ /gung mo rdo rje bsgreng ba dang / /de nyid mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /rdo rje dra ba'i tshul du bya/ /snying gar yang ni mthe bo

mnyam/ /rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ma/ /thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung / /gar byed spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin/ /thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bo mnyam ste rab tu bsdam/ /rab tu brkyang ba byug pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /

mdzub mo mthe bong gung mo rnams/ /re re zhing yang phan tshun du/ /mngon du phyogs pa gzung bar bya/ /mdzub mo gcig ni cung zad bkug /mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa bcing / /mthe bo mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing / /rdo rje khu tshur rtse mo bsdam/ /mgrin par pad zla'i dkyil 'khor du/ /chos

kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom/ /sngar gyi 'byin pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /bsams te las kyi phyag rgya bya/ /ji skad bshad pa'i chos 'khor lo/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /sa gnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin dang / /mi

'jigs sbyin sogs rim pa bzhin/ /ting 'dzin mchog tu gnas pa ni/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i lag ngar dbyug pa dang / /g.yon pa snying gar ral gri 'phyar/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng bya ste/ /g.yas pa bteg ste brkyang bar bya/ /lug pa

gnyis ka gar bsdoms nas/ /gdugs kyi rnam par gzhag par bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga gang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas skyob min pa'i yang / /rdo rje bsgyings pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /btags pa'i bsam pas 'dud par bya/ /phreng ba bcing dang kha

nas dbyung / /gar gyis yongs su bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis/ /bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba yis/ /mthe chung la ni lcags sgrog che/ /mkhrig ma mdud cing mdzub gnyis bsnol/ /rgyab dag kyang ni nges par

bsdam/ /de nas de phyir bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i/ /las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /phan tshun lhan cig gshibs nas ni/ /mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dgug /me tog

rnam par gzung bar bya/ /byams pa yi ni phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag la/ /g.yas pa'i dpung pa'i thad kar ni/ /mdzub mo gung mo brkyang nas ni/ /mig gi tshul du gzhag par bya/ /mthong ba don yod phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /

mdzub mo dag ni brkyang nas su/ /g.yas pa lcags kyu legs bzhag pa/ /ngan song thams cad spong ba'i yin/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag la/ /g.yas pa'i dbyig pa lta bur ni/ /gyen du bsgreng nas gzhag par bya/ /mya ngan mun pa kun 'joms kyi'o/ /g.yon pa khu

tshur lte bar gzhag /lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i/ /sna yi tshul du bzhag pa ni/ /spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag ste/ /g.yas pa ral gri thogs pa yi/ /tshul du 'jog par byed pa ni/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon

pa khu tshur snying gar gzhag /g.yas pa steng skor mkha' mdzod kyi/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa/ /rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta bur ni/ /g.yas kyi logs su 'jog byed pa/ /ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bum 'dzin ltar/ /bzhag pa 'od dpag

med pa'i'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur brla steng gzhag /g.yas pa'i khu tshur gzhogs su ni/ /mthe bo mthe chung brkyang byas la/ /zla tshes rnam pa zla 'od kyi'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni snying ga ru/ /pad+ma'i rnam par rnam phye la/ /rtse mo phan tshun sbyar ba ni/ /bzang skyong gi ni phyag

rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /go cha 'dzin pa lta bur ni/ /nu ma gnyis su legs bzhag pa/ /dra ba can 'od phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur gzhag la/ /g.yas pa snying kar bzhag nas ni/ /sor mo dbus ma bsgreng byas la/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya yin/ /

g.yon pa khu tshur snying gar gzhag /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin rnams la/ /blo gros mi zad pa yi'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar gzhag /g.yas pa se gol gtogs pa ni/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur bzhag ste/ /g.yas

pa rin chen khu tshur bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin/ /mtshan ma dang bral cho ga yis/ /las kyi phyag rgyar bshad pa yin/ /snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i/ /gzugs can yang dag gzung bya zhing / /'byin pa rnams su ji ltar gzung / /phyag rgya mtshan ma bsnams pa dag /

rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni/ /thugs kar rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /phyag rgya che zhes byang chub gang / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i/ /'byin pa rnams su ji ltar gzung / /phyag rgya mtshon cha bsnams pa rnams/ /bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang

bcings nas/ /snying po don gyi bzlas pa dang / /rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi rnams sgrub byed pa/ /lha rnams thams cad rgyas btab dang / /kun mkhyen yon tan rdzogs pa dang / /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs

nas/ /sems can byang chub thob bya'i phyir/ /de nas sngags rab bshad bya ste/ /ngan song kun sbyong dkyil 'khor du/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi rab sbyor gyis/ /bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur/ /so so so sor rdo rje gar/ /byas nas sngags rnams brjod par bya/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba

te/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ /ar+ha te saM mya k+sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karmA bar Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu blangs la lag pa g.yas pas rdo

rje 'gying ba dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad ces brjod do/ /badzra bA tsa na Tak+ki hU~M dzaHdzaHdzaHrang gi snying gar bsgreng ste gsal ba'i sbyor bas gzung zhing Tak+ki dzaHhoHzhes brjod do/ /de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang

phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams bltas la mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu mchod do/ /de nas de rnams kyi bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa/ /

shAkya seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mnyam nyid de nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /khams gsum la gnas thams cad la/ /dbang bskur rab

tu gsol mdzad pa/ /rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /so sor kun rtog rang bzhin can/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas/ /sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sems can sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir/ /bya ba rjes sgrub rang

bzhin can/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas/ /sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi/ /bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i

rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas/ /sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug

tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang / /spos dang me

tog mar me ma/ /dri yi lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba/ /sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang bzhugs pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /sgo skyong khyed rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na/ /khyams rnams su ni bzhugs mdzad pa/ /

rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal/ /tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs/ /phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /me dang srin po rlung lha dang / /'byung po'i bdag po khyed phyag 'tshal/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dkyil

'khor mdun du kun bstod nas/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas/ /bstod pa 'di dag yang dag brjod/ /phyi nas rang gi lus la ni/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu gzhug /de ltar nges par bsgom bzhin pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas

dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste/ /o~M a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+ha rmA NA mA d+ya t+pan+na tAta/ de'i don ni rnam par thar pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad stong pa nyid bcu drug tu lhag par mos pa bya ste/ ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid du blta'o/ /de

nas yi ge hU~M las rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge ra~M gyis me'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge ba~M las chu gter chen po dang / de'i steng du yi ge ka~M las gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du dbus su hU~M su~M hU~M zhes bya ba ste/ de las ri rab gru bzhi

pa rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed la/ /o~M badzra dr-i D+ho zhes pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje bsdams pas byin gyis brlab bo/ /de'i steng du rdo rje'i rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+ru~M dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang gru bzhi

ba la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /grwa bzhi rnams ni thams cad du/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba mtshan ma rdo rjes spras/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing / /thig le dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /

nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de'i lte ba'i steng du seng ge'i gdan no/ /de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i nang rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams kyi gnas so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi

gnas ni snam bu rnams la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o/ /seng ge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge a la sogs pa dang / yi ge ka la sogs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi yi ge zhu bar gyur pa mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa byang chub kyi sems

kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don gyi rgyu rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi gzugs su gyur te/ /o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mun ye swA hA/ sngags 'dis dpal shAkya'i rgyal po rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sngags bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin/ /de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste/ /ji ltar pad+ma la chags

pa'i/ /bung ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha phye na/ /bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/ /srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa 'di/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi/ /seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad/ /

de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas sngags rnams 'byung ste/ /o~M na mo b+ha

ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+sa~M bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ /o~M sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karmA ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sngags 'di nges par brjod do/ /de nas de'i phyir ni/ /rim bzhin yang dag rab bshad bya/ o~M

badzra hU~M phaT/ /ba yi sgo nas phyung nas ni/ /kun nas 'od zer lnga par 'thon/ /kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas/ /sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de/ /'od zer rnams ni slar log nas/ /thugs kar zhugs te de rjes la/ /sngags dang
