'od zer gnyis 'dres pa/ /las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ /shar phyogs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs/ /rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /thugs ka las byung bzhugs pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar zhing

'od zer 'bar/ /sa gnon phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/ /de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang / /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags dang 'od zer legs 'dres dang / /sku ni bskyed cing yang dag rdzogs/ /ji bzhin gnas su bzhugs par bya/ /o~M

rat+not+na ma trA~M zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o/ /lho yi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka nas ni des bton nas/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag brgyan/ /sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes/ /'di yi phyag rgya mchog

sbyin nyid/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /sems can kun la dbang skur mdzod/ /sngar bzhin spro dang bsdu ba dang / /gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yis/ /o~M pad+mo t+ta ma hrIHzhes dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i/ /pad stengs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sa

bon 'od zer gyis rdzogs pa'i/ /pad+ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka las ni phyung gyur nas/ /rjes su ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'bar ba/ /bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs/ /o~M bi shwot+ta ma aHzhes dbyung ngo / /byang phyogs rtsibs

gnas pad+ma yi/ /steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thugs ka nas bton sangs rgyas ni/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od 'bar ba/ /'di yi phyag rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin/ /phyag rgyas phrin las sna tshogs mdzad/ /

sems can 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o/ /yi ge o~M gyis sangs rgyas dbyung / /gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs/ /me yi mtshams gnas pad+mar gnas/ /yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas pas nyi ma yang dag bsnams/ /phyag g.yon pa ni dku la gnas/ /sku

mdog dkar dmar 'od kyis ni/ /khams gsum po ni snang bar mdzad/ /hU~M gi sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka las byung phyung nas ni/ /bden bral rtsibs la bzhugs nas ni/ /bdag nas zla ba'i gzugs la yang / /sku mdog

dmar zhing gnag pa la/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /sems can ser sna sbyong mdzad pa/ /d+hIHyig sa bon las rdzogs pa'i/ /gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ /gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibs su phyung / /pad+ma zla ba

la bzhugs shing / /'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas ral gri/ /g.yon na glegs bam bsnams pa ni/ /sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba'o/ /pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs/ /trA~M yig sa bon las byung ba'i/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can rnams kyi

chos kyi rje/ /dbang ldan rtsibs su dbyung bar bya/ /kun+da lta bu'i mdog lta bu/ /'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bsnams pa/ /de kun sna tshogs pad+mar gnas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i/ /o~M trA~M hrIHaH/ sngags de rnams su brjod nas su/ /thugs ka nas kyang

dbyung ba dang / /mtshams kyi gnas ni bzhi po ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sgeg mo la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /rigs kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste/ /dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mdog /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ /sngar bshad ji skad bshad bzhin du/ /sngags de nyid ni

brjod nas su/ /thugs ka nas kyang dbyung bya ste/ /bdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /pad+ma la gnas zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi po/ /thams cad du yang sku mdog ni/ /rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis so/ /o~M sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mut+ga te

swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ /sngags kyis dbyung ste shar gyi sgo'i/ /gzhogs gnyis dag tu gnas pa ni/ /byams pa la sogs gnas bzhi po/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /phyag rgya sku mdog rim pa yang / /byams

pa thugs ni rnam dag pa/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer bzang / /g.yas pa klu shing me tog can/ /g.yon pas spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag g.yas pad+ma spyan can te/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag

pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa yang / /mtshan ni ngan song spong 'joms pa/ /sku mdog dkar po 'od 'bar zhing / /phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can/ /bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun/ /nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te/ /dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang / /de yi

phyag rgya dbyug ba bsnams/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag cing / /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyang / /lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa'o/ /dang po spos kyi glang po yang / /dkar po sngo ba'i sku mdog can/ /'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas

na/ /dri yis dung ni rab tu bkang / /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag la/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong / /gnyis pa dpa' bar 'gro ba mtshon/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab grol mdzad/ /shel gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba/ /'di yi phyag rgya ral gri bsnams/ /g.yon pa'i phyag

ni dkur bzhag nas/ /sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa'o/ /gsum pa nam mkha' mdzod nyid de/ /rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /dkar ser bsres pa'i sku mdog 'od/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na/ /pad+ma la gnas chos kyi mdzod/ /

g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag la/ /nam mkha' nor kun 'chang ba po/ /bzhi pa yang ni ye shes tog /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /sngon po'i mdog can yang dag gsal/ /yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /g.yon

pa'i khu tshur dkur 'jog cing / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dgrol bar mdzad/ /nub sgo'i drung du pad+ma la/ /gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces bya/ /zla ba'i mdog gis rnam par mdzes/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par bsnams/ /cod pan rin

chen phyag gis so/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing / /rgya chen tshe ni stsol ba po/ /gnyis pa'i mtshan ni zla ba'i 'od/ /mi shes pa yi mun pa bsal/ /sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa ni/ /phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis/ /pad+mar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ /

g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag pa'o/ /gsum pa bzang skyong zhes bya ba/ /dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad rab gsal mdzad/ /phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yis/ /rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa yang / /dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od 'bar ba/ /rdo rje'i gur ni bsnams pa can/ /byang sgo'i rtsa bar pad+ma la/ /gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas sras po dang po nyid/ /mtshan ni rdo rje snying po zhes/ /dkar zhing

sngo ba'i mdog dang ldan/ /phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yis/ /ut+pa la ni rdo rjer ldan/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o/ /gnyis pa blo gros zhes pa yi/ /mi zad pa thar yang dag ldan/ /kun du zla ba'i mdog ltar gsal/ /phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis/ /ye shes bum pa

yang dag bsnams/ /sems can thams cad rab tshim mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras po gsum pa yang / /spobs pa brtsegs pa'i tha snyad can/ /sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba/ /phyag rgya phyag g.yas pad+ma la/ /gnas pa'i rin chen phung po nyid/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o/ /

rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi pa ni/ /kun du bzang po zhes bya ste/ /sku mdog ser zhing 'od 'bar ba/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni/ /rin chen snye ma bsnams pa la/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtse

bdag nyid/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ /na ma saHsarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saMmya k+sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karmA ba ra Na bi shud+d+he

swA hA/ /sngags 'dis shAkya'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par bsgom mo/ /de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang bar bya'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas/ /sgo ni dbye bar byas nas su/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /

mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang / /mthe chung lu gu rgyud byas la/ /sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yis/ o~M sarba bid+d+wA rod+g+hA Ta ya hU~M/ sgo dbye ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo dbye'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor yongs su bteg ste/ /o~M sarba bid+ba dzra tsakra hU~M/ lag ngar dag

ni rdo rjer bcings/ /rdo rje se gol rnam grol bas/ /shAkya'i rgyal po sbyor bdag dpal/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /g.yon pa se gol brdabs pa yis/ /mnyam par brdabs par grub par 'gyur/ /g.yas pa yis kyang brdab par gsungs/ /gnyis ka yang

ni sdud pa yin/ /o~M badzra sa mA dzaHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags tsam gyis/ /'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byon 'gyur na/ /gzhan rnams rab 'jug lta ci smos/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bltas la/

rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod na gnas pa'i dri'i chu yis yang dag par bsangs te/ zhal bsil dbul lo/ /de nas mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas zhabs bsil gyi phyag rgyas zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /de nas badzra buSh+pe hU~M/ badzrad+hU pe

hU~M/ badzra dI pe hU~M/ badzra gan+d+he hU~M/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad la/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug go/ /de nas yang phyag rgya dang por sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo / /de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis

chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems ma rdo rje ma dang / rin chen rdo rje ma

dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams spros te dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dpal shAkya'i rgyal po nas brtsams pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste/ dbang bskur ba lnga dang / bdag po ste sa bcu'i mthar thug pa sbyin no/ /dbang bskur

ma thag tu/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pe pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta dI pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas sgeg

mo la sogs pa bzhi yis mchod do/ /rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje'i tshig yi ge brgya pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bzhin bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med snying po'i chos can ni/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /yon tan dngos

grub thams cad mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa/ dri med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams/ /yon tan mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams med do/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam dper gyur pa nyid yod ma yin/ /sems can khams la grub mchog stsol ba rnams la

gsol/ /dngos grub mtha' yas rnams la dpe dang rnam par bral/ /dri med thugs rje brgya pa nyid kyi shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas mnga' ba can/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu

rnam par snang / /'gag med nyid kyi thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum la mchog gi dngos grub stsol ba 'jug /dpag med dpag bral rnams la shin tu rdzogs nyid rdzogs/ /bde ba'i gnas su gshegs kyang e ma'o chos nyid bzang / rtag

tu mchog sbyin nyid de bde 'gro nyid du gshegs/ /mtha' dag 'jig gsum la grub mchog ni stsal ba po/ /bde gshegs dus gsum bsgrod nyid sgrib pa mi mnga' nyid/ dam tshig gsum mchog dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la stsol/ /ces pa dang / thams cad la lce brgya pa'i

kha yis bstod pa nye bar spyod par mos te rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang gtor ma'i cho ga nye bar mkho

ba dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbul lo/ /dpung pa bzang po'i tshigs bcad brjod do/ /dang por se gol la sogs sgras/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis/ /sdig pa'i phung po dgug bya zhing / /yi ge gsum sogs yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /sdig

pa thams cad mnyam por spong / /dgug dang gdon dang bcing ba rnam par gzhom/ /sngags bzhi po rnams legs par sbyar ba ni/ /bdag sogs bsngags te yungs kar dang po brdeg /shi ba'i rus pa gos la rab bkru ba/ /o~M sho d+ha ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni/ /srid gsum

dri ma chu yis bkru bar bya/ /o~M ka~M ka ni zhes sogs sngags kyis ni/ /ba yi rnam pa lnga yis bkru bar bya/ /o~M rat+ne rat+ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni/ /dri rnams ni kun gyis bkru bar bya/ /o~M a mo g+ha A ba ra Na sogs/ /sngags kyis ba yi 'o mas bkru bar bya/ /o~M a mi

te a mi te zhes sogs/ /sngags kyis chang mchog gis kyang bkru par bya/ /o~M pu N+ye sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bar dang bar du chu yis bkru bar bya/ /yang bkra shis kyi glu blang zhing dbang bskur te/ lam sbyang ba bya'o/ /bdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi'i sngags so/ /de

nas 'di yi thab khung ni/ /khru gang tsam la sbyin sreg bya/ /ngan 'gro kun du gnas pa yi/ /sems can de rjes dran byas nas/ /dge ba'i rgyud phyir sdig pa dang / /sgrib pa zhi phyir bsreg bya ste/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras yos nyungs kar

bsres pa dang / /til dang 'bru dang 'bras la sogs/ /bud shing rnams su lag gnyis kyis/ /las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang / /snga ma ji ltar de ltar gyis/ /de yis myur du sems can rnams/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog

ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de dag kyang sems can de la byas pa de nas de dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshegs pa dang ldan par skyes so/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas

pa'i lha rnams snyan grags dang bcas pas gar byed cing / sngags kyi mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas pas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs rnams mdun du bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang /

dri dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyan du ma rnams kyis kyang mdzes shing na bza' dang rin po che'i char la sogs pas kyang dga' ba'i tshal yongs su gang bar byas so/ /de nas ngo mtshar che bar gyur to/ /ngan song thams cad

yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa las brtag pa dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sngags kyi brtag pa'i rgyal po

brtag pa phyi ma gsungs te/ dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/ dgyes pas rdo rje gsor zhing shAkya'i bdag po dgyes pa thub pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad yongs

su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba pa ya bi sho d+ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba karma bar Na ni b+ha smI ku ru hU~M phaT/ /o~M bru~M bi nA sha ya sarbA bar NA nI badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M dru~M bi sho d+ha ya sarba bar Na ni hU~M phaT/ o~M dz+wa la

dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na sarbA bar NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M sru~M sa ras ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sarbA ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M ha ra ha ra sarbA ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ o~M hU~M phaT sarbA ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M br-i ta br-i ta sarbA ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M tra Ta tra Ta sarbA bar NA ni hU~M phaT/ o~M ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sarbA bar NA ni hU~M phaT/

o~M da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa tsa pa tsa sarba bre ta ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ka ga ti he tu~M hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi nye bar mkho ba rnams spyad de/ o~M sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ne puSh+pa bi lo ki ni

hU~M phaT/ o~M sarbA pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hU~M phaT/ o~M sarbA pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha nA sha ni gan+d+ha ba ti hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba na ra ka ga ti A kaR+Sha ni hU~M dzaHphaT/ o~M sarba na ra ked+d+hA ra Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba pa ya b+han+d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hU~M ba~M phaT/ o~M sarba pa ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sa ni hU~M hoHphaT/

de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes/ /lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan/ /nang gi rim pa bris nas ni/ /lte bar shAkya'i dbang po yi/ /bdag po thub pa bri bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni/ /dpa' bo de yi

spyan sngar bri/ /rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba yang / /legs par mngon par bri bar bya/ /g.yas su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bri/ /g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /gzi brjid phung po yang ni mer/ /dbang ldan du ni gdugs dkar po/ /rnam par 'thor ba rlung nyid du/ /rnam par 'joms

pa bden bral bri/ /de nas phyi rol yang dag bri/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi pa shin tu mdzes/ /dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams bzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /de nas me tog

phreng ba dang / /dri sogs rang gi lus la byug /slob dpon 'jug par bya ba ste/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHb+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA dr-i sh+ya hoH/ zhes bya bas lha thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rna par

grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med

par 'gyur ro/ /byab pa byas pas rims thams cad dang gdon la sogs pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i hU~M zhes bya bas las thams cad byed do/ /brtag pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg dang dbang bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas seng ge'i

lta stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya ste/ thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas

dpral bar thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin pa'i phyogs su thal mo kha phye ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o/ /thugs kar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus ma rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /

lag pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang par bzhag la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzlog ste bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid yongs su bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe'u chung dag dang

mthe bong dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying gar gzhag go/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong sbyar te bzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o/ /'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams par

brtan par byas nas/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mor byas la/ mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rab tu brkyang ba'o/ /'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub mo dang ming med pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o/ /'di ni ngan song thams cad

yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang ming med dag rin po che'i rnam par bya'o/ /'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so so so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa

g.yon pa de kho na bzhin du rab tu 'jug pa ni las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /snyim pa gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'og nas 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams la 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid dung 'dra bar

byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid gung mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni ar+g+ha'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te tshigs bar ma bcag nas sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de

nyid mthe bo dang mthe chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi snyim pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid spyi bo'i gnas su bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du

bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste/ lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams

nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo

g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mda' 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang mthe bong rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o/ /de nyid kyi tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o/ /de nyid sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra ba ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /

de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o/ /de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'o/ /de nyid gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gri'o/ /de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o/ /de nyid pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa

ni lce'i'o/ /de nyid rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni sna tshogs kyi'o/ /de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i'o/ /de nyid rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /de nyid dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o/ /de nyid mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'o/ /de nyid rtse mo

gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i'o/ /de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o/ /de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'i'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang / skal ba

chung ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /bdag la gsang ba'i bdag po bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la gzigs

nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar bya ste/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni legs so legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams cad tshe dpag

tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma

hA pu N+ye a pa ra mi tA yuHpu N+yedz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te ka ri Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dang byol song gi 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems

can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to/ /de

nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do/ /o~M a mi te a mi tA/ a mi tod+d+ha

be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi te bi k+r+wan+ta gA mi ni sarba karma kle sha k+Sha ya~M ka ri swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi'o/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams

cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M ka~M ka ni ka~M ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na

pra ti ha na sarba karma pa ra~M pa rA Ni me sarba bat+r+wA nAny+tsa swA hA/ 'di bshad pa tsam gyis thams cad de kho na bzhin da 'gyur ro/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M rat+ne rat+ne/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki rat+ne/ rat+na mA lA bi shud+d+he/ shod+ha ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M traT/ de nas 'di bshad ma

thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'josam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i

gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /o~M a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta sarbA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ bskyod rab tu bskyod yang dag par rab tu bskyod/

bsgul rab tu bsgul yang dag par rab tu bsgul zhing ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan/ /rta babs bzhi dang kun du ldan/ /kha

khyer dang ni sgo khyud bcas/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /rtsibs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po/ /phyag na rdo rje dril bu can/ /zla ba rgyas zhal

'dzum pa bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char/ /gtso bo mi bskyod pa nyid bri/ /lhor ni rin chen bri bya zhing / /nub tu chu skyes pad+ma ste/ /byang du gdon mi za zhes grags/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs

mdzad/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams/ /phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa bri/ /grwa yi cha rnams thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang / /mchog

tu khro bar gzhol ba bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHb+ha ga bAn/ badzra e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas mgon po byon pa la/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /'chi bdag nyid dang sbrul 'jigs pa'i/ /'chi

bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya/ /o~M badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje ti rin+ti ri bcing / /lag na rin chen thogs pa gzhug /yang na me tog phreng ldan pa/ /de dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /o~M pra tI ts+tsha badzra hU~M/ de nas dam tshig sbyin te/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas

'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra hA s+yo t+g+ha TA ya hU~M/ de nas 'dis dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /o~M badzra dr-i sh+ya ho/ /de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te/ o~M badzrA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M bud+d+hA byi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma b+hi Shiny+tsa

aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin te/ o~M badzra ka la shA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M bud+d+ha ka la sha b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na ka la shA b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma ka la shA b+hi Shiny+tsA hrIH/ o~M karma ka la shA b+hi Shiny+ts-i aH/ de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /o~M rat+na mA lA b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M

o~M badzra paT+TA ba la~M ba nA b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M badzra mu drA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M bud+d+ha mu drA b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na mu drA b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma mu drA b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma mu drA b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ o~M badzra nA mA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHaH/ o~M badzra karmA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH/ o~M badzra tsakrA b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+ruM/ o~M badzra tsakrA d+hi

pa d+hi s+t+wa ma b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M o~M o~M/ trA~M trA~M trA~M/ hrIHhrIHhrIH/ aH/ aH/ aH/ o~M badzra d+hA ra N+ya b+hi Shany+tsi hU~M/ o~M ta thA ga ta d+hA ra N+ya b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M rat+na d+ha ra N+ya b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M pad+ma d+hA ra N+ya b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma d+hA ra N+ya b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+yA b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M/ o~M badzra gu

h+yA b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ o~M rat+na gu h+yA b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ o~M pad+ma gu h+yA b+hiShiny+tsa hrIH/ o~M karma gu h+yA b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ o~M pra dz+nyo pA ya sa ma yo gA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin no//o~M b+h+ru~M badzra A yu She hU~M aH/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba

gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas so/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems

shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dri mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad kyang ldang ngo / /dro ba dang du ba dang me yang 'byung ngo / /'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am mar gsar pa'am/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/

zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher

'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro/ /tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/ /mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang

sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang bar zhu/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so shod cig dang / ngas rjes su yi

rang zhing rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ngal bso pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rangs te byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po rang gi snying ga nas phyung la/ o~M bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po

chen po yul 'khor srung gis de kho na bzhin rang gi snying po bshad pa/ /o~M D+h+r-i/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ o~M b+hi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/

o~M k+Sha/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi g.yon pa'i logs su ni/ /ngal bso rnam thos bu dge yi/ /lag na

be con ne'u le/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sbom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi brjid ldan pa bri/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni/ /pi wang sgrogs

par yang dag brtson/ /mdzes shing kha dog ljang gu nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas su dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri/ /nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis

yongs su bskor/ /mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug /'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing / /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /

spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga bzhin/ /de nas slob ma rgyal rigs sam/ /rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang / /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug /

o~M badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra pra tIts+tsha d+hA~M ma ho t+ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de/ /'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de nas grwa na gnas pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te/ /

lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i'o/ /phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya/ /de la sogs pa'i bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur/ /'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi

po yi bdag po mchog /lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / /lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang / /'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang / /yul 'khor pho brang

bcas pa yi/ /rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste/ /de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang / /de yi pha rol sde dang nang / /'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang / /yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi/ /ngal bso pos ni rgyas par bgyid/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid/ /

phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ /mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed/ /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re ba kun dang bsam pa kun/ /bgyi ste gal te ma nges na/ /phyag na rdo rje

bslus pa yin/ /de nas phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rab tu dbul lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs

so/ /de legs par smros shig /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ o~M I/ o~M iM/ o~M a/ o~M ya/ o~M r-i/ o~M baM/ o~M yaM/ o~M ku/ o~M aM/ o~M bA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/

dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs kyi char/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis/ /nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas de kun spyan drangs la/ /mchod pa

kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang / /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyogs skyong la sogs sngags bzlas pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /sgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi

phyogs gnas rnams/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi

bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o/ /dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de

nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden

bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po chen po'i bu dang / bram ze'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i

'jigs pa med pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po

de dang / yul thams cad kun nas so sor bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /klu'i nyes pa rnams pa mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /me tog dang 'bras bu

thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar

bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs su bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan pos/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi'o/ /rang

gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /glang dang / ba dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / glang po

che dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs

dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol du yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa yongs su spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / sa gzhi

bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje'i gur yang bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /dge ba dang

mi dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi'o/ /bsgrub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam mkha' la spyod cing nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal

nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs lam la gnas pa thams cad la bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa mchis te/ bsrung

ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba kun nas bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyi gnas thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos

kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mi'i bdag po dang / rje rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs sam/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / /rigs kyi bu mo dang pa rnams kyi dus thams cad du don bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /

'jigs pa thams cad las kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying

po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ legs so legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig /de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/

o~M A/ o~M so/ o~M aM/ o~M bu/ o~M br-i/ o~M shu/ o~M sa/ o~M rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o/ /mtha' rnams su ni rgya mtsho

chen po bzhi bri'o/ /de yi mdun du pa ba sangs/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya/ /me yi gnas su mig dmar nyid/ /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid/ /srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /

dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /

o~M badzra ha na hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gra he sa ma ye hU~M/ o~M badzra gra ha pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ de nas gza' brgyad sngags ni sngags pa yis/ bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ de nas gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas

gza' chen po dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun du dus thams cad du de kho na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /de nas

rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnams so/ /tshes dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / 'jug phod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis

kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po'i bka' mi bcag cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bskyab par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i

tshe na yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams

'bul lo/ /klu chen po rnams legs so legs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig /de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /o~M phuH/ o~M phuH/ o~M pha~M/ o~M phuH/ o~M phI/ o~M phai/ o~M pho/ o~M phau/ /

de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /kha dog dkar po legs par bri/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhugs pa/ /phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag /sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka bdun/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas

'jog pa de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri/ /sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yi/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri/ /bum pa brgyad

rnams gzhag bya ste/ /gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang / /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bcos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang ngo / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni/ /sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug /phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes brjod do/ /

de nas rgyal po'am rgyal rigs ni/ /de dag thams cad bcug nas su/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das

la phyag 'tshal te/ /spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid

la bslus par gyur cig /de'i tshe bdag bye tshan gyis sregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun du 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig /rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /gzi

byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /me tog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin

pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can/ /klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin

gtso bsams nas ni/ /phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas/ /de nas dug gis zin pa la/ /phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs/ /bsams nas de la phud yig bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud kyi rlung gis

pags pa sha/ /rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug /mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis kyang kun sel na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po'i

bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs pas lha dang klu la sogs pa kun du skrag rnam par skrag ste kha bub tu

'gyel nas gos dang bral te sems stor nas kun du 'phyan pa dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'jigs byed chen po legs so legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed

pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig /de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /o~M b+hai ra ba b+hai ra swA hA/ o~M b+ha swA hA/ o~M b+hi swA hA/ o~M b+hu swA hA/ o~M b+he swA hA/ o~M b+hai swA hA/ o~M b+hau swA hA/ /o~M

b+hA~M swA hA/ o~M b+haHswA hA/ /bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po ni/ /brgyad po de dag gdams ngag nyan/ /de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad bri/ /dbus su phyag na rdo rje ni/ /khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum/ /rnam par rgyal ba

zhes bya gzhag /de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa/ /'jigs byed rnams kyi bdag po che/ /'jigs byed ma dang bcas pa bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang rnams thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par/ /

ci bde bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni/ /khrag gis gang bas mchod nas su/ /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /

mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /mchog gis slob ma rnam gzhug bya/ /thod pa dang ni bum pa yang / /brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas

las rnams sbyin par bya/ /ma mo'i khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul bzhin du ni mchod byas nas/ /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs par byed pa'i sgras/ /bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te/ /mi

'jigs pa ni thod pa ru/ /khrag mchog bkang ba'i ar+g+ha dbul/ /de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can ma mo ni/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed ni/ /brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba

dran byed cing / /sha'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu zhing rab tu 'grub gyur nas/ /ci 'dod smros shig ces bya ba/ /mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa rnams

sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni/ /ral gri 'khor lo rtse gsum dang / /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og dang / /gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid dang / /brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin dbang / /srin po nyid dang rig 'dzin nyid/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los

sgyur ba nyid/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid/ /bka' nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam/ /ma mo'i tshogs rnams ster bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya/ /hU~M gi rnam par mngon phyogs shing / /byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar

byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang na rang gi rtogs pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /o~M A~M/ o~M bi/ o~M ru/ o~M i/ o~M ka~M/ o~M ga /o~M br-i/ o~M ka /de nas de dag gi

dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri/ /g.yon du lag na 'khor lo can/ /g.yas na dbang po rang nyid kyi/ /

phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams/ /chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag /stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen yang / /de nas 'jug bya lha rnams yin/ /mkhas

pas kun nas spyan drang zhing / /dzaHhU~M ba~M hos lha thams cad/ /pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas de rnams gshegs bltas nas/ /dga' ba chen po mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /phyag rgya slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ o~M pra tIts+tsha d+hA~M ma hA sa twa~M

badzra d+ha rA dz+nyA pa ya hU~M ha ha ha ha ho/ me tog ji lta bzhin du dor/ /mig phye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi/ /bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya/ /'bum phrag gcig gam 'bum

phrag gnyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni/ /de rnams sgrub pa po yis 'grub/ /mtshan ma gcig pa la sogs su'am/ /yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ngam/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /

lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub/ /de nas nam phyed na ni lha/ /'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci/ /ji ltar bde zhing phan pa ni/ /sbyin zhes nges par go bar byed/ /bzang po myur du soms te smros/ /gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas

sngags shes dngos grub dang / /mchog gi lha la gsol ba gdab/ /lha rdzas bcud dang bcud len dang / /mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ril bu rgyal srid rdzas la sogs/ /yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bde dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha rnams kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ngo / /mtho ris kyi lam bstan par

bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par

bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa

nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yul

dang phyogs dang grong 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po yang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po thob pa'i rgyal po che bar bgyi'o/ gling gcig dang gling gnyis dang gling gsum dang / gling bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / sa stengs dang / sa 'og gi 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal po rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / khyab 'jug nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /

de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ rab tu g.yos yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dga' rab tu dga'/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang

dag par rab tu rtse zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba du ma yang 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu mthong ngo / /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad

pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig

gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang sngon sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa 'chi bdag gzhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'joms par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyon cig /de nas

bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun du dga' zhing ba spu langs shing phyag btsal nas legs so zhes bya ba rab tu phul te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so legs so/ /gang gis tshe thung ba'i sems can

rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag gis zin pa rnams dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams ngan song las ji ltar grol ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde ba'i

thabs kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur zhing myur ba nyid du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes

tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a ba ri mi hA yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o/ /o~M badzriM

swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /o~M b+h+rU~M swA hA/ snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /o~M krA~M swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o/ /trA~M swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o/ /o~M hrIHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying bo'o/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /dkyil

'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ b+h+rU~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste/ badzriM zhes bya ba'i snying bo'o/ /g.yon du ni khro bo ste/ /

krA~M zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas su nam mkha'i snying po ste/ trAM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /rgyab tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil

'khor la reg par bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go/ /las thams cad pas mngon par bsngags pa yang ngo / bdug pa la sogs gzhag go/ /mchod pa'i dang po can sgo skyong thams cad nyid kyang ngo / /de nas sngags

pa yang dag par 'jug pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang bcas pa 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /rig pa yang bde bar gshegs pa'i g.yon gyi logs su bri'o/ /de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug

la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog so sor 'thob bo/ /gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad

nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di bskyed par bya ste/ o~M badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya mA ti kram/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+hA rA t+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M zhes pa'o/ /de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /o~M

sarba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas phreng ba de mgo la bcings la dbang bskur/ o~M sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shiny+tsa d+hA rA dz+nyA pa ya hU~M b+hU~M/ o~M badzrA b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M b+hU~M/ o~M rat+na b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M trA~M/ o~M pad+ma b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M hrIH/ o~M karma b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M aH/ de nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no/ /de

la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa yong mi spong / /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang nyid/ /yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /pha rol bud med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya zhing / /grib ma'ang 'gom par

mi bya'o/ /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung zhing / /mtshan ma slob dpon spangs pa yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams la yang ga la zhig /gal te rmongs pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mchod rnying lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten

'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma yang / /gom pas bgom par mi bya'o/ /blun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos mi ldan

dang bsreg pa dag /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse bas/ /sngags pas sngags kyis gzhom par bya/ /'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang / /sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin/ /bla ma mchod pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / /de bzhin dam

tshig sgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la/ /mchod pa'i don phyir bsams pa yis/ /nor 'phrog 'jungs pa'i nor yang 'ong / /sems can rnams la phan dga' bas/ /dam tshig dang ni bla ma'i rdzas/ /sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/ /rtag tu ni smra

bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pa yi bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med kyang bsten bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pas/ /thams cad spyod cing kun byas kyang / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying

rje ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur ro/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+Na badzra su sid+d+ha ye/ o~M badzra tiSh+Sha hU~M/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin no/ /o~M sarba karma Ni ku ru bu d+d+hA nAM hU~M/ de nas bla ma bla mar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyi

lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /rta dang bzhon pa nyid dang ni/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni/ /phan pa'i bsam

pas bla mar dbul/ /de nas dngos grub sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni/ /'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rig ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas dad pa'i

sems ldan la/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gis bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam bzhin de bzhin

de nyid kyang / /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du/ /sgrub pa po yis yongs su bsgyur/ /de nas rang gis bon dang / /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /gong 'og ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni

bsgrub bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang / rgyal

po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang dman pa phyag dar pa dang / mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas dang / skye bo'i gnas kyi rigs su skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa

ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so/ /lha'i tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs shing dbang bskur ba dang / bris

pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams mdor na ngal yang de'i phan yon bshad par spro ba med de/ gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur yang

grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi phung po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzod do/ /gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs pa spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling

pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / dmyal ba dang / dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ kye lha'i bu dag de dag ni

dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /bcug nas kyang dbang skur cig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig /de nas sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral ba bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu

rnams gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig /gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /tha na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa dang / bran

la yang dbang skur cig /zhag bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bas/ nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams de'i ming nas smos te/ 'bum phrag gnyis dang / 'bum phrag gsum dang / 'bum phrag bzhi dang / 'bum

phrag brgya stong gi bar du bzlas na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta ci smos/ lha'i bu rnams zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po tha ma dang bar ma dang mchog khru gang dang khru do'am/ khru bzhi pa byas nas de'i ming gis yungs kar dkar

po rnams brgya phrag stong du bsregs na ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sha dang / rus pa dang / skra dang / thal ba la sogs pa la cho ga de bzhin nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs

brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams ni phyi

rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten 'khor rnams kyang / /gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag /bum pa bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos shin tu dkar/ /mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du

bri bar bya/ /dkar po'i gos ni gyon nas su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi/ /sems can de rjes dran byed cing / /sdig pa sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /rgyud dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /'bras yos

yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de yi rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na ming tsam gyis kyang bya/ /de nas bde 'gror skyes nas su/ /mkhas pas rgyas par bya ba ni/ /khru do pa'am khru bzhi pa/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru brgyad par/ /byas nas thab khung khru bzhi pa/ /kun du mu ran dang ldan pa/ /

de dbus pad+ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po can bri zhing / /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran la ni chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yi/ /dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang / /lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya/ /na bza' ser por gyon byas nas/ /

mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa yi/ /don du rgyas pa'i las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /gzi brjid skal ba bzang po 'phel/ /de nas de la phan pa yi/ /dbang du bya ba'i las bya ste/ /thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba/ /khru gang ba'am

khru do pa/ /khru bzhi byas la de dbus su/ /chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su mdar bcas pa'i/ /gzhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu ni mdar bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri/ /sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang / /phyi rol de yi

lha yi bya/ /sems can de ni dran byas la/ /na bza' dmar po gyon pa yi/ /me tog dmar zhing pad+ma yang / /'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa/ /mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang / /tsan+dan dmar po'i phye ma dang / /sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs/ /thams

cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de yi gdon rnams rnam gzhom phyir/ /mngon spyod yang dag brtsam par bya/ /khru do phyed bcas khru gsum mam/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru dgu pa/ /zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum pa yis mu ran bya/ /

sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la/ /dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams/ /rdo rje dgra sta rtse gcig gis/ /phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya/ /rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin brgyan/ /bum pa gtor ma bum pa yang / /zhal zas mang po gzhag par bya/ /sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi/ /

thod pa rnams kyang kun du yang / /de nas gos nag bgos shing khros/ /rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /lus can de yi sdig las sogs/ /de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing / /bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid/ /ji snyed khams

gsum 'jig rten spyod/ /myur du 'di nyid kyis/ /tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya/ /de nas gang gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang / /snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin bya/ /des ni sems can rnams la yang / /myur du

bde skyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang phan yon dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal

po 'di 'dri ba dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyid pa lta ci smos/ gang yang rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu

dang rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjes su slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / skye bo'i gnas dang / 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sogs pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor bar bgyi'o/ /bud med

dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o/ /'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o/ /gang zhig brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa

bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o/ /glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas par shes

par bgyi'o/ /gang na 'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun du bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su

bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir rab ta spyod pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i bdag cag tshangs pa la

sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /mngag gzhug pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o/ /dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor

na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gis mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /phyag

na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun du bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha

rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legs so legs par sgrubs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan

par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /o~M b+h+rU~M dru~M badzra pA Ni dr-i D+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M/ o~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M dr-i D+ha badzra hU~M/ o~M badzra hU~M sa/ o~M badzra hU~M aH/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo

rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang po bde ba che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /g.yas su phyag na rin chen spyan/ /phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri/ /phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /

bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang / /byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni/ /kun dga' bo sogs thub pa bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ /tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang rgyu skar nyi zla dang / /rgyal po

bzhi po rnams dang ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri/ /phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs/ /klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dpe/ /sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du/ /sgo skyong stobs kyi dam pa rnams/ /dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la/ /rab tu 'bad

pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang / /dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no/ /lnga pa de rjes bdun pa dang / /nya gang ba ni khyad par du/ /bsngags te phyag na pad+ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o/ /gang yang drag po'i las rnams la/ /

de ni nag po la yang bri/ /khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang / /zla ba nya ba khyad par du/ /rgyal po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bsngags/ /gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing / /shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste/ /phyogs kyi cha ni

brtag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni/ /yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas/ /'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi/ /rjes mthun rang gi slob nyid kyi/ /slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad/ /de nas nang par rab sngar langs/ /

legs bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang / /blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang / /nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyes/ /khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi/ /dri yi chu yis bsangs pa yi/ /dbus su

rigs rnams snying po yis/ /lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi/ /sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya/ /sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dri yis byas nas su/ /dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du/ /lhag pa de nas bzlas

par bya/ /de rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang / /byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /snying pos skal ba ji lta ba/ /dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa/ /byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing / /mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo / /de nas tsan+dan la sogs pa/ /bsres pa'i chu la

mngon par bsngags/ /de la dbul ba'i me tog dang / /bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin/ /so shing u dum bA ra dang / /a shwat+tha sogs rma med cing / /shin tu phra min sbom pa min/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni/ /dri yi chu yis rab bkrus shing / /me tog phreng ba yis kyang

bcing / /dri la sogs byugs shing bdug /lag pas reg na snying po ni/ /mang po yang ni bzlas bya zhing / /rigs nyid kyis ni lan bdun nam/ /slob ma rnams kyis tshad gzhal bas/ /so shing la sogs yang dag gzung / /gcig la sogs pas bzhin/ /rtse

mo nyid nas bca' bar bya/ /de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis/ /slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni mar byugs pa'i/ /yam shing rnams ni mar dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang / /mar gyi sreg blugs bsreg bya zhing / /zho zan gyi yang sbyin

sreg bya/ /dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir/ /de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin phyir/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cing / /sdig pa zhi bar bya phyir ram/ /de nas slob ma rnam brtags nas/ /cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya/ /de yis ji ltar nus pa yis/ /de bzhin sdom pa gzung bar

bya/ /de rnams cho ga 'di yin te/ /gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni/ /mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la/ /lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya/ /bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin/ /de yi rjes la byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed bya zhing / /bskyed pa slar yang

rjes dran bya/ /de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i/ /chu yis spyi bor bsang gtor bya/ /mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /lag pas dri sbags pa la/ /'jigs pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis/ /

lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig /rta mgrin chu skyes rigs la ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge bcu/ /sum+b+ha zhes bya rdo rje'i rigs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /yi ge hU~M bzhi rnams dang

ldan/ /las kun rab tu spros pa la'o/ /rigs gsum rnams la thun mong ba/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba pa yi bdag pos gsungs/ /las ni thams cad pa yi sngags/ /spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas/ /

bsang gtor yang bya de nyid kyis/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /'bru la sogs pa thams cad ldan/ /cung zad cung zad gang du blugs/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags/ /cho ga bzhin du lhag gnas bya/ /

dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin/ /me tog kyang ni gzhug par bya/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /mkhas pas yang dag yongs su bzlas/ /de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin/ /slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma dam

tshig can rnams ni/ /thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la/ /de nas so shing sbyin par bya/ /slob ma rnams ni bzhin/ /gzung zhing shar du kha bltas te/ /phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'/ /ma gas par ni 'chos nas su/ /logs ma yin par 'dor bya ste/ /so

shing mdun du dor byas pa/ /gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung / /de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya/ /gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang / /de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan/ /dngos grub 'bring du yongs su grags/ /byang du bstan na thad ka nyid/ /rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa/ /

so shing dor ba brgya lam na/ /gang tshe 'og tu kha bltas pa/ /de tshes 'og dngos grub ni/ /'byung ba 'di la the tshom med/ /slob ma nye bar reg pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du gzung byas la/ /thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni/ /bla mas dri chu sbyin no/ /re re la yang btung ba'i

phyir/ /khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas blo ldan langs nas su/ /'di dag kun du spyad par bya/ /de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/ /lag pas spos ni bteg nas su/ /blo ldan gus pas lha rnams la/ /gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya/ /dang por sngags ni snyan

gsan dbab/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /de yi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no/ /bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud/ /slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /nyid kyi dkyil

'khor thugs rje yi/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la/ /bka' drin mdzad par rigs lags so/ /'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha/ /lha dang

'jig rten skyong rnams dang / /'byung po rdzu 'phrul che gang dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams/ /bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba dang / /che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang nyid 'byung ba bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod

kyis/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /rjes su brtse ba nyer bzung nas/ /dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni/ /nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs/ /de skad smras te tshig gang zhig /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bstod pa'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas/ /

de dag gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /chags bral so sor ldan pa yi/ /slob ma rnams la chos bshad bya/ /blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te/ /dge ba'i gnyid kyis nyal du gzhug /de nas snga dro nyid du ni/ /mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong ba dri/ /gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba/ /

dogs med nyin par thos nas su/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni/ /rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig bskyang / /de nas bu khyod dam tshig dang / /sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa/ /dad pas bla ma'i bka' yang bskyang / /khyed kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin mi blang

'dod log dang / /dngos grub 'dod pas mi bya'o/ /chang mi btung zhing sha la sogs/ /bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid/ /sems can kun la gnod mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum yang mi spang zhing / /dus rnams kun du byang chub sems/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /bla

ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /gang las sdig 'gyur de las 'da'/ /de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang / /grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid/ /sngags dang lha la mi smad cing / /gdon gyi las rnams mi bya'o/ /

mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya/ /mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang / /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste/ /rgyud dang lha sogs la de bzhin/ /dad pa brtan pas dam bcas nas/ /sarba bid kyis dbang de bzhin/ /bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /dbang

bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin/ /de nas lag tu rdo rje dang / /dril bu sbyin bya de rjes la/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun/ /bzung nas 'khor los sgyur ba yi/ /rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur zhing / /sngags bsgrub 'dod pa'i slob

ma la/ /rjes su gnang ba nyan du gzhug /de nas bstod pas mgo bo yis/ /phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas/ /bla ma la ni dbul bya ste/ /rin chen gter dang 'bru dang dbyig /gser dang bzhon pa khyim dang gdan/ /bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang / /bud med rnams ni

dbul bya zhing / /grong dang grang khyer ci bzhed rnams/ /rang gi sems ni rab dang bas/ /yon rnams nges par dbul bya zhing / /dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la/ /mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya/ /tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang / /'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog /sangs

rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur te/ /lha yi bde ba lta ci smas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang / /de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /de phyir slob dpon smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang / /gang yang smad par mi bya zhing / /khon par yang ni mi

bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams/ /dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya/ /de lta bu sogs gnod byed la'ang / /de lta nyid do de byas na/ /kun rig gis gsungs dngos grub 'thob/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /dngos

grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs te/ /bri gzhi la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing g.yas su de bzhin gshegs pa ngan

song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang / g.yon du shAkya thub pa dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma can dang / shAkya thub pa'i 'og na phyag na rdo rje dang / de dag gi

dbus su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis a ru ra'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o/ /rta mgrin dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbus su lo tsa

nA dang / /mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o/ /de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yongs su gang bar bri zhing bdug pa
