dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /'og nyid du sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dud par bri'o/ /de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste/ spyan dbye ba byas nas

mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub bo/ /gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o/ /bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / /dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra nyid/ /dge slong bram ze bu mo dang / /'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni/ /mchog 'bring tha ma

myur du 'grub/ /de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang / /sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing / /'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas su/ /bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas/ /ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung

ba/ /'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ /de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sngags kyang chad lhag bskang bya ste/ /brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya/ /de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ /mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas/ /

mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas gal te gtso bo 'am/ sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na/ /de tshe snod 'dod ji lta bar/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis/ /dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol/ /phyag byas

nas ni dngos grub ni/ /mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la/ /rang rang skal ba phul nas su/ /de nas rtag tu bdag nyid spyad/ /de rnams med na shes rab can/ /blangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan brtson zhing / /bskal

pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/ /legs par bsgrubs na thams cad byed/ /gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdong la sogs/ /tshig tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du/ /zhi ba'i las la sogs pa ni/ /thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po dmyal ba la sogs pa'i

dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du nyon cig /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi/ /bum pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin/ /

dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing / /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni/ /kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur/ /sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che/ /de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos bgro thos/ /phyir mi bzlog

pa'i sa la gnas/ /rim gyis byang chub mngon sum byed/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming / /gur gum gyis ni bris nas su/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jig chen las/ /sems can rnams ni thar ba'i phyir/ /sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /brtse bas mngon par

dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags nas su/ /mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni/ /snying ga de yi phyogs bris nas/ /lha mnyam par ni

sems bskyed de/ /khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya/ /de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags/ /gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni/ /'bum ni yongs su rdzogs par bya/ /mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya/ /de

ltar byas na de nges par/ /dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byol song las/ /grol te lha rigs rnams su skyes/ /de yi ming dang spel nas ni/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas/ /gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshang / /bye ba'i bar du

rdzogs par bya/ /lha rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi ming nas spel ba yi/ /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /sbyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni/ /chen po'i sdig pa las grol 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi/ /gnas

su yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /yungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras/ /ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan/ /de bskus yam shing de srid du/ /cho gi ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges par yang / /lha rigs rnams su skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma nye bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /

gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang / /yang na thab khung nang du ni/ /dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang / /gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med/ /'phro ba bsdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang / /glog bzhin dri ma med 'od brtan/ /me rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na me lha bdag nyid

ni/ /de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te/ /zla ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /dkar po bzhin du 'bar ba'o/ /mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la/ /de nas dmyal sogs rnam grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad

du ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin thab khung rko/ /rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten la sogs phyi nas

bri/ /de nas bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag /bza' dang bca' ba zhal zas dang / /me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs

par brgyan/ /de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni/ /mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga shes pas de bris nas/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te/ /sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis/ /ar+g+ha la sogs phul nas ni/ /mdor bsdus mchod pa byas nas su/ /

lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga pur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chan spos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs su

bzlas/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gis sngags kyis btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za la sogs su gnas pa'i/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas su/ /chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni/ /sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya/ /gos

dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng ba la sogs mchod/ /gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du/ /sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya/ /snying ga mgrin pa kha phyogs su/ /sarba bid+yAs byin gyis brlabs/ /dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo spyi gtsug

dpung pa gnyis/ /rna ba dku dang pus mo bol/ /sna yi rtse mo long bu dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni/ /de ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge/ /mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag /de dag ngan song yongs sbyang phyir/ /stan dang bcas te theb dbus gzhag /de nas sngags pas

sngags kyis ni/ /mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs/ /de nas byin za yang dag rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla ba kun+da bzhin du zhi ba'i yid/ /dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag /de bzhin ji ltar gsungs ba'i mchod pa bya/ /de nas dang po de yi

sbyin sreg ni/ /rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni/ /yongs brtags nas ni rgyal ba las/ /sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang / /bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po yi/ /bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag /de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs la/ /

yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum mchod/ /phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi dbu rgyan can/ /bsam par bya zhing yang dag bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po brgya phrag stong ngam ni/ /

ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni/ /de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya/ /de nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang / /ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la/ /sbyong ba'i sngags

ni 'bum bzlas te/ /gong bu byas nas ga pur drir/ /sa dang legs par bsres byas la/ /sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing / /lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga'am/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la/ /'bum

phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam/ /dri spos ngad ldan 'od snang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / /me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang / /dung dang rnga dang gling bu dang / /pi bang la

sogs sgra thos 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mtshan ma de/ /sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong pa/ /de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya/ /de mthar cho ga shes pa yis/ /mtshan gcig

thog thag mi nyal bzlas/ /de nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong / /lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni/ /de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /byams dang

snying rje ldan pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /gal te de yang med gyur na/ /de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis bya/ /de yi ming tsam bris nas su/ /mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang / /sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas su/ /sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/ /gdon

mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /ming spel sngags ni mngon btab nas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor/ /de ltar byas na sdig pa can/ /yin yang ngan song rnams las ni/ /rnam par thar bar gyur nas kyang / /dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni/ /

bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu/ /rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan/ /'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni/ /'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos/ /'di la

the tshom med pa yin/ /gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gi gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems

la mi brten pa dang / /'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab dang thabs med na grol ba med

do zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad do/ /mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do/ /brgya byin gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa

bzhin du byas so/ /'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to/ /dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing

gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ o~M pa shu pa ti nI la kaN+Da u mA prI ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med

dang mdzub mo'ang rdo rje'i rnam par cung zad 'dud par bya'o/ /'di ni phyugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o/ /khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa/ mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma

khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu ma rma bya la zhon pa/ zhal drug pa/ dmar po g.yas pa dag na shak+ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur shes par bya'o/ /mi smra ba rdo rje dang pa la

la zhon pa/ gser mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon

pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba khro bo yang shing rta la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do/ /rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin

cing / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o/ /

rdo rje ska rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che la zhon pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa mdog dkar po'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe

na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ljang gu/ bya ku li ka'i shing rta la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par

te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shak+ti 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang

zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o/ /rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal pa la zhon pa/ mdog dkar po'o/ /phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khar bu

zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po la zhon pa phyag

g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas dar 'dzin pa'o/ /mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o/ /rdo rje me'i pho nya mor skyes la zhon pa mdog dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa

dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed pho nya ma sngon po ro langs la zhon pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/

g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa/ sngon po phag gi gdong pa can/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje nag mo bran mo ro langs kyi bzhon pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/

phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo'o/ /rdo rje log 'dren phran bra ba byi ba zhon pa/ mdog dkar po/ glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs

pa'o/ /rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba zhon pa'o/ /klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa gdengs ka brgyad pa/ mdog dkar po g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje chu srin

ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa/ mdog dkar mo/ gdengs ka brgyad ma/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs mdog ma ljang gu g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo

mdog dkar ser g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas pi bang g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o/ /bgrod ka mdog ljang gu seng ge la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon

pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams

cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o/ /de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin+ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go/ /yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun

dang dung dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hU~M bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo / /ji ltar cho ga

bzhin du yang / /gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang / /mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya/ /'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo

rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams/ /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid/ /o~M badzro t+g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha hU~M zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya yang 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te/ /mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung / /legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ /sgo dbye ba yi cho ga

yi/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po che dang / sman thams

cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas pa/ phyi rol kun du lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i

byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti rin+ti ris yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ /o~M badzro da ka hU~M zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi spyan sngar

legs par bzhag go/ /'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hU~M bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag go/ /de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo / /byi

ru de bzhin sa le sbram/ /dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni/ /rin chen kun te sing g+h+ri dang / /byA g+h+ri gi ri be be re/ /sman kun til nas sran ma sha/ /'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste/ /sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o/ /de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom

pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang yongs su bzlas te sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis gtsug tor bcing ba dang / sgo skyong gis gdong bcing ba dang / rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyis slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin+ti ris me

tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas/ o~M badzra sa ma ya pra be shA mi zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ phreng ba de

dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa bkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ /tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar

dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / phreng ba dang / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la/ me tog

la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang / yi ge hU~M gis gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang smos la/ slar yang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste/ hU~M kA ra

badzra ha~M zhes pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan brjod par bya zhing rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo/ /badzro ha~M zhes bya ba

yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badzra d+hA tu a ha~M zhes pa'o/ /de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu'i bdag nyid dbab pa'o/ /

badzra g+ha N+Do ha~M zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badzra A be sha kro d+ho ha~M zhes bsgom mo/ /de lta bus rdo rje re bsgrub pa yin no/ /de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtogs par byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste/ /o~M

badzra sa mA ya dzaH/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do/ /de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang / rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod do/ /de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste/

bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge hU~M bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa ma

ya s+t+wa~M a ha~M/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/ rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung / /dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags/ /khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa/ /de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya/ /

lag ngar rdo rje kun du bsnol/ /mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid/ /mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang / /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal zhes/ /de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing / /nor bu nyid ni bar ma bskum/ /bsnyams la dbu ma pad+ma nyid/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis

sdigs mdzub/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang / /g.yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o/ /de dag nyid sbyar yi ge hU~M/ legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang / /mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du/ /snying gar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum/ /lag pa mgo

bor rab tu brkyang / /mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can/ /mdzub mo sen mo kun du rig /g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang / /gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid/ /kha las rab mchog thon pa yi/ /mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang / /mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang / /

mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdam/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su/ /snying gar yang na mthe bong mnyam/ /legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma/ /thal

mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung / /gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin/ /thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong bsnyams te nges par bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang ba byug pa yi/ /mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang / /mthe bong gnyis ni mdud

pa bcings/ /mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing / /rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid/ /ces pa'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la hU~M gi rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste/

rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad rin chen hU~M mdzad/ chos kyi hU~M mdzad/ las kyi hU~M mdzad kyi gnas su yang ngo / /de nas rin chen hU~M mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ /o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+hA na ya sarba rat+nA ni hrIHhU~M phaT/ o~M badzra

twIHTh+TIHkro d+ha duSh+Ta mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pA ya sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya gzhan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par blta'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do/ /rdo rje hU~M

mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad bklag par bya'o/ /gzhan rnams rdo rje hU~M mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa yang ma yin te/ rgyud thams cad du hU~M mdzad nges par bstan par yang ma yin no/ /de'i rjes su de kho na bzhin

lce la rdo rje bkod de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod do/ /de rnams kyang hU~M yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can/ t+r+wa~M yig rdo rje'i snying po yi/ /hrIHyi rnam par rdo rje'i sde'i/ /aHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi/ /hU~M sems dpa' rdo rje ma yi/ /

twA~M rin chen rdo rje ma yi/ /hrIHchos kyi rdo rje ma yi/ /aHlas kyi rdo rje ma yi/ /hU~M hU~M/ trA~M trA~M/ hrIHhrIH/ aHaHzhes bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la hU~M/ gzugs mdzes pa la hU~M/ mchod pa thams cad la hU~M/ rab tu

dga' ba la hU~M/ dbus su bgrod pa la hU~M/ legs par gzi mchog la hU~M/ dri mchog la hU~M/ A yA hi dza hU~M/ A hi hU~M hU~M hU~M hi spo Ta baM hU~M g+ha N+Ta a aHhU~M/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o/ /de ma thag tu a'i yi ge

las snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa gnyis byas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo g.yas pas bzung zhing bsgreng ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ster ro/ /gnyis po de dag gis 'gying

ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang sems dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas/ /mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang / /legs so zhes bya snying gar gnas/ /rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba/ /rin chen

hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje khro gnyer dang / khro bo dang / rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma rab tu blta/ /g.yon gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin 'di ni yongs su bzlog /g.yas dang g.yas min rnam par bsnol/ /chos kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje

chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma la ral gri'o/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing / /rdo rje'i gar ni bkrol bas ni/ /'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas/ /las kyi hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje

las dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing / /rdo rje bgyings pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung / /gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /

'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor/ /mthe bo bsnyams te nges par gshibs/ /dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis/ /mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mchog dag bsnol/ /

rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs/ /zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje

ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi skyes pa dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo / /thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin te/ g.yon pa de bzhin

gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rkyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag dang mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o/ /'di ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid de/ de rnams kyi rig pa ljags

rnams la dgod do/ /'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri bya'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rjes su

'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo / /de nyid kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong ba'o/ /mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung zhing rdo rje'i rig pa

mchog 'di ni rdo rje'i dpal zhes grags so/ /de las gzhan ni rab bshad bya/ /sgyu ma rdo rje sogs ming can/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas la/ /g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcing bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun la 'di/ /rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang

byas/ /mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams su'ang dgod par bya/ /mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang / /mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos/ /o~M gyi rnam pa spyi bor gnas/ /rdo rje shugs kyi rab tu gnas/ /rig

pa'i rgyal po'am phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang / /lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du/ /lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas/ /kha las yongs su bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang / /

phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid/ /g.yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang / /ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son/ /tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang / /de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang / /g.yas pas 'bar ba kun du ston/ /rdo rje khu

tshur rab tu 'dar/ /pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse/ /byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor/ /lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang / /rdo rje g.yas pa 'phrog pa'o/ /bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /de nas u ma la sogs pa ma mo'i

tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ /rtse gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya/ /'di bcing ba yi yang dag pa'i/ /dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ /g.yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa/ /cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig

gi/ /phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya/ /'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdam/ /de bzhin bu yi phyag rgya dang / /o~M yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid/ /yi ge rna can yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni/ /'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid/ /'od zer bsdus

pa kho na yang / /dbyug pa khu tshur gzung ba nyid/ /kha las yongs su bskor ba dang / /khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis/ /phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje bcings/ /ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid/ /rtsibs can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'/ /'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams/ /

lag ngar bskum zhing kha phyogs dang / /rgyab nas yongs su bskor ba nyid/ /'od zer 'bar ba grol ba dang / /mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid/ /pho nya'i dam tshig rnams so/ /gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar/ /bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed/ /lag ngar bsnol dang ma

bsnol dang / /de bzhin stobs ni 'phrog pa'o/ /bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no/ /de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i ljags rnams la sngags bkod la yi ge a las rang gi snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi

snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / bskal pa bzang po pa dang phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan

dang phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas pa rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o/ /bum pa gang ba rnams dang / gos zung 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya'am/ re re la re re'am/ thun mong ba'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang / zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan

bcings pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyang yi ge o~M dang / dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad yongs su bzlas la/ badzra s+pha ra Na kha~M zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo/ /me tog gi shing brgya dang / bzhi'am ljon

shing rnams dang me tog thams cad la rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / /o~M badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngags so/ /dri thams cad dang / ngad zhim pa rnams dang / dri ma med pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / /o~M badzra gan+d+he hU~M/

zhes pa 'di dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa yis so/ /ga bur dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ska dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa legs par bsres la/ de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / /o~M badzra d+hU be hU~M/ zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas spos phor 'bum dang / stong phrag

bcu dang stong dang brgya'am/ ji ltar rnyed pa la'o/ /sgron ma 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya'am/ sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i kong bu stong dang / bcu'am bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / /o~M badzra A lo ke hU~M zhes pa

'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la/ /o~M s+phA ra Na kha~M zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o/ /gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya'am/ /bcu'i grangs sam/ bkra shis can dang por bya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza'

ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas te/ a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+ha rmA NA mA d+ya nu t+pa n+na twA ta zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo bcu dang / brgya dang / stong dang / stong phrag bcu dang / rol mo 'bum dang gang yang rung ba la yi ge hU~M dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur

dag gi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rnga mu ra dza dang / rnga mu kun+da dang / 'khar rnga dang / rnga b+hi ri dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga kun dzA dang / rnga ti mi la yi stang stabs so/ /rol mo dang / zlos gar dang /

gar dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge o~M gyis mngon par bsngags te'o/ /de bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang / zla ba phyed pas

nye bar mdzes pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ba lang dang / shing rta rnams 'bul te/ brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo / /rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang / bcas pa rnams kyang badzra s+pha ra Na kha~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /o~M badzra sa twa su sa~M gra hA ta dang / badzra rat+nam

nut+ta ra~M/ badzra d+harma gA ya naiH/ badzra karma ka rod+b+ha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad po rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis

bcings nas/ mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no/ /slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod la/ /khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad

kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ /'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas/ /chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas/ /sran chan bcas shing

snum khu tshur la/ /sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni/ /yang a kA ro mu kha~M zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha

mar dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dang po re zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas spyan drang ngo / /de nas dam tshig bstan no/ /de nas mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ gtor ma dbul lo/ /de nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /

de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing / lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la/ g.yas pa dku'i phyogs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /de'i

mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badzra s+ya di shi di shi badzra pA Ni rok+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i

phyogs su bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam

tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs te/ gcig tu sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ag+na e hi e h+yo hi ka pi la dz+wa la dz+wa la da ha da ha shi khi to li bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par

byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing bsgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gshibs te bsgreng ba snying gar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin

lag sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ya mA ya swA hA/ bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing dri'i rnam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs

su g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas gzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i

phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan

drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni tr-i tr-i phu Ta tr-i tr-i shi

khi to li bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum bar mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo / /lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe

bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni o~M swA sa khA kha kha kha swA hA/ ku be ral mngon du

bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje gung mo

bcing ba'i sbyor bas gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni o~M ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo

sbyar ba bya ste srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te mthe bo zung dag gzhan la brten cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par gzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan

spyan dang pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni dzuM dzuM shi ba swA hA/ g.yon

brgyad ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drag ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las

mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyi sngags ni o~M Ur+d+hAM brah+ma Ne swA hA/ sUR+Ya gra hA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ o~M tsan+d+ra nak+Sha trA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba ste sor mo'i rtse mo rnams

bar mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha mo spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub

mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags rnams ni a d+ho pr-i thi bye swA hA/ a su re b+h+yaHswA hA/ nA ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig /las

kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la/ thams cad gshegs su gsol lo/ /yang na dpung bzang gi ched du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha'i lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po/ /

dri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang / /gang su sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la/ /bdag gi pus mo sa stengs 'dir btsugs nas/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad

du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag

par gnas pa dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas/ /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang par yang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang / /dka' thub gnas dang glang

chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su

rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams/ /dgyes shing mgu bas phreng ba byug pa dri/ /bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis/ /gus 'bul snoms mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig /

las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par bya/ /dbang po rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden

bral srin po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang / /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams/ /dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang

bshes gnyen bcas/ /rang gi skye bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams/ /so sor so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par byon nas ni/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ /me

tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang / /zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang / /gsol mdzod snoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de la 'di ni phyi dang nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu

dbul ba'i sngags te/ a kA ro mu kha~M sa rba d+ha rmA NA mA d+ya nu twan twA ta zhes pa'o/ /de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyogs te gnas pa la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags

brjod cing me tog dmar pos nges par bkod la sbyin sreg gi tshogs dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi sngags kyis ba'i mar gyis sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags nas rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par kyang sreg blugs bdun bdun

slar yang ngo / /de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gnas su dgod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la

bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ /'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang /

dam tshig la mi 'da' ba dang / sngags spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang /

glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba

thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i

bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dam pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo / /

bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / sa rnams la 'bad pas nyon

mongs par 'gyur bdag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba yang ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par

bya ste/ de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge slong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su gzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod/ /byang chub

chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod

g.yogs smad g.yogs dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go/ /yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis

bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba/ /slob dpon

dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo 'byung ba yi/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o/ /gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i

dbang bskur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag

ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge mo zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /gsang ba yis ni 'khor lo 'dir/ /'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal/ /

de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung / /byang chub

sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa ni/ /nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo

gsum/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab sbyin bya/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la/ /

sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bzhin/ /yang dag nyid du nges gzung gyis/ /de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang / /'di dag phas pham par ni bshad/ /mi spang dor bar yang mi bya/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do/ /nyin mo gsum dang

mtshan gsum du/ nyin re zhing ni brjod par bya/ /gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /ltung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun

gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni btung ba rnam par spang / /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi

rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus pas ni rjes su bskyang / /theg pa dman la dga' mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang / /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyed kyis brnyas pa mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya

bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom pa yang mi bya/ /'di dag dam tshig zhes bshad do/ /de dag ni/ /blo gros khyed kyis bsrung bar bya/ /des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya/ /slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid

par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /zhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam sbyin par bya zhing deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi

bya ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o/ /de nas o~M sarba yo ga tsi ta mut+pA da yA mi zhes pa 'dis/ byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /de yi snying gar snying pos ni/ /rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya/ /su ra ta sa

ma ya s+t+wa~M hoHbadzra sid+d+hi ya thA su kha~M zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la/

o~M gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M zhes pa 'dis khro ti rin+ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go/ /rdo rje bsdams pa na nga byas la/ /mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis/ /yid kyi khro bas dga' bya bas/ /khro bo ti rin+ti ri dran/ /de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin

du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ badzras ma ya~M bra ti sh+yA mi zhes pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhug go/ /nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo/ /yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di

skad ces brjod do/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyis deng nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya'i/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil

'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /khyod dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti rin+ti ri kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ gal

te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/ /de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod/ /

gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /badzra ung+ka ThaHzhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma

byed cig /khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re zhes pa'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ hU~M trA~M hrIHaHzhes pa 'di dag gi bzhin du'o/ /sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying gar phye la rang gi snying gar yi ge ya~M las yi ge phyung la slob

ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo/ /'di skad ces brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab tu gsol zhes smros shig /de nas myur du rdo

rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin+ti ri bcings la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ 'di de dam tshig rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /khyod la de nyid 'bab gyur cig /badzra A be sha AHzhes pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang /

lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing 'di dag brjod de/ o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA

ba ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra bi d+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ aHaHaHaHaH/ bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung

gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje hU~M gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo/ /slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa

mnan la steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hU~M gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / hU~M gi rnam pas brdeg bzhin pa dang / de bzhin

du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis hU~M trA~M hrIHaHzhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste/ hU~M badzra A be sha ya aHzhes rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /gal

te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du dral bar bya'o/ /yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyi me/ /rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dbul ba yis/ /de yi sdig pa thams cad ni/ /

til gyi sbyin sreg des nges bsreg /o~M sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ yi ge hU~M dbus su bsams te/ mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg

gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus kyi sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la de nas yang rdo rje babs pa de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bya ste/ nges par 'bebs par 'gyur/ de lta bus kyang gang la bab par ma gyur pa de

la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o/ /babs na skad cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang o~M badzra sa twa su sa~M gra hA ta zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu brjod la/ khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje

me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o/ /de phebs na rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de'i tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de lta

bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la bru hi badzra zhes pa brjod do/ /de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te/ /bra tI ts+tsha hoHzhes bya'o/ /de nas gang du babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo/ /de nas o~M pra ti gr-ih+Na twa~M i ma~M sa twa

ma hA ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor bcing ngo / /de nas o~M de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang / /khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur/ /he badzra pA sh+ya zhes pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje

lcags kyu nas brtsams te ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan no/ /de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas slob ma snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du'am/ phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par phyogs pa legs par bris la slob ma dpal rdo rje

hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskur ro/ /dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ mchod yon dbul/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrag pa dang / de nas bkra

shis kyi tshigs bcad rnams kyis mngon par dga' bas dang po re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gis dbang bskur bdag gis dbang bskur la yang me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod do/ /slob ma rnams

kyis rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab tu btud la yon gyi mchog phul la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang gzung bar bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ni dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgyas de kho na bzhin du ji ltar nges par bstan pa'i gnas su bzhag la de tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i lus

la dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad la sogs pa bkod de slar yang / o~M badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+wa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi dr-i D+ho me b+h+ya ba dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHhU~M phaT zhes pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ de nas o~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gyis

rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs la chu'i dbang bskur ba byin no/ /'di yang brjod de/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /dkyil 'khor can min na mi smra/ /skye bo

'dus pa gnas pa ni/ /dgod dang ma dad pa la min/ /de nas cho ga thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad lung bstan no/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'byung ste/

slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o/ /'di yi las kyi dngos grub ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang / /tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni/ /ma lus nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchog gi sa rnams bgegs med 'grub/ /dngos grub phran tshegs

slar ci zhig /sangs rgyas nyid kyang sems can nyid/ /rdo rje sems nyid rnyed mi dka'/ /gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang / /gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang / /'chi bdag dang ni bdud sde rnams/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos rno/ /dngos grub las 'joms de dag ni/ /bdag

nyid chen po de la ni/ /mi 'byung skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis/ /nges par dngos grub myur rab 'byung / /lha rnams kyang ni cher mnyes shing / /skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur/ /yams dang nyer 'tshe skyon la sogs/ /ches lci nges par ring du 'gyur/ /de yi yul du nad dang gdon/ /rims la sogs pa

mi 'byung zhing / /mu ge ca co che rnams dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur/ /lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis/ /bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rgyu skar bcas/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis skyong / /de nas brgya

byin la sogs lhas/ /yang dang yang du phyag btsal nas/ /rin chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te/ /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje

rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon cha che/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ /rdo rje rnon po rnon po che/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /rdo rje pad+ma

byang chub che/ /byang chub sangs rgyas rang byung ba/ /rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen che/ /rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje pad+ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje khro bo gtum po che/ /rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed/ /rdo rje ro langs ro langs che/ /rdo rje srin po za ba

po/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog /'jigs rung skrag byed ma rungs pa/ /drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od gshin rje

mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od mthug pa ni mthug pa che/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /ha la ha la nag po che/ /sgra chen rnam par sgeg pa po/ /

rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po/ /dus kyi g.yo ba gcod pa'i mchog /zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma/ /rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum/ /gtum pa'i rab snang 'joms pa po/ /nyi ma stong gi 'od zer zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo du ma'i 'od 'phro ba/ /phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal

te sku yang stong / /'khyil zhing sku yang 'khyil pa lags/ /thugs chos bdag nyid sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /ma rig 'joms pa tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can/ /mdung can rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog byed/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min

rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing dul la dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje legs skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun du bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po/ /khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa po/ /thams cad rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang / /

gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang / /rtag tu don ni 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa

phan pa dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po

bla ma rje btsun chen po de ben+d+ra de ba'i zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes

bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu btsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i gdings su tshar bar bgyis so/ /dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /brtag pa phyogs

gcig sngar grags kha che nas/ /chos rgyal sku drin paN chen sgra bsgyur mchog /skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad/ /'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang / rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi/ /man ngag la brten rgya gar bal po na/ /yongs grags bla
ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur/ /sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du/ /gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ /bzod mdzad de dges 'gro ba kun/ /'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig/ //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ su pra tiSh+Tha tan+t+ra sa~M gra ha/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam

tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas brdungs pa dang / bris pa dang / 'bur du byas pa la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing / /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/ /

las rnams kun la mkhas pas so/ /sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ /zhi ba la sogs ro yis ldan/ /tshad kyis tshad la bab cing bzang / /de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ /yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang / /khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su/ /sangs rgyas

la sogs rab gnas ni/ /cho ga dag dang ldan byas la/ /cho ga dman pas mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis/ /'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya/ /

cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis/ /brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pa/ /des byas bsod nams che ba yin/ /mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye/ /sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /de la byin rlabs 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/ /byin ma

brlabs par ring gnas na/ /de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing / /ji srid mchod pa der mi 'os/ /dper na skyes bu la la zhig /rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/ /'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed/ /de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de/ /rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ /

gang gis mchod cing phyag byed pa/ /dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas/ /sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs/ /de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas/ /chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang / /de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /skye ba ru ni mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa la ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu bzhugs/ /rab tu gnas pa gang na'ang

med/ /kun du mkha' ltar gnas pa la/ /cig shos kyis ni rab tu brtags/ /'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas/ /rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtag /dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na/ /gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab/ /gzod ma nas ni skye med la/ /ci 'dra ji ltar rab tu gnas/ /

dang po'i las can sems can rnams/ /rtogs pa'i rgyu ru mdzad par zad/ /dang po re zhig yongs su brtags pa'i gnas yongs su sbyangs par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang / ba dan bsgreng ba rnams su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs pas gsol ba btab pa'i bla ma spos

dang me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas tshes dang rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam par gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel pa yin la/ de dang rab tu 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas

sa yongs su gzung zhing thig gdab pa dang / rdul tshon gyi las dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i gter du nor bu'am/ sor gdub bcug la/ de nas lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma dang por bcug la/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog

dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i skur bltas la/ lha la mngon par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing / ji ltar 'byor pa'i me tog gi thal mo dang dri chu gtsang mas cho ga bzhin du brtags la/ ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas/ /zhal bsil me tog spos sogs ldan/ /

rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sngags 'di yis/ /lan gsum bar du brjod par bya'o/ /o~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M sa ma ya ho a ha~M/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las/ /lha mo sgyu

'phrul lhums zhugs ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig /'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /che ge mo yi don slad du/ /bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni/ /ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs 'di

bzhes shig /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /rjes su brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ /kun gyis 'di la byin brlab cing / /de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ /sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la/ /de nas rtag par mnyam par brtsam/ /slob ma smyung bar gnas pa

yis/ /de ltar thams cad spyad byas la/ /sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs/ /bla ma yis ni gang bsgo ba/ /ma tshogs pa kun bsgrub par bya/ /mchod sbyin 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab/ /gdan la bstim byas mchod yon dang / /

mchod pa gtor ma spos me tog /de bzhin du ni mar me dag /sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar bya/ /sku gzugs mdun du phyag byas la/ /na bza' ser pos g.yog bya zhing / /de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba/ /khyad par du ni bdug par bya/ /de dag bsgrub phyir de la ni/ /de

la lan cig gtor bya ba/ /de dang de la sngags 'dis ni/ /me dang de nas chu la gtor/ o~M sarba pa pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya bas so/ /de nas/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste/ /de nas gnas gsum rnams su bstim/ /o~M hU~M AHyi yi

ge gsum/ o~M ni spyi bor bstim bya zhing / /snying gar hU~M gi yi ger 'gyur/ /ngag gi phyogs su AHyig go/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya/ /yang na/ gang gi sa bon gang yin pa/ /de yi thugs kar de dgod do/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing / /ci rigs par ni snyan

gsan dbab/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs ma'am/ /rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni/ /sa'am dung chos de bzhin te/ /yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams/ /mchod yon snod du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bum pa gser la sogs/ /zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni/ /mchod yon snod la rab

tu shis/ /gal te nus pas ma rnyed na/ /ji ltar rnyed pas kun du bya/ /de nas dri yi til mar sogs/ /dU ra ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang / /bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgra/ /na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod/ /til mar la sogs sngags kyis ni/ /

o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ bum pa lnga'am yang na brgyad/ /tsan+dan la sogs rnams kyis byug /sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang / /'khor lor byas la mngon par bsngags/ /bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu'am/ /yang na ras bal skud pa'ang rung / /tshon chen

pos ni bsgyur byas la/ /de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya/ /sman lnga rin chen lnga dang ni/ /me tog 'bras bur ldan pa de/ /me tog yungs kar dang ldan zhing / /bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes bya dang / /gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi rdzi dang / /bkra shis

zhi rnams sngags kyis ni/ /khrus kyi ched du mngon par bsngags/ /'jam pa'i til mar dag dang ni/ /u dum bA ra'i lcug ma bzang / /'khar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu/ /bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya/ /dri lnga yis ni de dag byug /sa bon gyis ni de dag byug /slob ma tshogs dang

bcas pa yis/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya/ /bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i/ /blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur/ /sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag

pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hU~M/ lugs ma rnams ni dngos su bkru/ /ri mo rnams ni me long la'o/ /ngag byed lngas ni sngon du bsgo/ /dUr pa yis ni mnye bar bya/ /ras sam

lag pa dag gis ni/ /blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi/ /gur gum mar dang bcas pas bsku/ /gos zung dag kyang sku la gsol/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /o~M badzra d+hi ba sa se swA hA/ o~M badzra gan+d+he swA hA/ o~M badzra A ba

ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ /blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la/ /ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur/ /o~M hU~M a~M dzrI~M kha~M/ de ltar cod pan bcing byas la/ /gdan la legs par bzhugs gsol te/ /brtag pa las gsungs

tshul gyis so/ /mdun phyogs su ni ma bu bcing / /yob min zhing drang ba yis/ /de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod/ /de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar me na bza' sogs 'byor dri/ /de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /lha

rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /o~M badzra puSh+pe AHhU~M zhes bya ba 'di la sogs pas so/ /mchog gi me tog 'di de ni/ /chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes/ /mchog tu dad pas khyed la 'bul/ /ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /mchog tu bdug

pa 'di de ni/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i

mchog /mar dang til gyi mar me 'di/ /yang dag ye shes spel bya'i phyir/ /dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ /bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs/ /kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan/ /thams cad ldan pa'i lha yi bshos/ /bdag gis dbul gyis so sor bzhes/ /de

la sogs pa gang yang rung / /cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la/ /de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis/ /rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya/ /der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya/ /zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas/ /o~M

tsak+Shu sh+tsak+ShuHsa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ o~M d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi prI Na ne swA hA/ /de ltar bzlas nas de nas yang / /slob ma rab tu bcug byas la/ /khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rab gnas par/ /de dag don ni ngas byas te/ /

de rnams don ni grub zin gyis/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par byos/ /de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bar/ /khyod la byas kyis sreg blugs ni/ /stong ngam yang na de yi phyed/ /sngar gsungs bar mas 'bru rnams kyis/ /'o ma can gyi bud shing la/ /sreg khung

gru bzhir sreg blugs bya/ /de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis/ /lhag ma tsA rur phul byas la/ /bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni/ /zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya/ /o~M badzra A yu She swA hA/ /A gats+tsha ha ri ping+ga le te dza te dza ha lo hi ta k+Sha de hi da pa ya i daM tsa l+ye kAr+yan ku ru swA hA/

o~M badzra puSh+TA ya swA hA/ /de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis/ /khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya/ /sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i/ /tshad tsam du ni rab tu brtag /o~M su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ /me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro ba'i/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya/ /o~M in+d+rA ya

swA hA zhes bya bas dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra byas la yang dag par mchod de/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba/ /de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigs/ /kun

du zhi dang rgyas pa ru/ /yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ /lha rnams kun gyis sku gzugs la/ /bskal pa brgya ru bsrung gnas mdzod/ /dgyes shing yid

bzang gyur nas su/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi/ /bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas/ /rang gnas bde bar gshegs su gsol/ /dpyid zla ra ba'am dpyid zla 'bring / /dgun dang dpyid kyi tha la/ /dbyar ra de bzhin dbyar 'bring po/ /nyi ma byang du bltas pa yi/ /

dkar po'i phyogs ni gnyis pa'o/ /rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa'am/ /gang tshe gza' dang rjes mthun na/ /nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya/ /gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na/ /mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed/ /bco lnga de bzhin brgyad dang ldan/ /bcu gsum

pa yang de bzhin no/ /gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du/ /bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min/ /thams cad du ni chu smad dang / /snar ma gro bzhin de bzhin te/ /lag pa snrubs dang snron dang ni/ /rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no/ /khrums smad kyang ni de bzhin te/ /rgyu skar 'di rnams

thams cad du/ /skye dgu 'phel zhing de yis ni/ /rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed/ /skar ma dbo la rab gnas bya/ /des ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa gang ci'ang rung / /dngos grub me bzhis ster bar 'gyur/ /lus las shes pa yang dag pa/ /snrubs

sam yang na gro bzhin gyis/ /lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni/ /gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed/ /mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston/ /chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson/ /rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis/ /rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur/ /snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed/ /lha mtshams

kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur/ /phur bu lag dang pa ba sangs/ /zla ba gza' sogs shes bya ste/ /'di rnams gza' ldan las byas na/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge/ /gsum pa drug pa bdun pa dang / /bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba/ /gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad/ /bcu dang bcu gcig

rnams la lag /gnyis dang de bzhin bdun pa dgu/ /de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig la/ /dus sbyor zhi ba la brten nas/ /de la lhag par gnas par bya/ /drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis/ /pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin/ /de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi/ /stobs ldan mi ldan der

shes bya/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang / /zhing rnams dge ba gang yin pa/ /dang po lnga pa gsum de yin/ /nor 'joms rnams ni spang bar bya/ /rjes su mthun par byed pa pos/ /skad cig de la yongs 'grub cing / /ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog

'gyur zhing / /'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /gza' dang rgyu skar der med de/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med/ /gza' rnams thams cad rjes mthun zhing / /bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid/ /de ru grub par kun gnas shing / /

gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyi/ /dngos grub dag ni ster bar byed/ /yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa/ /skye dang skye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni/ /phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod/ /gang dag de la grogs byed

pa/ /gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya/ /de nas de dag thams cad la/ /dga' bas 'di dag brjod par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med/ /de phyir bdag la khyed bzod mdzod/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbra bza' bca' dag /

gzugs brnyan dag la sbyin par bya/ /bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni/ /zo zhig sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya bas so/ /glang po rta glang shing rta nor/ /yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya/ /de nas de la nan tan gyis/ /longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya/ /

gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na/ /bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing / /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /bla ma yang dag mnyes par bya/ /de nas yang dag brtul zhugs can/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma/ /mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la/ /ji ltar 'os pa'i

yon yang dbul/ /dung dang rol mo'i sgra la sogs/ /bzang po'i glu dang gar rnams kyis/ /gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis/ /rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul/ /de ltar thams cad byas zin nas/ /gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la/ /phul lam 'bul

bar byed pa rnams/ /slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi/ /bzo bo la ni mi sbyin zhing / /dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te/ /nor rnams thams cad de la dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byug bya ste/ /ba yi lci bas byug bya zhing / /rdul tshon chu bor
