rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do/ /mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /mdzub mos sa 'og nas chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rjes la bzung nas g.yo bar bya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /

rtse mo bzhi'i 'od zer gyis me stag ston pa'o/ /mdzub mos rlung skyed pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo'i rtse mos me long dang / rol pa dang / nam mkha' la rdo rje blta ba dang / steng du bskor bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i mdangs shing drung thams cad dang / nags dang /

skyed mos tshal dang / 'bru thams cad la gzhag par bya'o/ /mdzub mo rnon pos klog par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis glog 'gyu bas bskor bar bya'o/ /glog 'gu bas nam mkha' la

bskor bar bya'o/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa la brdeg par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g.yo zhing g.yo ba med pa la gzhag par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'o/ /mdzub mo'i rdo rje'i g.yon pa'i mthe bong gi bu gar g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gzhug par bya'o/ /rab tu dga'

ba'i rdo rjes steng du nam mkha' la dka' ba bskyod pa dang / skye gnas g.yo ba dang / dbus ma'i rdo rje bskyod cir btsing ba'o/ /rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / rdo rje kI li kI la dang / /rdo rje chu srin dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos gsol

ba 'debs par byed pas mdzub mo gnyis kyis rang gi mig bkab la yid kyis ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'o/ /mdzub mos rang mig btsum par bya'o/ /sos gzung bar bya'o/ /btung bar bya'o/ /rtse mo bskyod cing sbyin sreg bya'o/

mthe bo'i 'og tu rab tu brkyang la sbyin par bya'o/ /rdo rje sku'i phyag rgya mchog ni mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i sku mchog go/ /dbus ma'i mnyam pa'i mgo lcogs kyis ngag 'byin pa'o/ /snying gar bzhag nas/ o~M bo d+hi tsit+ta u ta pA da yA mi zhes bya ba bsgom

mo/ /mthe bo'i rtags g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyu ba ltar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /rdo rje bsnyems ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /yi ge hU~M gis sdigs mdzub bo/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyis so/ /rdo rje bsnyems

ma bshad do/ /mthe'u chung zur gyis mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongs su bskor/ /'og nas bteg pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o/ /

rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no/ /mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje snying gar badzro ta ha~M zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje sgom zhing ma hA sa ha ha~M zhes bya'o/ /ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta thA ga to\u0f85ha~M bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bshad do/ /

de nas rdo rje khu tshur bcing ba ni/ mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pa bcing / mdzub mo bkug pa gnyis kyis brgyan/ /mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi kha sbyar ba/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu

brtags// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni/ phyag rgya chen po rnams ni ta thA ga to\u0f85ha~M zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o/ /dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam pa'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /mda' la sogs pa

bcing ba ni de bzhin no/ /las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba'o/ /lcags kyu ma bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi khyad par rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa dam tshig gi khu tshur te/ de gnyis su byas pa de

bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o/ /'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang mdzod

spu dang snying gar bzhag ste bskor zhing bskor bas mkhur tshos dang / gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang sbyin pa'i tshul bya'o/ /g.yon pa snying gar bzung ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis

sa la reg pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis nang du mngon par phyogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du myur du thob pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas brtan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo // //de nas rdo rje

rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do/ /phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /dam tshig ni 'og tu rdo rje bsdams pa'i sor mo thams cad 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rdo rje ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri ste rdo rje

'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o/ /gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi khyad par ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bo/ /dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no/ /de nas las kyi phyag

rgya rnams ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba'o/ /lag pa rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i sdigs mdzub ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad de g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /sna'i dbugs dang yi ge hU~M gis so/ /khros pas yi ge a sbyar

bar bya'o/ /ha har dgod pas bzhad par bya'o/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o// //de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la de'i snying gar gzhag pa ni rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /

phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin no/ /dam tshig gi khyad par dang khu tshur gyi khyad par ro/ /kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung kha phye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i pad+ma chen po'o/ /thams cad bcing ba ni ci lta ba bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi

khyad par ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam par brkyang la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol du gshibs pa dang bcas pa bzhag pa ste de gnyis su byas pa pad+ma'i khu tshur ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni/ pad+ma chen po'i bshad pa'o/ /de

nyid spyi bo la'o/ /de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /de nyid sor mo thams cad kha phye bas so/ /de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go/ /de nyid legs par byed pa'o/ /de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nyid g.yon pa'i skye

gnas su mthe bo'i rtags bcug pa'o// //de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni/ rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste dpral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur

ba thams cad gsol ba'o/ /phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no/ /dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bo rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o/ /gzhan rnams ni de las byung

ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro/ /de gnyis su byas nas rin po che'i khu tshur ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o/ /kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam po kha phye bas mchog gi dar dpyangs 'dzin pa'o/ /dbus

ma'i nor bu'o/ /mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o/ /'og tu gtor ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o/ /rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste/ mdzub

mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o/ /mthe bo gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go/ /des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang

g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab tu bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang rgyab dang logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha ma la sogs pa bkrol bar byas nas/ phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud pa bya zhing dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum

gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no/ /rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon par kham phor dang g.yas su mda' gtong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /

dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o/ /ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /dam tshig ni gung mo dang

srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung dang srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te/

dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no/ /lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o// //de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g.yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang / dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams

cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o/ /gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bo gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol du phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o/ /gal te

'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyis rtse mos brdeg par byas na dug thams cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang kun las bsdus te brdeg

pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o/ /'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang 'pho ba dug med par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba

chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /pad+ma chen po ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po

ni nor bu'i rigs la'o/ /de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni/ snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go/ /lce dang mchu

gnyis shin tu g.yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste/ rigs thams cad dgos pa'o/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hU~M gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo rje'i rigs so/ /ting nge

'dzin gyi ngag pad+ma'i rigs la ste thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'o/ /chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la ste mchod pa'i nor bu'o/ /de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs la'o/ /sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o// //de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga

'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo'i

khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /pad+ma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o// //de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon

mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur ba'i mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po

ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go/ /gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i'o// //de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te/

ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje phra mos byin

gyis brlabs te/ dam tshig tsam du lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ngo / /khro gnyer dang

bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba byas nas shin tu ma 'gal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / rengs pa dang / nyal du bcug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i

dngos grub skad cig mas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rigs la'o/ /btsums pa med pas brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /

'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// //de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni/ nyin re mngon du lan cig tu/ /snying

po rang nyid bsgrub pa ste/ /rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pas/ /phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ni/ snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ /sgrub pa 'di ni rmad du byung / /ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis/ /

nye ba'i snying po gsang ba'o/ /don yod thogs med gsang ba dang / /rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du/ /bsod nams med pa rnams la yang / /dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la/ /snying po mchog

'di sbyin mi bya/ /gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni/ /gal te dngos grub yid 'ong 'dod/ /gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i/ /phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing / /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /dum bu gnyis pa

sngags dum gyi rtsa rgyud rdzogs so// //sems can thams cad bde don dang / /bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po

rnam dge phyir/ /rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud/ /sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /'dir ni rtog par gang zhig brjod/ /snying bo zhes ni gang bshad pa'i/ /ye shes rgyud ni ji ltar yin/ /dkyil 'khor

zhes ni brjod pa ci/ /der 'jug yon tan ci dang ldan/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang / /gzhan yang sgrub pa ji lta bu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /'di yang ci ltar de nyid gang / /thog ma tha ma med nyid dang / /rab tu dga' ba ji ltar

'gyur/ /dang po'i snying po 'di yi yin/ /de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin/ hU~M gi glu ni gang gis gsungs/ /'di yi don ni ji ltar brjod/ /sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang / /rigs rnams kyang ni

de bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa dang / /sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtog pa rnams kyang bsgrub pa dang / /dang po'i snying po'i de nyid dang / /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ /sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams/ /bsod nams med pas

ci ltar 'grub/ /slob dpon nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri rnams ci yin ji ltar 'gyur/ /mchod pa yang ni ji ltar bya/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa ji ltar yin/ /kun byed kun za sdig pa can/ /shin tu sdig can ji

ltar grub/ /don yod thog med dngos grub kyis/ /de rnams ji ltar grub par 'gyur/ /gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin/ /'di nyid du ni gang gis 'grub/ /bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ba ni/ /

bdag cag rnams la kun bshad gsol// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ zhal rab tu bzhad de bzhad pa chen pos dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di gsungs so/ /de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /sems can don ni yongs su brtag /des na brtag par bshad pa ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir

ro/ /de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sa la yi ge'i gnas bris nas/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa/ /de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /snying po thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ ci ltar gnas dang

ci ltar dus/ /ci ltar 'jig rten ci lta bu/ /'khor ni dgod par bya ba ste/ /de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi/ /'khor bcas de tshe dkyil 'khor du/ /zhugs

pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar bris pa'ang de dang 'dra/ de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni/ rdo rje 'khor lo bstan pa bzhin/ /lcags kyi 'khor lo dam pa ste/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin du/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad nor bu che/ /de nas dkyil 'khor

thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor brtag pa byas nas ni/ /nang gi rim par zhugs bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor dag la dzaHhU~M baM/ /hoHpra sid d+h+ya ma~M brjod bya/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rgyud ni/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro kun gyi/ /thams

cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mchog /sems can 'byung phyir sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags/ /de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun

bdag nyid/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das de bzhin/ /de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas/ /nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ rab tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te/ /'gro ba thams cad bde 'dod pa/ /de la bde ba rnam dag phyir/ /srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan byung / /de nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa kun

la chags pa che/ /'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed/ /chags pa 'bar ba dri za yi/ /snying po phyag na rdo rje'o/ /de nas yi ge hU~M gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni/ glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod/ /rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung / /thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i phyir/ /

bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas yi ge hU~M ge bzlas pa'i don gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ /myur du thams cad rjes chags pas/ /dngos grub thams cad rjes su chags/ /rjes su chags par byed mchog ni/ /snying po'i bzlas pa'i don yin no/ /de nas rdo rje

sems rgyud ni/ /glu rnams ci ltar khro bo ni/ /bsdus nas kun du 'jug pa na/ /rdo rje thog ni brtan gyur pa/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ thams cad bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ /bdag gi bdag nyid la yang

gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni/ /myur du thams cad la yang zhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ 'dod las chags pa dga' las bde/ /bde las sdig pa sdig las sdug /sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan/ /

rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de nyid/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad/ /de nas

mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rang sems nyid ni bdud

nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /rang gi sems ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung / /de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rtog pa kun la grub bya gang / /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /

de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas dang po'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste/ /ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog /dngos grub chen po'i bde ba ster/ de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang

sngags dang / rig pa shes pa sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / /phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang / /bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid dam ni bsgrub bya ba/ /de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub

che/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir/ /de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi dngos grub grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni/ /ci yang rung ba'ang thal

bas kyang / /sems dpa' chen po bzhag nas ni/ /nyin zhag bzhir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas slob dpon nyid kyi grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje yi/ /gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer du/ /ci bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs

te/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur bya/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje can la mchod pa kun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar/ /rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste/ /dmar po pad+ma nor bu ser/ /de nas

dbul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdzogs pa 'am ni ma tshang ba/ /yang na ji ltar rnyed pa ni/ /rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yis/ /rtag tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu/ /glu ni thams cad

ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje 'byed ma la sogs 'grol/ /mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin du/ /bzlas pa'i don gyis ma brjod kyang / /mchog gi grub pa 'grub par

'gyur/ /de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu shes

pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa smad par mi bya ste/ /rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che/ /'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ji bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mchog gi dngos

grub bsgrub par bya/ /rtog pa kun la rnal 'byor 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che rin po che las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas

phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams brtan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor

lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs/ /de srid sems can gdon par mdzad/ /mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can/ /sems can don ni nus

pa min/ /de phyir sems dpa' dam pa rnams/ /'khor ba srid du 'khor bar zhugs/ /sems can don ni mngon par bzhed/ /thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul bas/ /sems can don mi mdzad pa ste/ /'dir ni rab

grub dngos grub mchog /dus kun du ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa/ /'di ltar bsod nams rnam smin gyis/ /kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis/ /rang gi las kyis mdzad mi spyod/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /srid pa 'di la myur

'grub 'gyur/ /shin tu mthong ba la sogs kyis/ /sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad/ /kun nas dus kun thams cad la/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur/ /rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po/ /srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /de phyir bsgrub bya

'di bshad bya/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/ /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du/ /shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thob/ /lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa'am/ /ri mor bris pa'am 'dus byas pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni/ /ci bzhin bshad par rab gzhug

bya'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di

gsungs so/ /nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin/ /dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dis ni rtag pa thams cad la/ /phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas/ /dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub/ /phyi nas ma bsgrubs grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje

chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am/ /gang dang der ni gnas pa'am/ /thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi

gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa'am/ /yang na mchod pa ci bde bar/ /byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na/ /mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya

chen po mnyam gzhag ste/ /rang gi snying pos lan cig bsgrub/ /brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags/ /shin tu dgyes gyur bdag po grub/ /de nas yi ge hU~M gi glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan/ /ci nus pa dag ci 'dod pa/ /dri za dang

po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge hU~M gis grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag

rgya bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so/ /shin tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so/ /gzugs

chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so/ /'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so/ /sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bsrung

bas so/ /phyogs thams cad dang mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i

rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pas so/ /bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam gzhan dag rdo rjer byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje go chas so/ /'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /'thab mo srung ba ni

bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang ldang ba dang ltung ba dang gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so/ /rims thams cad la

sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang nad chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'phrog pas so/ /dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / dug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i las kyis so/ /gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas so/ /

ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang gzhom pa dang snying gzhan dbyung ba dang shi ba gso ba dang / tshe 'phel ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i lan gyis so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang g.yo ba dang 'ching ba dang gar byed du gzhug

pa dang glu len du gzhug pa dang snga ma 'byung ba so sor brtan pa dang rmad du byung ba dang cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / bden pa thams cad pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang dgrol ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so/ /rgyu ba dang mi

rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bra dbab pas so/ /rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid

bsgoms pas so/ /thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa'am/ dngos po sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so/ /

glog dang char pa dang thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so/ /sa'i 'og thams cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po

'byung ba dang nye bar len pa dang / mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang nye bar len pa dang rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang nye bar len pa dang nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong ba dang nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi

dbang phyug mas so/ /thams cad gzhom pa dang rengs pa dang dral ba dang rmugs pa dang gnyid log par bya ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang ltung ba dang rmongs pa dang gsad pa dang phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug

pa dang gzhug pa dang dbab pa dang bcing ba dang bkrol ba dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ltung ba bslang ba dang 'dren pa dang bran du byed pa dang mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang thams cad tshur drang ba dang phar btang ba dang gsad pa dang slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang dbang du

byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad sgrub pas so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang / mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thams cad

rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so/ /de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje

gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o/ /'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya/ rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong pa yongs su

sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la kun du bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor dang phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o/ /snying ga dang yid kyis rgyab dang phrag pa dang / spyi bo dang dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba

bcings la go cha bya ste/ mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o/ /snying ga dang dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor gzhag par bya'o/ /dbus ma'i dar mchog go/ /bya ba pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbug pa dang

'jig pa'i gdong gis lta ba'o/ /'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o/ /lta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /lta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o/ /yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste/ dbus ma'i

rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying gar stod pa dang skyed pa dang 'ching ba dang gar byed du bcug pa dang mgrin pa gsal ba dang rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang kha dbub pa dang mgrin pa gsal

ba dang bcings pa myur du dgrol ba dang bsrung ba dang bya ba pa'i las so/ /snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o/ /nyin re zhing snga rol du lan cig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang snying gar gzhag pa dang phyag rgya la lta ba ste/ nyin re snga rol du lan cig dbang po

thams cad la kun du bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang dbab pa sbyin pa dang 'bar ba'i me stag byed pa dang nye bar len

pa dang rlung gi tshul dang nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang sen mo brud pa dang mig 'degs pa dang btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang ltung ba dang slong bar byed pa dang / phan

tshun rdeg pa dang rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' stod pa dang lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang rtse mo bskyod pa dang gdu bur bcing ba dang myur du dgrol ba dang sor mo mnyam por myur du dral

ba dang ltung bar byed pa dang 'og nas bteg pa dang g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang tshur 'dren pa dang phar gtang ba dang g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang /

las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba byed pa'i las dang snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang snying gar las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so/ /bde ba

chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun/ /sems can thams cad myur 'grub phyir/ /don yod dngos

grub kun stsol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan/ /de dag kyang ni grub 'gyur te/ /bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir/ /gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam/ /brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshang ba/ /dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems

can gang / /slob dpon nyid byin ma brlabs dang / /de dag grub mchog rdo rje che/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mchog gi dngos grub kun la

'jug /dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /bde ba che las yang dag 'byung / /dag cing shin tu grub pa dang / /'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo / /de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni/ /skal ba ci bzhin snying

pos grub/ /rang gi bdag nyid nges sbyar bya/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya brgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis

sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no/ /

rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog /rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi/ /chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang / /rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni/ /yongs su mthar thug

nus pa min/ /e ma'o mngon zhen sems can dang / /le lo can dang las kun ldan/ /thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa/ /rab tu sgrub

phyir mthar thug brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /thams cad dgongs grub don du ni/ /yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang / /gang gis khyim na gsang ba

thams cad gnas/ /bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i/ /dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba rang mi byed/ /sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir/ /rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te/ /rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med

bdud rnams med/ /dngos grub 'phel med min pa byin gyis brlabs/ /bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba rang mi byed/ /rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa/ /myur du dngos grub mchog phyin bdag brtan 'gyur/ /brtan zhing rab bgyis

brtan pas rjes su chags/ /bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas/ /nga yi dang po'i snying po gang sgrub pa/ /de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ster/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /

bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa'i rgyud phyi ma yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje bde

ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlab pa'i

dbang gis ma grub pa rnams kyang mchog dam pa grub par byed pa dang mchog tu gsang ba dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'/ /nam mkha' kun la rab

tu gnas/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rab tu gsal/ /dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyan/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo

khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa/ /dra ba me long tog me tog /me tog chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kun gyis

legs sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog bya ba'i/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni/ /bde ba

chen po rnam par bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya/ /brtan par

bzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ /nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur/ /sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sangs rgyas de nyid do/ /

rdo rje drag po mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang ste/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs bzang bshad/ /de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ /'dod dang grol ba de nyid de/ /

dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid/ /bstan pa sra ba nor chen po/ /rgyu ba sems kyis 'dus byas pa/ /thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i sems dpa'

sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa/ /rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor/ /bde ba chen po grub don du/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /

ma lus 'dul bya'i don du ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir/ /dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

mchog grub phyir/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po/ /bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba/ /ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /snying po chen po dam yin te/ /gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa'am/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa'ang / /don yod thogs pa med mchog

'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka' yin/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan/ /dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster/ /rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed/ /thog mtha' med phyir dang por 'byung / /mchog dang dang po zhes byar bshad/ /tshig kun

gyis ni ci 'dod dang / /chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar/ /rjes su chags par bgyi'o zhes/ /ci bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug /nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po/ /bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras

bcas pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen gyis thog mar/ /yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung / /ci ltar 'gro ba rab grub ces/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris/ /de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje

'dzin rang grol ba ni/ /'byin dang stsol dang ston pa po/ /byed pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol/ /chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams/ /chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'di ni ji ltar grub par 'gyur/ /de yi tshig de gsan nas

ni/ /rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha/ /khyod ni thabs chen nyid yin no/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /ci srid sems

can rnam rtog pa/ /de srid byang chub srid pa che/ /byang chub sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis/ /de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog /ci bzhin cho gas bsgrubs pa nyid/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de ni/ /bde ba chen po grub phyir dang / /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gtso bos mgon la gsol ba btab/ /bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog /bde chen myur du grub byed pa'o/ /de rnams kyi ni

bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog /gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad pa'o/ /thog mar dam tshig gsum thob

pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i/ /rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dngos grub cho ga

thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing mnyam med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /

mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang byas la/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang / /me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis/ /ji snyed pa dang ci 'dod par/ /

mchog dang por ni rtag par bya'o/ /mchog gi dang por mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing dpe med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog /thog ma med mchog rtag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid

rten pas/ /lhag dang ma tshang med kun gang / /mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' ni/ /'di ni dbu mar rnam brtags pas/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de yis dbus mar rnam brtag nyid/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma'i gzugs/ /yu bar bcas pa rab tu gzhag /sna tshogs

pad+mas yang dag khebs/ /thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin/ /de nas srad bu gnyis 'gyur du/ /byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste/ /nam mkha' kun gyi tshad yin phyir/ /gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas/ /tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin/ /mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa/ /

dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin/ /khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa'o/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /gdul bas

bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dam chos mchog ste kun du 'gro/ /rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs/ /me long ye shes rtag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba me long me tog che/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /kun grub

mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen po zhes bshad do/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /kun mchog de ni legs bris nas/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam/ /de

ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin/ /'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster/ /byang sems theg pa chen po yi/ /mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /der ni

sna tshogs pad+ma cher/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am/ /byas pa'am yang na bris pa ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang la sogs/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa/ /

sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /su ra ta s+t+wa~M zhes brjod cing / /rang snying pos kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /tshon nam de bzhin phye ma yis/ /dag ni ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /

rdo rje mchod bstod la brtson bya/ /rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri/ /lha mo rdo rje rol pa ni/ /rdo rje can la rab 'khyud pa/ /rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnyems bri/ /de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i phyag rgya

ni/ dzaHbadzra driSh+Ti sam ke ma Ta hU~M/ o~M badzra ki li ki li hU~M/ ba~M badzri Ni sma ra ra Ta/ ho badzra kA me shwa ri s+t+wa~M/ mtshams su rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma dang sprin/ /ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /dri ste spyi bor

thal sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste/ /de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya/ /o~M ma d+hu badzri g+hu~M g+hu~M/ o~M badzra me g+he gu lu gu lu/ o~M o~M sha ra da badzri/ o~M o~M/ o~M badzra shi shi ri hU~M hU~M/ /sgeg mo bzhad ma glu chen ma/ /gar mdzad ma yi lha mo'i tshogs/ /rdo rje rol mo 'di dag ni/ /phyi

rol gyi ni mtshams su bya/ /he ra ti badzra ma g+ha bi la si ni tra ha/ he ra ti badzra nr-i t+yai/ be ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin dril ma yi/ badzra a~M gu sha dzaH/ badzra pA she hU~M/ badzra shriM kha le ba~M/

badzra g+haN+De hoH/ dam tshig 'di ni thams cad kyis/ /dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs/ /dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsol ka ba dang g.yog mo yi/ /gtso mo pho nya bran mo'o / /de nas kun

mchog la sogs pa/ /mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su/ /dzaHhU~M baMhoHzhes brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog /bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug /

hU~M ma hA su kha badzra sa twa/ ya hi shI g+h+raM/ ma hA su kha badzra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA la ya/ pra bud d+ha su ra ta s+t+waM a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ b+ha ga bA na nA di nas twa/ sarba sid d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha/ a she ta ma tri Sha A be sha ya sam yer bad d+ha/ bshI ka

ro me/ i mer mu drA pa ngaiHdzaHhU~M baM hoH/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs/ /bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan/ /dbang du gyur nas rab tu thub/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob

dpon rang lha ni/ /'od zer kun du ston la sogs/ /mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni/ /rdo rje thal mo kha dbyes dbul/ /bum pa gang dag ci snyed pa'i/ /me tog la sogs kyis kyang mchod/ /ba dan

rtse mor dril btags pa/ /mtshams kyi char ni gzhag par bya/ /bum pa spos chus gang ba la/ /rdo rjer bcas pas byin brlabs pa/ /lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas/ /de la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ /hU~M ma hA su kha badzra

a mo g+ha sa ma yo da ka sad d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba su kha sau ma na s+yA n+yA da da ku ru ku ru/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la/ bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba

dang bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / /rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing / /rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /

rang nyid khrus byas dris legs byugs/ /ci snyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing / /me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo/ /rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas/ /gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o/ /

zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni/ /de kho na nyid lan cig brjod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /rdo rje chen po nor che ba/ /ye shes chen po las chen po/ /de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod/ /de nas me

tog sil ma ni/ /mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin/ /dang po sha ra la sogs pa/ /bstod pa glu ru lan cig blang / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/ dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che/ /dga' ba

chen po'i dga' chen po/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ /thams cad thams

cad byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad yi ge hU~M/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal/ /'dod chags chen po bde chen nyid/ /'dod dang thar pa nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten

gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /brtan par rang byung gsal ba ste/ /rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa/ /rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa/ /srid pa 'khor ba sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can/ /mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas/ /

snying po phyag rgya sbyor dam tshig /de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos dang las ni khams chen po/ /dam pa'i chos te las mchog bdag /byang chub sems ni rab sbyong mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo khro bo che/ /dus mtha'

ltar 'bar 'dul ba po/ /'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog /drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa/ /thams cad dag pa pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs te tshul chen po/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas

rtag pa'i don/ /'byung po thams cad gnas chen po/ /'byor ba thams cad gnas 'byor ba/ /dpal dang gtso bo rgyal po ste/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pas khyed la bdag

brten bgyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /nyin re nang par rjod byed dam/ /chos kyi tshig gis lan cig brjod/ /dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod na/ /dang por nyin re dus gsum du/ /bstod

na sdig pa las nges grol/ /zhing dag pa ni grub par byed/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad skal bzang byed/ /phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed/ /dngos grub don yod yon tan can/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad

dam pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni/ /rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod/ /rang gis phyag rgyas lan cig ni/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub/ /de nas lha yi chu dang ni/ /de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur/ /rang nyid rdo rje phyag rgya la/ /snying po 'di ni blang bar bya/ /de la

rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ hU~M ma hA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi Sh+Te ke na hrIHa b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sarba badzra a d+hi pa ji s+t+wi dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba mi d+ha nA ma ma ste b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ ma hA badzra satwa/ o~M b+hur b+hu ba swa/ de nas rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /phyag na rdo rje mig 'dzin pa/ /rdo

rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du/ /'di nyid du ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par/ /cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /legs par mchod la phyir byung bya/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag /rdo rje kun gyi gsung rab 'dzin/ /rdo rje thams cad

'dzin slob dpon/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub che/ /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che/ /d+hIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che/ /las rnams thams cad dbus la brtag /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /kun byed dngos grub thams

cad ster/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus/ /thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog /kun rig pa dang kun gyi gnas/ /'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor/ /phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che/ /lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun/ /bsgo ba thams

cad rtag tu byed/ /sems dpa' kun ni rtag tu mthong / /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan/ /dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon

byin gyis brlab cing 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mchod yon snying gar bskor/ /bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni/ /mgo

bos yang dag phyag bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad grub byed yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'gro ba kun la'ang grub mdzad brjod/ /de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ /

de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug /de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas slob ma bcug nas ni/ /dga' ba chen po 'di brjod bya/ /rab dgyes

rab bde bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje sems bdag deng grub mdzod/ /de nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /spyi bo nas ni myur du 'dor/ /gang du me tog babs gyur te/ /lhag pa'i lhar ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas lha yi chu yis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang rang dbang bskur/ /

rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga/ /byin la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod/ o~M ma hA su kha badzra/ badzra a b+hi She ke na sta~M/ a b+hi shiny+tsA mi/ ma hA badzra d+hA ra/ he badzra nA ma sid d+ha nA maH/ gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba

bslabs nas/ ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am/ /gang 'dod rang grub pa de la/ /de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid/ /'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad/ /'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa rnams/ /

thams cad rang gi ni/ /rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub/ /'di la rab tu 'jug tsam gyis/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa/ /nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing / /bde ba chen po rab grub ster/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /mna' ni dam du bsgags nas kyang / /de

nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab/ /de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu/ /

de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ /skye bo 'du gnang gnas pa 'ga'/ /dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po bshad par brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid

bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ /de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen

po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog gi dam

tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi

dbang phyug mchog /rgyun du sems can don byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde skyid bsten par gyis/ /de ni 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas khyed kyis bcud dang /

kha zas dang gnas pa dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par bstabs pa bas bdag nyid gang la srid pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs/ /ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing / /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yang dag par ni mchod de byung / /

de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang / /glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag / yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil

'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// //de nas bsgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste/ /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o/ /'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /srid par gnas shing srid par sangs/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /

rtag tu sems can kun don byed/ /'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas/ /dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur/ /'dul bya min pa bsod nams med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam pa

kun du mthong sogs kyis/ /sems can don byed mi nus so/ /de bas rgyud chen las grub pa/ /sangs rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthong la sogs pa sems can don/ /nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yin/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med/ /nam mkha' mtha'

yas sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /bsod nams med pa'am le lo can/ /de yang kun mchog grub pa yis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas don yod

cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lugs ma'am ni brkos pa'am/ /byas pa'am ni bris pa yi/ /dang po'i sems dpa' brtags nas ni/ /mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya/ /nyin re zhing ni dang po ru/ /de bzhin yul

dang ldan gyur pas/ /dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste/ /phyag rgya chen po rab byin brlab/ /rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po rang / /rdo rje hU~M ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin du/ /mchog gi dang po rab tu

dgyes/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni/ /ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrub/ /'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub/ /kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /phun sum tshogs kun bdag thams cad/ /'dod chags

chen po bde ba che/ /thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /rtag par kun du 'dul ba'o/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ /rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas/ /

khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa/ /kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog /kun rig dngos grub thams cad ster/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang

phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che/ /gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing brjod/ /rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa/ /rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub sems nyid 'dod/ /dngos grub ci ltar 'dod pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi ma'am ni 'jig rten pa/ /rtog pa kun bshad cho ga 'am/ /rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni/ /

rdo rje 'chang ba che rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs/ /de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /phyag rgya chen por mnyam gzhag la/ /rang gi snying pos lan cig sgrub/ /dr-i D+ha su to Sh+ya sa~M rak+ta/ su po sid+d+ha ta la gu/ de la ci ltar yi ge hU~M gi glu blangs pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ ri d+hi ta

sogs kyis brgyan ldan/ /ci nus pa dang ci dga' dang / /gaN+De la sogs glu blangs pa'i/ /yi ge hU~M gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de/ /gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na/ /de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar

du bsgrub/ /de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ sems s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ /rang gi snying gar rim bzhin du/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar bsgrubs na/ /

mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni/ /dam pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po don yod par 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//

de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni/ nyin re zhig dag por lan cig phyag rgya bsgrub par don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med par bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / /dgug

pa dag bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so/ /bde ba dang yid bde ba dang phun sum tshogs pa dang dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so/ /tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang gzi byin chen po mngon par 'phel

bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so/ /dpal chen po dang skal ba bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/ /stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang / chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs

che bas so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pas so/ /thams cad du yi ge dang gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod

pa'i bden pas so/ /dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad dang bde ba'i mchog dang lung bsgo ba dang lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje rmad du byung

bas so/ /gter thams cad dbyung ba dang nor dbrog pa dang rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so/ /yul thams cad dang skye bo dang grong khyer dang / nags dang chu bor nye bar longs spyod pa sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/ /

thams cad las sngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang rin po che dang kha zas dang btung ba dang g.yog 'khor la sogs pa sprul te/ nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so/ /skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang /

snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang btung ba dang rang rtser gzhug pa dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so/ /dngos

grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje la sogs pa mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing ston pa/ mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro

ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang sbom pa dang du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang bcing ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis so/ /lha thams

cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so/ /klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so/ /gnod sbyin la

sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang 'jug pa dang mchod pa dang bsgrub pa dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i

rdo rje 'khor los so/ /phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang brtan par bya ba dang bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so/ /dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so/ /las thams cad rab

tu bsgrub pa la/ rnam par mi 'jigs par bya ba dang brtan par bya ba dang grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so/ /rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so/ /sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug

pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang

gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /sdig pa thams cad byas pa'am/ /rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa'am/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /ma bsgrubs par thams cad

'grub bo/ /don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o// //de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna

tshogs pa'i phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /don yod pa dang thogs med pa/ /bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu/ /las kyi rab 'byam 'di dag ni/ /dngos grub skad cig gis grub byed/ /'di lta ste thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang

zhi ba dang bde legs su bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang dam tshig dang dngos grub bcing zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so/ /nyin gsum pa

dang nyin bzhi pa dang slar zlos pa dang rtag pa can dang khyab 'jug gi rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so/ /gdung ba thams cad dang gnod byed dang nad dang mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so/ /dug dang

sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar ba dang dbab pa dang bcing ba dang bza' ba dang bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so/ /gdon thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang rab tu gdul ba dang / bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar ba'o/ /

thams cad la bcing ba dang thar ba dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gdon las thar bar bya ba dang shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i

lan gyis so/ /sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang / bskyod pa dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra sen

thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang gsad pa dang ltung bar bya ba dang bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so/ /thams cad rengs par bya ba dang rmongs par bya ba

dang gnyid log par bya ba dang gsad pa dang bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang gzhig par bya ba dang dbang du bya ba dang ltung bar bya ba dang gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so/ /khro bo thams cad

gsal ba dang bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang 'jigs pa las thar ba dang g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang char chen po dbab

pa dang rlung dang char pa dang glog dang ser ba bzlog pa dang dro ba dang grang ba bsal ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes

su chags pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang rtse ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa dang klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dang ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la

ni/ rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so/ /rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug

thams cad las rgyal ba dang dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so/ /mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang dngos

grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub dam pas so// //de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i

cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan cig ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /snying mchog lan cig bzlas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya/ /de yi rjes la nye snying po/ /las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas/ /don yod grub pas las rnams

ni / /kun la shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang ma mthong ba/ /ma bshad pa la'ang rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog 'dir 'jigs pa yod min te/ /'khor lo med la brgya byin

la/ /gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas/ /rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya/ /'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal

po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'byin pa byed pa bde ba che/ /bde chen can du brtan phyir dang / /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med/ /

kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te/ /mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo / /mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad/ /'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang / /

'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad ma dag pas/ /rang rig las kyis dag ma 'gyur/ /de tshe sems can khams rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka'i phyir/ /rang gi las ni sbyang don du/ /

btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /sems dpa' chen po bde ba che/ /byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul/ /sems can la phan bsod nams can/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag /sems

can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas/ /shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs/ /byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /

de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyis/ /'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung / /de yi khams gsum gnas pa yis/ /sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs/ /

sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la/ /de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /de ni sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/ /yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so/ /o~M b+hU kha~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni/ /byang

chub snying por byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa/ /sems can kun la bde don phyir/ /rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dkyil

'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid/ /'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba/ /su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /o~M sid d+ha mAM zhes brjod dgod/ /mdun du bdud las rnam rgyal bar/ /mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri/ /

g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ /rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /g.yon du log par rnam dregs pa/ /sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ /badzra satwa/

badzra rat+na/ badzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa badzrI/ rat+na badzrI/ pad+ma badzrI/ bi shwa badzrI/ /mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / /rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o/ /mtshams rnams su yang lha mo ste/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su'o/ /de

bzhin snga ma ci lta bar/ /'khor lo de ni brtag par bya/ /mchod pa'i thal mo snying gar bcing / g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya/ /me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim/ /me tog bcas te snying gar bcing / /bsam pa g.yos pas gdung bar

bya/ /mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /zhugs nas me tog 'dor bar bya/ /shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni

'di yin te/ o~M a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+ha rmA NA~M Ad+yA nu t+ba n+na twA da/ de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /ston la me tog sil ma dor/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod/ /de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni/ /thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur/ /

thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog /sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin cho ga ni/ /rgyas pas slob ma

mchog tu gzhug /mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che/ /mchod pa byas nas slar dbyung bya/ /sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang / /cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs/ /rnam par rgyal ba brnyes par bri/ /sgrub 'di lan cig tsam gyis ni/ /de

'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis cho ga bzhin/ /bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na/ ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang / /tshe mchog

'di la sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom ma med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /brtan pa myur du

thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ snying gar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod la/ /bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud las

rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mtshungs med sems can don byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub/ /ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de

nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog /las rnams rab 'byam dam pa ste/ /sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa/ /bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste nad thams cad dang mya ngan dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang dug thams cad dang sbyar ba'i dug dang gshed byed dang / g.yengs byed

dang ro langs dang sngags dang sman dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang rims dang gdon dang mkha' 'gro ma dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang 'go ba'i nad dang nyes pa dang nyon mongs pa dang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par

bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so/ /tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi byin chen po dang mdangs dang stobs dang spro ba dang brtson 'grus dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang bsod nams dang ming dang snyan pa dang grags pa dang dran pa dang blo gros dang

brtan pa dang rtogs pa dang stobs dang ting nge 'dzin dang phung po dang 'du byed dang sku dang gsung dang thugs 'phel ba la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan

dang shes rab dang ye shes dang stobs dang thabs dang rdo rje dang bsgrub pa dang gzungs dang sa dang spyod pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang chos dang las dang sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje chen po
