grub pa la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sa dang gzhon

nu'i rol pa ston pa dang mngon par byung ba dang dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / 'jig rten

gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa dang gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang 'dul ba la rab tu bzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlab

pa dang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba dang de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so/ /ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis/ /byang chub sems la mngon brten pa/ /de

ltar byang chub spyod sogs kyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur/ /don yod bsod nams dam pa yi/ /las kyi rab 'byam sgrub byed pa/ /cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed/ /rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i/ /sems can kun la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil

'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o// //de nas sna tshogs las chen po/ /khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen

po/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pas/ /gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i/ /rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis/ /zhi bas sems can kun gyi don/ /gdul ba rab tu bsgrub mi nus/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyis bsgrub bya ba/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin/ /gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don/ /dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa/ /de tshe nyid kyi dngos po kun/ /gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab/ /sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab/ /

ut+tiSh+Tha sa ma ya kro d+ha ni sum b+ha dz+wA la badzra hU~M/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas/ /khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng

'od kyis gsal ba/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che/ /drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing / /'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro bas sreg pa 'dra/ /'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra/ /dang

po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ de la rdo rje chen po me dang nyi ma ltar 'bar bzhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum/ /thams cad

g.yos shing 'gul bar 'gyur/ /lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni/ /g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun/ /de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro/ /lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum

kun/ /de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad/ /sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dam pa yang ni thugs su chud/ /de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /

rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni legs par bzhugs/ /spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /dbu skra gyen du brjes shing g.yo/ /kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha'

'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams/ /phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni 'bar ba 'khrug /rlung bskyod bskal pa'i me lta bur/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ /yang dag

bzhugs pa legs bskul te/ /'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor/ /bkug nas sems can kun don dang / /bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /

kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni/ /de rnams la ni thugs rje yis/ /'chi ba slar gso brtan por gsungs/ /o~M ut+tiSh+Tha ma hA a d+hi pa ti badzri Ni/ shI g+h+raM u ta thA pa ya hU~M/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad bslang ba'o/ /de nas sa gsum bslang ba ni/ /thams cad du ni shi ba gso/ /

sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing / /rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bos/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing / /nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes/ /sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo/ /de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di su zhig lags/ bcom

ldan 'das ni zhi ba la/ /gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs/ /khyed kyis dam tshig ci 'dra ba/ /zhus pa bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba/ /gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /dkon mchog

gsum dang de bzhin du/ /nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum pos 'di thos nas/ /tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi/ /'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par brtsams/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag

gis ni sangs rgyas rigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig /gnod sbyin bsgo bas ci zhig bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas/ /de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod/ /

g.yon pa bsnyems pa rgya bcas pas/ /smin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing / /nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /drag du khros bcas pas smras so/ /de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus pa las rgyal ba ni 'di yin te/ hi/ de nas snying

po 'di phyung bas/ /nges rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang / /dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas/ /rdo rje ming ni byin nas su/ /'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin bzhag /de nas rdo rje chen po mchog /mgon

po yis ni gsol btab pa/ /sems can kun la rjes ston pas/ /rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su gzhag bya ba/ /sngon po 'bar ba'i

gzugs bzang ba/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrugs pa'i/ /rdo rje gsol bar mdzad la

brtson/ /de yi dngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang / /ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa/ /mtshams su mda' dang kha T+wA~M ba/ /'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa/ /'bar

ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni/ /thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu/ /dang po rdo rje phyag rgya bdag /gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste/ /gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor/ /rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che/ /bzhi par klu

mkhan ma la sogs/ /rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyi/ /khro bo rnams ni lnga pa la/ /drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog /gnod sbyin srin po king ka ra/ /dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs/ /gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su/ /mdor

na ming po gsum la sogs/ /lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad/ /legs par bri ba'am gzhag par bya/ /mtshams su lha mor rab bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus su'am/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sogs khro bcas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /dag ni ji

bzhin dang / /cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya/ /khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas 'dud/ /de nas khro zhing slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can mchog rab zhu gsal/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub/ /hU~M mdad rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /bsnyems dang bcas pas rgyas gdab

nyid/ /de bzhin khro bas 'dul ba la/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dgyes pa yis/ /gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes/ /de nas me tog blangs nas ni/ /khros pas bdag po che la gtor/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /o~M ma hA badzra dz+wA la yA na lA rka ya hi

dzaH/ sarba badzra ku la pra be sha ya hU~M/ sarba mu drA~M ga nA ban d+ha na trA Ta/ sarba sa ma yaM sA d+ha ya phaT/ sarba du Sh+Ta na da ha pa tsa b+ha s+m+wiM ku ru ma hA kro d+ha a ka ni badzre Na hU~M phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i/ /rgyal po brtan pa che byon 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun/ /dngos grub

thams cad gsol bar mdzad/ /de nas hU~M la sogs pa'i sgra'i/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te slob ma la sogs la/ /snying gar dbab pa phra ba skye/ /de nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi/ /rang gi

snying po brjod par bya/ hU~M hU~M badzra pra ha ra Ni phaT/ hU~M badzra shU la yA gri Ni tri ti/ ma ta sa hU~M badzra ko She ts+tshi n+d+da ha~M/ /o~M badzra a ma la pA she ma Ta/ rdo rje 'gugs pa dang rdo rje mdung dang rdo rje ral gri dang rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i srung ba'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa

med pa/ shin tu grub pa stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab par nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o/ /o~M badzra gu h+ya sid d+ha pa ra ma yo gI shwa ri hi/ hU~M badzra tsaN+Da ho kha T+wA~M ga ma hA badzra ka pA la yam ku te ru lu ru lu N+Ti hU~M badzra nA rA ya Ni dzi/ hU~M badzra ba Ta ke dzi/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha'

'gro ma lan cig bzlas te dgod pa'am bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na/ /dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig brjod par bya ste/ sems can mang la bde phyir dang / /bstan pa thams

cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni/ /'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig rten

gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la/ rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa la bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gsad pa dang slar

'tsho bar bya'o/ /gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la/ shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi

byed do/ /de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang / /rdo rje tshogs ni kun gyis kyang / /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas 'dir sgrub bshad bya ste/ /ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni/ /bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /'bum

tshang nas ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par/ /'jig rten gsum na legs snang zhing / /cis kyang 'jigs pa med par

'gyur/ /de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa ni/ 'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa'am/ /'gro 'am nyal bar byed pa na/ /ci lta de ltar 'bum bzlas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun

gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang / /rang gi nye du rnams kyis bsten/ /gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing / /gang la 'jigs pa med par rgyu/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya'i

dam pa sgrub pa ni/ ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing / /bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni/ /ci srid nyid du khro chen po'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni/ /bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes/ /brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig phyag rgya

bcings nas ni/ /bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni/ /las rnams dam pa sgrub pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhir ni rab byed cing / /thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na/ /rdo rje las nyid thob par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa chen po cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas dngos

grub sgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi/ /las kyi rgyud ni dam pa rnams/ /bzhin du bshad par bya/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad bsreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / rmongs pa dang /

gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / brdeg pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / btso ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / phye mar bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug

pa dang / smyo bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyis so/ /thams cad dgug par bya ba dang / nges par bkod pa dang / /bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / brgyal du gzhug pa dang / rtser gzhug pa dang / ha ha zhes dgod du gzhug pa

dang / 'khor ba dang / drang ba dang / 'od du gzhug pa dang / bsgom pa dang / nub par bya ba dang / dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar 'degs par bya ba dang / bskur ba dang / nga ro 'don par bya ba dang / ngur gzhug pa dang / rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang / 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra

'bal bar bya ba dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos bshu ba dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / pra sen bsgrub pa dang / bden par smra bar bya ba dang / sgyu ma ston pa dang / lan ston pa dang / dus

tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par shing las me tog dang 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston par bya ba dang / rims dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa

thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang / phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / thar bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so/ /lha la sogs

pa thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu gdon par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul ba dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams 'dul ba dang / gdug

pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang / nor sbyin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma

thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang / brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang / skem byed tshar gcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / khyab 'jug gdul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje bsgrub pa

dang / byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /lan cig

bzlas pas mchog grub pa/ /thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan cig /de yi 'og du khro gnyer gyis/ /bsgrub bya thams cad dgug pa yin/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas ting 'dzin

thams cad ni/ /rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du/ /rang rig rin po che bskyed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che/ /thabs med pas ni thabs yin no/ /'dod chags

la sogs kun bsags pas/ /ma dag sems can khams rnams ni/ /de rnams la ni rab spyod par/ /skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen/ /mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad/ /'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchog /rang nyid bzang po la snyoms

zhugs / /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang

phyug thams cad nyid thugs su chud par gyur pa'o/ /bsnyems pas pad+ma g.yon pa ni/ /bzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas/ /ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad/ /ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs

pa'i/ /khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag /'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por gyur/ /de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur/ /de nas sgom pa'i snying po 'di/ /dag par bsgoms pas sgom pa na/ /rdo rje 'chang ba chen

po ni/ /pad+ma chen po 'chang bar 'gyur/ /gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ni/ /rgyal po che dang mdangs mnyam pa/ /bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i pad mchog gi/ /g.yas pa mchog la rnam par gzigs/ /de nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /pad+ma chen po mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas la

sogs 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rnams ni 'dul ba'i mchog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul mdzad pa/ /bzhugs pa rab tu bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de la pad+ma dge ba der/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad pa na/ /pad+ma'i

rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir/ /rgyal rnams kyis gsol ba btab/ /de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po/ /'jig rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ /phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad

pa bri/ /de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya/ /gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma ni/ /g.yon bsnyems tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa/ /rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /

sangs rgyas skra ni brgyad po bri/ /rang gi ting 'dzin pad+ma che'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs/ /'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha/ /zhi ba sred med bu tshangs pa/ /'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad+ma can/ /spyi bor 'tsher

zhing mgrin 'degs pa/ /rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya/ /de nas pad+ma'i snying po ni/ /sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dzaHhU~M badzra pad+ma/ he pad+ma/ pad+ma ba~M/ ho pad+ma ni rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnams su ni/ hU~M pad+me tsa N+De shwa ra hU~M/ he ma hA bi shA pad+ma tsU r+Ne sid+d+ha hU~M/

ma Ta hrIHpad+ma pad+mo hU~M a ho pad+ma a shwa/ kra ma kra ma hU~M dzaH/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa byas nas ni/ /pad+ma chen po me tog bcas/ /ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin/ /las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya/ /o~M bi shod+ha

ya/ ma nu sa ni shud+d+ha ma hA sa twa/ d+hA tu sa ma ya sa twa/ dA gdI pany+tsa yi/ tsit+ta me sarba d+ha me Sh+T+ye badzri Ni tsit+ta me sarba d+ha me sh+ya dzi ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni/ /dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa 'grub/ /de nas mdzub mo lcags kyur bcing / /chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drang / /o~M

sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki shwa ra pad+ma ha sta/ ya hi shI g+h+ra~M ma me badzra mu drA a gri sh+ya sa be sa ma yer ba d+ha bi shi ko mi/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH sho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma me/ ma hA badzra d+tar stA~M/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po mchog /'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon/ /'jig rten kun mchog 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /

ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yi/ /ye shes dag ni bslab par bya/ /ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni/ /sgrub pa chen po gdod nas byung / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /

bzhin du bshad par bya/ /bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am/ /gdug pa rnams kyi nang chud pa'am/ /gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni/ /pad+ma chen po yongs su bzung / /dus dang stobs ni ji bzhin du/ /nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis tshe 'di la/ /

myur du mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod chags kun gyi bde myur bar/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub

kun gyi mtha' yas mchog /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni/ /phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas/ /dngos grub chen po nyid thob bo/ /dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te/ /las ni las mchog phyag rgyas so/ /sgrub pa chen po cho ga'i rgyud do// //

de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i/ /ting 'dzin las ni 'dren ma dag /dang por ting 'dzin grub pa ni/ /bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang yams dang 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang nyon mongs pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang

'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa dang byis pa'i gdon dang dmu rgod dang nyon mongs pa dang ngal ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbul ba dang rgyags pa dang reg na mi bde ba dang skal ba ngan pa dang nad med pa ma yin pa dang nor brlag pa rnams la ni pad+ma chen po zhi bas so/ /rlung dang mkhris pa

dang khrag dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang ma zhu ba dang rims dang sbyar ba'i dug dang dug dang mdze dang 'brum bu phra mo dang g.yan pa dang rkang shu dang / skran dang chu'i dmu rdzing dang mtshan bar rdol ba dang sha bkra dang zad byed dang khrag zad pa dang khu bzad pa dang / nad thams cad dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang gdon dang phra

men rnams gso ba la ni/ pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ /thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang chos dang go cha dang / gtsug tor dang gtsug phud dang mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor dang sa dang nam mkha' dang rdo rje'i gdan dang khang pa chen po dang rdo rjer ba dang me 'bar ba dang thal ba'i ra ba

dang rdo rje dang ri bo don yod pa la sogs pa dang srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang phur bus gdab pa dang zas dang btung ba dang gos dang rgyan dang phyag rgya dang bsrung ba la ni pad+ma chen po thams cad srung bas so/ /tshe thams cad dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzi brjid dang mdangs dang lang tsho dang brtson 'grus

dang spro ba dang nad med pa dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang nor dang 'bru dang dbang phyug dang 'byor pa dang dngos grub dang blo dang rnyed pa dang bkra shis pa dang ming dang grags pa dang snyan pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dam pa 'grub pa la ni pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so/ /dpal

mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/ /kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin/ /ting

nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /drag po chen po rab sad mdzad/ /chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas/ /kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung / /nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can/ /nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin/ /de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni/ /nges par rdo rje can du brjod/ /de

nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid/ /ljang sngon bai DUr+ya mnyam mdangs/ /rdo rje rin chen bsnams dge ba/ /nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di/ /mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs/ /ting 'dzin la ni rnam gzigs pas/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag

po nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rdo rje rin chen de yis ni/ /kun rig kun gyis dbang bskur dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas/ /shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /

o~M sarba badzra sa twa a ti pa ti s+t+wa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing / /legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje rin chen che de las/ /chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur/ /byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /ci rigs par ni kun dbang bskur/ /

rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs/ /bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog /dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni/ /

nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog /nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang / /gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri/ /de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /bdag nyid thams cad dgyes pa gzhag /dag pa'i bai DUr+ya mdog 'dra/ /'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug /g.yon pa

rin chen thugs kar stod/ /g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba/ /de yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog /bzhi po gzungs bcas dam pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang / /nor bu chen po bla med dang / /'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs/ /rang gi mtshan mas

mchod pas ni/ /de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te/ badzra sa twa dzaH/ badzra rat+na hU~M/ badzra d+ha rma ba~M/ badzra ka rma hoH/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad do/ o~M pra ti badzri Ni phaT/ o~M badzra brI ti hi hi/ o~M tsin+tA ma Ni hoH/ o~M badzra ma hA ma he ha~M/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis

ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya/ /nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhu gsal/ /mkha' skyes la ni mgos phyag bya/ /bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi/ /dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya/ /khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i/ /thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin/ o~M i sid d+ha b+hur b+hu ga

sid d+ha sid d+ha swaH/ sid d+ha ma hA badzra rat+na/ ba ba tra T+wA trA~M/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang / /phun tshogs kun la shin tu ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so/ /de

nas nor bu khu tshur can gyi lcags kyus dgug par bya'o/ o~M b+hU rA ya hI dzA/ b+hu ba bra bi sha hU~M swa/ gr-i h+Na ba~M ba pa Ta Ta sid d+ha ho trA~M/ de nas bcom ldan myur du ni/ /byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni/ /'byor ba shin tu g.yo ba la/ /don ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas slob mas phyag

rgya ni/ /me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug /bcug nas de nyid mchog snying po/ /bden pa lan cig brjod du gzhug /de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod pa che/ /'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin

thob/ /de nas de phyir sgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis/ /dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing / /'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la/ /'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rin chen kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /

dngos grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so/ /de bzhin du las bsgrub pa ni dngos grub bla na med pa yin no phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do// //de nas de phyir las rnams

kyi/ /rab 'byam rgyu ni dam pa dang / /dngos grub chen po kun grub pa/ /ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa

dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas so/ /

dpal thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed

pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag

pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa

thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so/ /mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtod pa dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang

'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrub pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /sems

can thams cad bde don du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba/ /rang gi rgyal mchog lan cig bsgrub/ /yi ge tra~M ni sbyar bar bya/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //

de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa/ /'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgoms gyur zhing / /sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /

rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin/ /mi mnyam pa yis bsten gyur na/ /dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro/ /bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten gyur na/ /bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa/ /zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gti mug khyab

'jug brtan mdzad nas/ /'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas/ /chos kyis bsten nas gsum mchog ste/ /chos min bsten pas ngan song gsum/ /'dod chags sbrang

rtsir byed par bshad/ /zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad/ /gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces/ /kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin no/ /nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad/ /nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin / /

de nas gsum po 'di yi mchog /sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa/ /gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid/ /bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni/ /rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra/ /tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i/ /sangs

rgyas byang chub snod ma yin/ /de rnams sbyang phyir bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni/ /gzugs ni gsum po 'di mdzad nas/ /phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa lha sogs lha/ /'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug che/ /dkyil

'khor de ni gsang snying po/ /rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul/ /o~M b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo srungs bzhis ni rab bsrungs pa/ /kha khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang ma nyid dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor gzhu

yi dbyibs can la/ /sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid/ /bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /dag ni ji bzhin du/ /legs par bri'am gzhag par bya/ /pus mo gnyis kyis bzhu gsal der/ /rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas/ /zhugs te

dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /o~M b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ swa sti nA ma swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/ /thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba/ /thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la/ /de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin/ /slob dpon rab

tu zhugs pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag /snying po snod min la smras sam/ /ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni/ /gal te 'dir ni ma

spyad dam/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste/ /ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni/ /nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob/ /yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ba dang / /

dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni/ /de la gar gyi mchod pa dang / /'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /

sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu/ /slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad/ /kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs/ /brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni/ /rab tu grags pa'i dngos grub ster/ /gang zhig

'jig rten kun tu bshad/ /tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams/ /zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser/ /grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad/ /phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang / /rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /de rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam

tshig bshad/ /hrI hU~M shrI b+h+yo/ dkyil 'khor bzang po sgo bzhi pa/ /srad bu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya/ /mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che/ /bzhi po ngag ni rim pa bzhin/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni/ /bzhi po dag ni de bzhin bya/ /rang gi snying po bzhi po ni/ /rang gi sgor

ni phyogs par gzhag /skal bzang lag na ral gri mtshon/ /sring mo phub can zhi ba mo/ /phag mo lag na gter nyid de/ /grub pa mo ni bsnyems dang bcas/ /de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni/ /sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas/ /

dag ni ji bzhin du/ /zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /spos la sogs pas mchod par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas/ /kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya/ /o~M su ma b+ha ga ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hi b+hUr/ rak+Sha sa mA tiSh+ShA ma ya hi b+hUr d+hu ba/ b.rA hA a mir+yA ta ma ya swA hA/ /sid

d+hi ke sid d+hi sa ma ya hi I mA~M ke mu drA b+hiH/ hrIHhU~M shrI b+h+yo/ de nas lus ni thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bstan te/ /gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya/ /gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na/ /gang zhig sems can don

zhugs dang / /gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa/ /de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid/ /chos min pas ni dug pas lhag /ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin/ /yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang / /phyag rgya gar gyi

mchod pa yis/ /ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod/ sring mo bzhi'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /sgrub pa dang ni rab sgrub nyid/ /'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang / /

kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir/ /zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ /phuH/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /srad bu thams cad yang dag bri/ /sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog /mtshams kyi rtse mchog

mjug ma mdud/ /de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni/ /mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni/ /klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag /shes rab can gyis kun tu bri/ /de nas khros nas zhugs nas ni/ /klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ /sbrul gyi

gdengs kas dgug par bya/ /o~M hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pr-i thi b+hi na da r-i She shA ya hi phuH/ sarba nA ga ku lA n+yA na ya phuH/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phuH/ sarbA na sA d+ha ya phuH/ ta ta sa sarba nA ga pu tra ka phuH/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon

gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyas dang rtse bar byed do/ /dug thams cad sbar ba dang / /gzhig nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /

'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug /gal te bden pa las 'das na/ /de dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur/ /khyod kyis glog la brnyas mi bya/ /ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing / /gal te dngos grub la dga' na/ /ci nas sbrul ni gsad mi bya/ /klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas ston

pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyes byas kyis ni dug nyid 'gyur/ /gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang / /dmyal bar

yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni/ /ha~M/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /de dbus dang por gdon la sogs/ /cho ga rgyas pa gdon par bya/ /de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas/ /dgod cing myur bar dkyil 'khor

du/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni/ /khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye/ /de nas gdon dang rims sdig pa/ /dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /rdo rjes rab tu 'jig par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /sdug bsngal thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /sems can kun don rab bsgrub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ o~M sAHhU~M

hrIHtrA~M/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog gi/ /dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin/ /gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni/ /gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa/ /de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa/ /'gro ba

'dul ba'i dam pa yin/ /de nas gang phyir dkyil 'khor che/ /dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste/ /kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la/ /rdo rje

lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /kun mchog bdag po'i sku rnams so/ /rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni/ /rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba gzhag /rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i/ /gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo bsnams pa bri/ /khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje/ /

gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ /rdo rje pad byung pad+ma can/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya/ /

rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad par bya ste/ o~M badzra nA rA ya Na ts+tshin+da pra ti ha na badzra tsakra te na ho/ b+ha ga bA na badzra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ badzra d+hA ra ta~M/ badzra ta thA ga ta hU~M/ badzra kro d+ha

ma hA yo gi ni ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badzra ku lo gra pa ne ho/ b+ha ga bA na badzra tsaN+De shwa rA ya/ ha ha ha ha hrIH/ badzra pad+mo da b+ha ba ho/ b+ha ga bA na badzra lo ke shwa re/ ma hA pra me sid d+h+ya/ o~M b+hU ra b+hu ba swaH/ swa sti na maHswA hA/ he badzra ku su mA yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma me sA d+ha ya ho/

b+ha ga bA na badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha/ ba ba Ta Ta tra~M/ badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha a she Sha~M mu drA/ na mo ye na sA d+he na/ b+ha ga ba te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yu d+ha/ ts+tshin+da badzra Ni tsakre Na te nas t+yen pA pa ka na/ o~M d+hIH/ shrI shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ badzra par mi/ o~M badzra gau ri ma hA bi d+ya trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa ri badzra kro

d+ha a ga ni sa ma ye/ badzra d+ha ri na mo stu te/ tad ya thA/ o~M hi li mi li le li tA li badzra ka mu ka ye swA hA/ badzra sa ma ya na mo ye na sA d+h+ye na b+ha ga ba ti/ /bud+d+ha bo d+hi rbud d+ha d+ha ra/ badzra d+harma pra yo ge na/ te nas t+ye na sid+ha mA~M/ o~M tA re tu t+ta re tu re swA hA/ badzra d+ha mo ta/ o~M karma badzri Ni sid+b+h+ya

sid+b+h+ya bi shud+d+ha sA d+h+ya ba ha/ ga ga nod b+ha be/ yo ge na sid+d+ha mA~M pa ra ma ka re/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga na bi shud d+he/ sarba ma ba pri ya pa ri pUr ni swA hA/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang phyogs gnas/ /lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid/ /'jig rten skyong rnams

dgod par bya/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi/ /rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer dang / /sgo dang mtshams su'ang de bri'o/ /sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rab tu gzhug /dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni/ /dang po'i

sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /dang po lcags kyu che de nyid/ /snying po 'di ni rjod byed cing / /'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /o~M ma hA su kha badzra sa twa sid+d+hi hU~M/ /sarba ta thA ga tan/ sa ma ya A ka r+Sha ya dzaH/ badzra ku la di pa~M/

da ma ye twa pra be sha ya hU~M/ sarba lo ke shwa ra~M pra be sha ya sa ma ya ba na d+ha na ba~M/ sa ma ya sarba rat+na dI pa~M ma hA ma Ni rA dzA nA~M/ ba shI ku ru hoH/ hU~M AHhU~M hrIHtrA~M/ de nas gsang ba chen po yi/ /snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni/ /'khor lo

thams cad dang bcas par/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang / /bden pas bcings te dbang du byas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad/ /dngos grub kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas ji bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa

dang / /dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni/ /thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs/ /'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyi

cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba/ mtha' med cing sna tshogs pa mnyam pa med pa'i phul du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba mchog byed pa gsungs

pa yin no/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs // //de nas gsang ba ras bris kyi cho ga gsungs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun

kyi gsang ba che/ /dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dngos grub kun gyis lus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi/ /rin chen rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po chags pa yi/ /glu dang rol

mo rjes chags pa/ /bla med dga' ba chen po yi/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /dga' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas/ /rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog /mi 'gyur mchog ni yang dag bzhugs/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /kun mchog chags pa chen po yi/ /dngos

grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa/ /glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med/ /mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur/ /rtag tu chags dang

dngos grub che/ /rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha/ /phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste/ /sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yin te/ kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang / /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal

mthong ba'am/ /thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che/ /dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang / /dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams/ /rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi mchog /ces bya'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba

chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig gi 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje ki li ki li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don

yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni/ /mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod/ /de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub kun bdag bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog

tu gsang bas gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste/ /sdig pa che la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang / /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /de dag kyang ni myur 'grub 'gyur/ /nyin re 'am ni zla re

'am/ /de bzhin lo ni re re la/ /ci mngon mngon 'dod 'grub par bya/ /ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas/ /ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste/ /gang zhig bris par gyur na ni/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob/ /bzhad pa dang

bcas zla ba'i 'od/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba/ /g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag /de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams/ /de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten/ /rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku/ /gsang ba chen po dgod par bya/ /dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar/ /gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar/ /gzhan ni ut+pal 'dab

ltar sngo/ /rdo rje bsnyems ma ser po 'dzin/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag /g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag /g.yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin/ /rdo rje ki li ki li ma/ /dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro/ /de yi logs

la rdo rje che'i/ /mda' ni gsor ba la brtson pa/ /bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas/ /de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas/ /mchod pas bdag po la lta ba/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan/ /thams

cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs/ /rang la bdag ni thugs gtad pa/ /zur du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni brtags pa yis/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob/ /ces bya ba

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba dag pa dam pa'i dngos grub 'grub/ /gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di/ /thams cad

gzigs pa rnams mchod pa/ /chen po yis ni dpal 'dir rol/ /'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram/ /yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po

yi/ /ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan/ /dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i/ /bla re phul bas mchog gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje glu yi mchod sogs dang / /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul ba/ /me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba/ /mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag

mchod/ /khang pa sum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya/ /yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / /rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas/ /rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni/ /

dngos grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos/ /ji snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag bklubs/ /phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spos dang dri snod bcas/ /rdo rje glu ni 'di

dag gis/ /gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /

mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ /rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mgon la 'dud/ /g.yon pa bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad/ /bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba

dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan/ /sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHhi hi hi hi hi/ /

mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol/ /de nas me tog sil ma dor/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang / /ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i

dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ o~M/ sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis brgyan/ /lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ha~M/ /

de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas/ /rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje can gyis byin

brlabs 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa

yang / /gang gis sgrub po dam pa dang / /sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur/ /lugs ma'am ni brdungs ma'am/ /'dus byas pa'am bris pa'am/ /dang po'i sems dpa'

bzhugs gsol nas/ /de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin rlabs sogs bsgrub rnams so/ /de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig

gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las/ /thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag mchog gis rol bcas pas/ /gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dzaHmchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba rab rtogs rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs/ hU~M mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu mi 'gyur zad med srid pa rab bsgrub bde dang yid

bde dam tshig bdag la deng grub mdzod/ /ba~M mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kye/ /hoHrab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig /rtag par

bdag 'phel nam mkha'i snying po khyod/ /hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod/ /dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /rab tu dga' ba mchog bdag po/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig

gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyi/ /mchod de sngags pas glu rnams kyi/ /rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin/ /bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la

brtan gyur cig /myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal/ /dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /phyag rgya kun gyis

byin brlabs pa/ /de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni/ /rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi /rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin

te/ o~M nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /

mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /

kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod/ /gang

gis don dang glu yis bstod/ /de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ /dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' yang dag rtogs/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o/ /kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang / /so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las/ /ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa kun gyi sna tshogs

che/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyi/ /myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dang pos gsungs so/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi

bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin/ rang lha rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /rang lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam

pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur/ /rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnam sad pas/ /glu dang

rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod/ /rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya/ /'di yis rtog pa thams cad la/ /rdo rje 'bebs pas rab sad pas/ /

rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni/ /thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal/ /dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de rjes

gnas ci bzhin/ /ji snyed pa dang ci bde bas/ /me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni/ /khang pa'am skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas/ /ji snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag bklubs/ /me tog phreng bcas kha dri zhim/ /

lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa'am/ /'dus pa'am ni ri mor bris/ /dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du/ /cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin rlabs sogs

'grub par bya/ /sngon du lan cig bsgrub byas nas/ /de nas de rjes ci 'dod par/ /ci 'dod pa dang ci smra ba/ /thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am/ /rab tu dgod dam smra ba'am/ /ji bzhin de bzhin de dang der/ /ji 'dod

par ni de bzhin gzhag /gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni/ /me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni/ /ji bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya/ /'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na phur/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub/ /rga shi med pa'i gtso

bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po/ /phyag rgya kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin/ /mi thub pa dang mi sod cing / /thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod rjes

su bzung bar nus/ /kun mchog rjes su chags pa che/ /'dod pa 'grub pa bde ba'i mchog /kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /rgyal po

rdo rje kun 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che/ /mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste/ /mchog gi

dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag

la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //gsang ba mchog ni dgyes pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo

rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid/ /ces bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mchog tu rjes chags

dga' ba pad+ma ra ba che/ /mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste/ /mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid de nyams myong ba/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal

mchog dang po las/ dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su gzung ba bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan cig brjod pas

sems bskyed du bcug ste/ o~M sarba yo ga tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang

rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni/ /snying gar rdo rje rab bzhag nas/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ho/ snying pos rdo rje ci bder bsgrub/ /'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na/ /'dod pa kun las 'grub par

'gyur/ /de nyid bskul bas myur du ni/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /gos kyis gdong ni

g.yogs pa rnams/ /ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis/ /slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug /phyag rgya gang la de babs pa'o/ /de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gdong g.yogs

dgrol byas la/ /rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /de la rdo rje chen po'i mna'i chus dbang bskur te/ /'di ltar brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg

par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ /skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas/ /dad pa med pas bzhad gad smod/ /zhes bya bas mna' bsgag go/ /de la sangs

rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+wa~M a b+hi Sh+winy+tsA mi ma hA badzra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu

sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems chen po/ /yongs su mi spang rtag tu bsgrubs/ /shin

tu gsang bde 'di yin te/ o~M badzra kar+m+ma bA d+hi d+hi shrI badzra nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i ming de yang ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro/ /de la

mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i

skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ /'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni/

srid pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag /rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba'am lha sgrub pa'i

tshe dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no/ /rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi/ /srid bde shin tu myur bar ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu

bskyed/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan

'das kyi dam tshig go/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang / /'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces ni bsgrags/ /yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di brjod

par bya ste/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ji srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa/ /rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang

phyug /sems can don ni byed pa yin/ /dam tshig 'dis ni mchog sgrub cing / /ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa/ /nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang / /thams cad

rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/ /ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas/ /yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang / /don yod mchog tu grub pa dang / /rnal

'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed/ /dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba kun/ /phab

pas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong / /de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung

bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /gzengs bstod pa yi gang lung bstan/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o/ /o~M 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod ston/ /he badzra na maHtathA ga ta sid d+hi sa ma ya s+t+wa~M b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ gang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang phyag rgya chen por lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste gzengs bstod

pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang sngags kyi stobs la dad par bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin

par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ci snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pas 'dir dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bsgrub pa dang rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i

dbyings thams cad brtan par gyur pa nyid kyis/ 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi

dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs

pas kyang / /sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing / /khyed rnams der nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar 'chi ba ni yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni/ /srid pa

shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /

sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing / /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis/ /des ni smad par mi bya'o/ /rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs

nas/ /dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung / /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su spang mi bya/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas

kun mtshungs bla ma yis/ /slob dpon la ni gang smad pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang / /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems

can dmyal bar ltung / /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing

'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang / /rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na/ /longs spyod g.yo bas smos ci dgos/ /gang gis bskal pa bye bar ni/ /grangs med pa ni rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan

la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs

yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam/ /deng khyod 'gyur bar the tsom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas/ /kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /

khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng 'dir thob par the tshom med/ /ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

dang rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob

dpon dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs bya ste/ /zhes bya'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams

cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor kun dang rjes spyod ldan/ /

sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste/ /mkhas pas mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su bzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i phyir gnas skabs

thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing gsad par mi bya'o/ /ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang

ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la bde bar gzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams lan tshod bskyed pa yin no/ /lta ba log pa dang phyi rol mu stegs pa dang / nyan thos pa

thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no/ /ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so/ /sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so/ /gang gis kyang khyed kyi lus ngag yid kyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med

pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste/ /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

dpas mchog tu bden pas gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la dgongs pa yin no/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ster bstan par gyis/ /de ni 'gro

la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag tu nyid du rtogs par gyis/ /de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu/ /rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa/ /rdo rje bla ma chen pos de phul nas/ /rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par bya/ /myos byed myos

bral btung ba ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs/ /ci bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo gar rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs/ /

bud med sogs dang ldan pa'am/ /rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa/ /ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis/ /mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu'i khyad

par ni 'di yin te/ /hU~M bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i'o/ /a de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ /hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ /o~M pad+ma'i snying po'i'o/ /ha nam mkha'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam

mkha'i snying po yin no/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni/ /yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa 'di/ /mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi yin/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas/ /

rnam par dben par rol mo dkrol/ /rang gsang cho gas glu blangs pa/ /gsang ba'i rol mos rab tu bsgrub/ /de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni/ 'dzin pa dang bcas gzung ba che'i/ /gar ni rab tu byas nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas

nas/ /yongs su bskor bas rang mchod bya/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis/ /gang zhig gar de rol mo yin/ /gser

ram yang na dngul dang ni/ /de bzhin shing las byas pa yi/ /rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis/ /grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de/ /bzla zhing thams cad mchog

tu gzhug /sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /bsod nams kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtag tu srung bar gyur pa yin/ /rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad/ /sbyar dug mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba dang / /bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams/ /

'dis ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub dag ni phun tshogs 'gyur/ /dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas

phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa'am de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu dang rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam

tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste/ de re zhig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab

dga' dam tshig ste/ /bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig /so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur sgrubs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'

bsdus pas na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ /hU~M rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje chags pa'i dam

tshig dpal khyod 'dud/ /kha T+wA~M 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod 'dud/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yi srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i

sku/ /la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku/ /la lar pad+ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste/ /la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad+ma'i rgyal po bdag sgrubs shig /de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu

gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las/ /yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba las/ /rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod gyur/ /de

nas ming po gsum gyi ni b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi/ hrI hU~M shrI b+h+yo/ de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni/ phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ sarba maM ga maN+Dal

mi da~M badzra ng+ha rA kra ma bi mar da bi kir b+han+dza ud sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ ha na da ha/ pa tsa b+ha smi kuM ru kro da hU~M kA ra man+t+ri Na/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi

'od kyis sku ni rnam par mdzes/ /la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka bye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bar/ /la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin

pa/ /la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs/ /ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub gyur cig /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i

mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ /de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na

med pa'i dam pa dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i glu dang gar gyi cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas/ so sor rjes su bsgrub

par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa yin no zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin/ /

kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub/ /zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam rgyud sna tshogs can/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub

nyams dang ldan pa ste/ /gang gis sna tshogs pa yi rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan kun tu rjes bsten pa/ /mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid ni de yis yang dag nyams su myong / /don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan/ /cho ga mchog tu rtag pa ste/ /kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni/ /

dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub byed/ /gang zhig grong khyer mchog dgyes par/ /zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams ni/ /shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde des thob/ /gang gis dngos grub ma thob dang / /bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams/ /

dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /sgrub po 'dir ni rab grub 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /snying po sogs kyis ma grub dang / /nye ba'i snying pos bsgrub byas kyang / /ma grub 'dir zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du/ /de

bzhin myur du grub pa yin/ /ji ltar dang po'i khyim bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa yis/ /de ltar thams cad grub pa min/ /ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /khang dam pa mthong ba yis/ /dam tshig

rnams la nyams pa dang / /sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs pa dang / /bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa yang / /rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am/ /yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa/ /slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /de dag myur

du grub par 'gyur/ /grub min yang 'dir cung zad med/ /dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin/ /dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur du/ /rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog

dang po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos

dang dge 'dun te/ /dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya/ /go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog /go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan/ /rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang / /pad+ma rin chen 'chang ba'o/ /

'khor lo de ni brtags nas su/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o/ /ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas na/ /sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di yin te/ o~M b+hU kha~M/

khyim mam yang na nags tshal lam/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ /thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya/ /de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /'di dag mya

ngan 'das pa ston/ /ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i go cha bgos/ /shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog /go cha la sogs bgos pa yin/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes/ /dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa yin/ /srid ba shin tu grub pa yi/ /
