gsol ba/ /kun gsol kun byed thams cad du/ /bka' bsgo ba kun grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po gsang ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po rdo rje

sems dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/ bla na med pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba

zhes bya ba thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub

par byed pa dang / mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /tsum ba na dang / /'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i

dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ste thams cad rnal 'byor zhes bya ba gang brjod pa'o/ /de gang dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang der bcom ldan 'das ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /byin rlabs mchog ni rtags mdzad nas/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' myur du grub/ /tsum ba na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgyas btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma lus shing lus pa med pa dang / lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi

'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i mda' zhes bya ba'i rgyas btab pas thams

cad rjes su chags pa dang / /dgug pa dang / /dbang du bya ba dang / dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyis 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ /'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gi lta ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan

zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis lta zhing btung bar bya'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ste tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i na

tshod gzhon pa dang / nad med pa dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid kyi stobs dang / spro ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / shin tu bde ba thams cad dang / yid bde ba dang / dngos

grub kyi mchog thob pa ste/ ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o/ /bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dgod cing stod pa ni bcom

ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / phyag byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / ji srid mchog

thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o/ /sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang / 'dzum pa dang gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i

dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub mchog thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs kyi mchog gi

dam pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' bas brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang

ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog dang po'i glu ni/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal po ste/ /mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam par

'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams grub par byed do/ /sarba ku ru ya thA su kha~M zhes

bya ba brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon

par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes

pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ /rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/

'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'bebs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gar dang / glu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang / bden ngag thams

cad dang / grol ba dang pra dbab pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang sgyu ma thams cad dang rmad du byung ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'dul ba dang / gsad pa dang / thams cad

phyir 'dren pa dang / thams cad sgrub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o/ /thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs/ /sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la/ /

rab 'jug mchod pa byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad rnam par sbyong ba dang / srung ba dang / yongs su sbyong ba dang / rims thams cad dang / dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang /

gdon dang / nad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang / shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang / dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i don grub pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o/ /nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rjes su chags par bya ste/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas

btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags shing dgyes pa dang / brtan par rjes su chags nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi

tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du/ /gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin/ /mig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyi/ /tsum

ba na dang 'khyud sogs kyis/ /thams cad rnal 'byor rjes bsgrub ste/ /myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ /sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste/ /grub pa med pa rnams la yang / /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /gang la dngos grub med gyur

dang / /bsod nams phun tshogs med pa yang / /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /rgyas btab myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /snying po la sogs nye snying pos/ /bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na/ /tsum ba sogs kyis rgyas gdab

bya/ /gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog /de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid chen po 'di grub pa/ /mchog gi bdag nyid dam pa ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan/ /so so'i skye bo la

brjod min/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di 'ba' zhig gi/ /bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na/ /bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ /

mi thub pa dang sod mi 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba/ /thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen/ /thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu

gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so// //de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad

pa'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad skyed par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o/ /sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad

mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang kha T+wA~M ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo

la sogs pa bkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste/

des rdo rje bsnyems ma yongs su btang bar byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bsnyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go/ /mda' gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjes

su chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad kyi bud med thams cad rol par byed cing ma grub na yang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no/ /chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis

thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang gsod pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta ba bzhin du brjod par

bya'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi zad pa'o/ /rdo rje stod pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad skyod pa dang dbang du byed pa'o/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs

brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas sdigs mdzub byas te/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mi thogs par rgyas btab pas bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /stan mthon po la skyil krung phyed pas 'dug ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje

sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi

rtags bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed pa'am sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje

don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu ste snying gar sen mo 'drud pa'o/ /lcags kyu brdeg pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la g.yas pa de gzhug pa'o/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o/ /phan tshun sems brud pa'i snying gar byas pa'o/ /lce mnyam par byin pa'o/ /snying gar

rdo rje brtan par rab tu bzhag pa'o/ /rdo rjes bya ba pa'o/ /rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo / /'di rnams kyis dngos grub dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chos dang / ye shes dang / las dang / bde ba chen

po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i lcags kyus so/ /kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so/ /mthe bong rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis mthil gnyis

su brud pa'o/ /mdzub mo rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o/ /srin lag gi rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o/ /mthe'u chung gi rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo btsir

ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa

dang / dgod du gzhug pa dang / gsod pa'o/ /de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo

bar byed pas myang ba dang btung ba'o/ /chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so/ /de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa gnyis pa stod pas so/ /thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying gar gzhug pas so/ /yod pa thams cad

rnyed pa ni mig dgug pas so/ /'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i dman pa'i gdong gis blta bas so/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so/ /'dod pa'i chags pa gsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang

bar byed pas so/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' bsgo bas so/ /de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar sbyor na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan

zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang

rjes su chags pa'o/ /rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang dngos grub thams cad bde bar grub pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do/ /dus kyi mchod pas

mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang / thams cad 'phrog pa'o/ /g.yon pa bsnyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis sgyu ma dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang /

rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / bskrad pa dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba 'phog pa dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o/ /

rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes bkab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o/ /de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug

tor rdo rjes thams cad bsrung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa bsgrub pa'o/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis

legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o/ /de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon

las grol ba dang / dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o/ /sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o/ /de yang

rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so/ /rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so/ /mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar byas la mthe bo

dang / mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o/ /mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o/ /mdzub

mos phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o/ /rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o/ /skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang skyes pa dag gis rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi

bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /kha sbyor btsir bas ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo / /rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi lta zhing gzhan la mi

'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skye gnas su sen mo brung pas skyes bu rnams so/ /de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ /de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis

'khyud lam mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ /rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug /bsrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta stA~M zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gsang bar reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o/ /smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o/ /

rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po bsgrub pa'o/ /rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o/ /rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyas

su yang 'gyur ba yin no/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o/ /de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wA~M gis so/ /dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub

thams cad do/ /thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /nor thams cad 'brog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad gar byed du

gzhug pa ni kha T+wA~M ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /de

nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN+Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang /

guny+dza dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam par

rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin/ /phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la/ /

rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis/ /don yod kun grub bde bar gsol/ /zhes bya'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs // //de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa ma

lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs so/ /phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas/ /sgeg bcas 'dzum sogs bkrol ba yis/ /las kyi phyag rgya chen po brgya/ /thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag

dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste/ /mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyi/ /las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /

rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i/ /thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na/ /dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing / /sgeg bcas mthe'u

chung sogs bkrol bas/ /de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing / /phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas/ /thams cad kyis ni

bsgrub par bya/ /mchog dang po'i las chen po'i phyag rgya mchog gzhan yin no zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya/ /rab tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bar/ /bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar/ /

zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas/ /las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya/ /mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag /ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi

rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wA~M ga/ /lus kun gyis ni gar bya zhing / /rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing / /dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o/ /ci ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa/ /rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa/ /

phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya/ /zhes bya bar rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal

mo grub mchog ster/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir/ /nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs/ /dam pa mchog tu grub par byed/ /mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po/ /dam pa mchog gi

dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la/ /phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni/ /bstan par bya ste gzhan la min/ /de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi/ /mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras

bur ldan/ /dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs // //de nas

sems dpa' chen po kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog /rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni/ /mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol/ /kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /de

nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa/ /gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la/ /dang po'i gnas mchog ci ltar lags/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems

bdag ji ltar lags/ /sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni/ /byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid/ /

phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang / /'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang / /khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung / /de ci nye snying ji ltar lags/ /bde chen rdo rje chen po yi/ /don

yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs/ /de yi rnam smin ji lta bu/ /thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis/ /dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba/ /ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po

rnams dang ni/ /rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags/ /thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang / /phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang / /thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che/ /bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che/ /de ni de nyid gsang ba dang / /don yod pa

ni mchog nyid de/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni/ /

the tsom tshogs rnams gsan nas su/ /'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin/ /de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ci ltar yin zhe na/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las/ /sems can don ni yongs brtags pas/ /des ni rtog par gsungs pa ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag

phyir ro/ /de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad/ /phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung / /de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang / /phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod/ /de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun la rab tu

gnas/ /rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog /bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i/ /grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje

sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang

phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di/ /'dod

chags chen po dga' ba che/ /de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog /de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan

'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams/ /de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad

par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba/ /zab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad khyab cing dri ma med/ /byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa/ /de nas 'di'i

las kyi khyad par ni/ sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas/ /ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag /rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun/ /rdo rje las ni 'dzin 'gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni/ /bdag la byin rlabs mchog bsgrub

pa/ /nyin re sgrub par byed na des/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang / /gang phyir sems can don gyur pas/ /de phyir nga ni kun tu bzang / /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug

pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang / /gdug

pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag /kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni/ /mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin/ /brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ /des na phyag na rdo rje des/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud

yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum/ /yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/ /rig rnams rab tu byung ba'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che/ /dngos grub thams cad rjes chags

phyir/ /dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir/ /nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir/ /gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir/ /'jig rten gsum nga khams

gsum nga / /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde/ /bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir/ /g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir/ /sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no/ /zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs

so/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir/ /gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir/ /bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /

rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /gsang ba'i phyir ni snying por brjod/ /yi ge hU~M ni mi 'gyur mchog /de nas nye ba'i snying po yi/ /de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ /de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang / /snying po rab tu brjod par bya/ /snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub/ /nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod/ /

de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje de nyid don yod grub/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang / /ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang / /'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang / /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul/ /de nas rnam par shes pa ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyi/ /'khor lo mngon

sum mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar/ /

ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing / /sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan/ /der bdag po'i don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa/ /thams cad dag pa bla na

med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nyid/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni/ rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir/ /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus/ /zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar nam mkha'i snying po

yin zhe na/ thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang / /de nas nor bu rigs kyi ni/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs

pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la/ /spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas mchog dang po'i

phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid/ /sna tshogs bya bar rdo rje can/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje

chos/ /nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas/ /bkug ste de nas rjes bsgrub pa/ /

dril bu nyid kyis bya ba yin/ /ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni/ /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas/ /mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod/ /de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na

nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs/ /dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis/ /rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /

ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang / /rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin

gyur nas/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sad cing / /rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas/ /mchog dang las sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni/ /phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing / /thams cad byed

cing thams cad bza'/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am/ /gang dang de ru 'chag pa'am/ /dgod pa dang ni smra ba'am/ /gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis

ni/ /thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni sdig kun dang bral bas/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na

nyid do/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga mnyams mchog gi bla ma gsal/ /mchog tu gsang bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ /bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de

gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni/ /rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so/ /bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o/ /bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su

chags pa che/ /kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni/ /kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug 'di ni gso ba yin/ /mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ /mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol/ /

de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min/ /sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'/ /dad pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa/ /rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o/ /gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu bsgrub

pa'am/ /yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed/ /so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs/ /des

ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed/ /rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hU~M las bris nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis

ster zhing thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa ni/ /gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min/ /'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin/ /rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan

med nyid mi 'gyur/ /brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin/ /rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed/ /dngos grub chen po la thams cad rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang /

rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po snying po sgrub byed pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad/ /de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob/ /de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin/ /de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das

la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs/ /dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin

brlab pa/ /rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che/ /ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du/ /phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni/ /sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi/ /gsung la rjes

su yi rang mdzad/ /dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// //thugs dam sa'i snying po tho lding du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+t+ra kA la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga

nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //lo tsA chen po rin chen bzang po yis/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la/ /bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/ /bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /AR+Ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsA sha ti kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes

dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i

phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na/

nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shis pa

thams cad bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang /

sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing

mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/

yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di

lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i

gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yi tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa'i gnas so/ /lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri

rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams

cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig

thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal

med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' ba dang /

mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor

thams cad pa/ rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can

chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid

kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo

rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /thams

cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug

gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa don gnas

'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smras so/ /a/ de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes

bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad

kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro

bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin

ma bteg ste 'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas/ rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams

cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad

rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul

'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa

la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi

bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so//

trA~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad

de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin

pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang

lung 'bogs pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /

aH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad

mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin

rab tu 'dzum bzhin du bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so/ /a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa

zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams

cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing

'dzum dmul nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i

tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshes pa thams cad la mchod

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nams ba'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rang du 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /o~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams

cad 'dul nus pa yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba

nyid do/ /sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do/ /sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub po/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid

rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya

ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/ /thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/ /thams cad las nyid

pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa

thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/ /thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no/ /ngag thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can

thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no/ /sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos

rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /drI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshig mthun par thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /b+h+yoH/ de nas sbrang rtsir byed

pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ tshig mthun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /swA/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa mtha' yas mu med la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang chos 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar

thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rjod pa dang / sgom pa des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje

la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs sa legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /'bras bu yod pa

'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med/ /gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ /bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ /de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang / /sangs

rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/ /kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang /

tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po dngos

grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam

par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams

gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma

lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i

tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / /ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni/ 'khor

ba'i bar du rtag par yang / /'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir/ /'khor ba'i srid du bdag nyid 'dul/ /ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar yang / /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam par dag /bde

ba che zhing nor che la/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/ /sems can don rnams brtan par byed/ /lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /

klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen

po'am de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/ /o~M byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ o~M kun tu

bzang po'i spyod pa/ o~M yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ o~M 'gog pa med pa/ o~M skye ba bzlog pa/ o~M rnam par shes pa thams cad/ o~M 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ o~M brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ o~M kun tu 'gro ba/ o~M rdo rje sra ba'i sems hU~M phaT/ o~M de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad/ o~M ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ o~M chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ o~M de bzhin las rnam par sbyong ba/ hU~M o~M nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT/ o~M 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ o~M spong ba'i rdo rje can/ o~M hU~M thams cad 'dul ba/ o~M hrIH/ o~M a zhes bya

ba'i sgo/ o~M shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ /AM ba~M hU~M ya/ o~M/ o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog /o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/ o~M de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aH/ o~M a/ sdig pa'i bcings pa thams cad

choms shig /ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar gyis shig/ o~M dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/ hU~M traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /lag na

rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ge 'drir gzhug pa'am/ bklag pa'am/ 'chang ba'am/ bsgom pa'am/ bsti stang

du bya ba'am/ ri mor bya ba'am/ mchod par mi nus so/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs

pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod pa ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi

sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /

de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de la bdud sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /ya

nga ba ma spangs par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad

dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs // //mang+ga laM// //
